name: Bernard Hill
text: The work that these guy do are amazing. The 4 large trees kept the sun from fully shining in our backyard and when the first tree fell we could see the difference. The guys seem to work well together and they clean up was professional and thorough. I will recommend this company to others. Great job!

resp.text: Bernard, we are pleased to serve you.  Our crew and office staff our happy to know that you're happy and satisfied with our services. Thank you so much.

name: Kelly Campbell
text: National Tree Service removed three really large trees for me. They were quick, professional and did a really impressive job. I would absolutely use them again and would highly recommend them to you too!

resp.text: Miss Kelly, we thank you for allowing us to serve you. We are so glad that we've met your expectations. Your positive comment made our crew and office staff proud. We will continue to strive harder to provide quality tree services to our dear clients.  We appreciate you a lot.

name: Jaime and Elsa Hensley
text: Recent storms/strong winds caused a very high pine tree to topple over. It was close the street and over our driveway. National Tree Service was the most responsive company to help out with our emergency. They offered great pricing and within an hour were at my house to cut up the tree. Anthony and main office maintained me updated as they cleared up the toppled tree. Anthony went above and beyond to get this unexpected project taken care of.

resp.text: Dear Jaime and Elsa, Anthony and the rest of NTS crew work really hard. Hearing good and positive reviews from our clients really make their day. Thank you so much for trusting National Tree Service for your tree service needs.

name: erica dozier
text: Be sure to do thorough research. Wish I had. I saw the BBB rating without reading current complaints.  The tree was removed but the stump grinding, which I paid for, was not performed. I have contacted the company twice but received no response. I will file a complaint the the BBB, if only to record the service. Hopefully more people will read the complaints and the BBB will reflect this in the company's rating. They are dishonest and unprofessional.

name: Jared Wilkinson
text:
Had NTS come out and quote me on a tree removal. They were double what a competitor quoted. When I gave him the number he said he would do it for that, so be sure you get multiple quotes before using them. He said they would be out the next day at 10-11am. They showed up at 2p the next day, which is fine, and proceeded to cut down the trees. They did a great job with the removal and cleanup to the curb. The minus one star was for the person who came the next day to pickup the debris. He got all of it which was great but left 4" gouges in the yard which I had to dig out and fill up.

I do think you should give them a shot and if they are the best price, use them. Just be sure to check around when having work done to get the best price.

resp.text: Jared, we appreciate for giving us the opportunity to serve you and for your positive review. We will keep on striving to improve  to provide our clients a safe and cost effective solution for all their tree service needs. Thank you.

name: Philip Gannuscio
text: I recently had National Tree Service out  to my home to remove several large pine trees and grind a couple of  stumps. Nationals representative, Anthony Taylor, came out to give me a quote. He was extremely professional and really knew his stuff.The next day Anthony and his crew showed up and removed my trees , handled my stumps , and cleaned up any and all branches and debris. I was very impressed with the professionalism of the entire  company. Anthony ( and National) delivered what they promised and I have already referred them to clients , neighbors, and family members .Truly awesome company

name: James Taylor
text: Great knowledgeable staff! Very fast, responsive and friendly! Give them call for all your tree needs!

name: The Good, Bad & Ugly Properties
text: AwEsOmE!!  National Tree Service did an outstanding job cutting a tree for us. I was working with my sons on a screen printing job &  told him I’m stepping out to grab a bite to eat & see how those tree cutters are doing. On the way I stopped by our property & saw NTS already finished & left. I snapped a photo & texted a son who was also amazed. Towards the end of the day I thought to myself  I'll email or call them to ask what's the quickest way I can make my payment because we are happy customers. When I sat down at the computer, voila! NTS already emailed me the invoice which allowed me to conveniently make  payment online. As we folk in Alabama say, "Gracias". Thanks for your assistance National Tree & I look forward to calling you again. – Antonio Espinoza

resp.text: Mr. Espinosa, we're so glad that you're happy with the tree service we provided to you. We work hard to make sure to provide our dear clients the quality service they deserve. Thank you so much for allowing us to serve you. Of course, KUDOS to our crew members...nice job guys! You made National Tree Service proud!

name: Ryan Hoffman
text: This is by far the most unprofessional company I have ever hired to do work at my house. To begin with, the estimator came out and gave me a price on having 2 trees cut down and having the stumps ground - trees are in the back yard behind a locked gate. I was told to expect a phone call that afternoon for scheduling. After 3 days I called the office and was told that they never received my estimate but they would put me on their schedule. A date was set and then was moved several times. I scheduled someone to come do bobcat work around that date as well. I then received a call asking if they could come that day (Thursday) and do the work. I said yes and left my office to go home and meet them. They finally showed up around 4:45 in the afternoon and got one tree down and told me that they would be back at 8:30 am the next day. I had to call the office at 3 pm to see if they were still coming to finish the work since I had to take another day to stay home from work. I waited to hear back and was told that they should be out sometime that afternoon. The crew finally showed up around 5:30 pm. They were able to get the second tree down but did not have the equipment to grind the stumps and I was told that they would come Saturday morning to finish up. Saturday came and went without anyone showing up and no phone call. The following Wednesday I get a call from the office asking if I was happy with the work and to confirm that they had removed all the debris from my yard, I told the person on the phone that they were not supposed to remove debris but they were supposed to grind stumps. She was unaware of this and said that she would make a note of it and have someone call me. Later that afternoon I got a phone call letting me know that someone would be out the next morning to grind stumps. I waited the entire day at home after taking off work, again, and NTS was again a no call no show. At this point I gave up on having anyone come complete the job. A couple weeks later, the company showed up without calling to try and finish grinding 2 stumps. The guy told my wife that he couldn't finish because there was some concrete and rocks that the didn't initially see and that he would need to come back later to finish the work. At this point I have had to call and cancel on my bobcat guy twice, which has cost both of us money. This job was started in April, and it is now the end of May. If you don't have anything to do and want to work with a company that is completely incompetent with communication, then National Tree Service should be ok. Otherwise, do yourself a favor and stay clear.

name: Ismael Torres
text: Don't use their service, repeat don't use their service. On July 29-2020, they send Samuel to price a job. Now the day before coming to do the work one of their employees came to tell us that Samuel the guy they send to price the work they would be doing, is not qualified to make the quote. The guy that came today from the office said that the job is $2,500 more on top of the quote. This is unacceptable and shows how unprofessional they are. For that reason I don't recommend them.

name: Vic Mobley
text: I called to see if they had firewood and asked what time they close. I drove out there at appox.12:30-12:45 in the afternoon.  When I arrived ALL THE PARKING SPACES in front of the business were filled with cars. I parked along the road and went to the door s and they were locked, didn't see anyone inside so I knocked then went to my car, drove inside the fence to the building and yelled inside, "Is anybody here?", and no one answered....So I left.

resp.text:
I apologize for the inconvenience Mr. Mobley. We were out for lunch when you stopped by and crews were out cutting trees down that's why no one was at the office. I hope that you let us know when and what time you would come to make sure that somebody will be at the office to accommodate you.
Thank you.

name: Brian Kendrick
text: Communication is the key to any business. I can't say enough about the hard work the crew put in to get the job completed. After some equipment issues, NTS returned and finished the job. The quote and pricing was below other competitors and the professionalism shown by NTS is first class. I would definitely recommend this company.

resp.text: Brian, you are right, communication is the key to success. We apologize for the inconvenience it may have caused you. We will handle this matter and ensure that the communication between us and our clients will be improved. Thank you so much for trusting your tree service needs with us.

name: Daniel Minor
text: Awesome VERY Professional Job done here. The staff was very friendly and the work was done as requested. I have 5 more problem trees in my back yard that will need to go. I will be calling again soon. Thank You!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hello Daniel! Thank you for the compliment. Our goal is to satisfy our clients. And we're very glad that you are happy with our services. Just give us a call when you're ready to work on your other problem trees. As always, we'll be honored to work with you again. We appreciate you so much!

name: Ashmen000
text: Took three days of calling to finally get a rep to come to the house and give an estimate.  Rep was hours late from when they said he would be there.   Tree was scheduled to be cut down 2 days later at eight in the morning.  Crew never showed up.  Called the office and said they would call back with what was wrong.  Never got the call.  We used this service a few years ago and it was night and day difference in the response and price.

resp.text: Ashmen000, we are not going to make any excuses for what happened. You're absolutely right, the fault is on our side. The scheduling was mishandled and we deeply apologize for what you've experience with us lately. On the other hand, we appreciate you for informing us about this incident. We will definitely look into this so it won't happen again in the future. We're hoping that you'll give us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you for being a loyal customer.

name: gulfdiver 2424
text: Trimmed two oak trees for me today in Pleasant Grove, very professional, great clean up as well, best price in town, definitely my new tree guys and would recommend them hands down

resp.text: Thank you so much for the nice words. We strive to please our clients. We are so glad that you are very satisfied with our services. We appreciate you so much.

name: Tammy H. Bridges
text: Great company with great service every time! Call this company any time  you need a tree cut down or any other type of service. They are the best by far in the city!

resp.text: Thank you Tammy! Call us anytime!

name: Stanley Bolling
text: I had very large 30 yr old tees near my house and NTS removed them all in a timely and professional manner.  I recommend them to anyone who has low hanging trees near their house.

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting us with your tree service needs, Mr. Bolling. I'm glad that we've met your expectations. We truly appreciate you.

name: Greg Case
text: I am surprised at the people who are writing anonymous reviews and claiming bad service.  I have used National Tree Service on several occasions over the years.  They are prompt and courteous.  They do a GREAT job and you can barely tell that a tree was ever there.  They did no damage to the yard other than a place where a limb hit when the tree came down, and that was only one time (out of four). If you are having trees removed, dont use anyone else.

resp.text: HI Greg! Thank you so so much for your review. We truly appreciate you and your business. Please call us anytime you need us! :-)

name: Cathy Fingerman
text: National Tree Service gave me a free estimate and did the job for that very competitve price. They were on time, very professional and cleaned up after themselves. I would call them again for any tree service that I would need. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you Cathy! Call us anytime!

name: Ricky Isip
text: As a man of few words, this company does Professional and Excellent job at Reasonable Cost.  Enough said!

name: David Burroughs
text: Very professional and friendly.  Once complete, they asked if everything was to my satisfaction and cleaned up the work area.  I would use them again, and would recommend them to others.

resp.text: Thank you David for your feedback! Please call us anytime!

name: George Barnett
text: Everything you want in at tree service. Experience, reasonable rates, and great customer service. Highly recommended.

name: Rach Hill
text: National Tree Service is a GREAT company!!!  Removing trees is not as easy as going to Wal-Mart.....National Tree Service is insured and alot of places who are "cheaper" are not.  Also Mr Peppers has been in this business for over forty years.  If I needed a tree removed close to my house or on my property I would call National Tree Service.  They are family owned, insured, and are trained in dangerious tree removal.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Rach Hill.

name: Nolan Hutchins
text: Who was the greatest experience

name: Bruce Resp
text:
I  wasted half my day waiting for NTS to arrive at my home as scheduled.
Received a call around 5:00pm asking to reschedule. I actual have appointments that I intended to keep this week

resp.text: We apologize for missing your scheduled appointment.  We never intend to be late to anyone's home as we understand your time is just as valuable as our our time.  Unfortunately, we got behind and were delayed and are sincerely sorry for your inconvenience.

name: john leddy
text: Too busy for my money.  Missed several appointments for quote.  Finally we called and claimed i cancelled the appointment.  Another company got my money.

name: Jonathan Rose
text: deformation of character.........?

name: Jose Manuel Arias Diaz
text:
(Translated by Google) The place is good

(Original)
El lugar es bueno

name: Mary F
text: Wow. Great professional service at a great price. I have used several local tree service companies in past several years but this one makes others look like they are stumbling around in the dark. Parrish will be my first and only call next time we need a huge dead tree taken down.

name: Bobby Williams
text: I contracted with Mr Parrish in November 2020 for his crew to remove a few trees on the back of my property. However I was not prepared for them to completely destroy my back lawn to include my sprinkler system. They seemed happy to collect a check and ride off into the sunset leaving me with a lawn and sprinkler system destroyed.I feel obligated to share this information to as many as possible.

name: Jonua Byrd
text:
Very professional and courteous .
Definitely use them again.

name: June McKinley
text: Awesome crew and did an amazing job. This is the second time I have used them and will again!!

name: Elaine Roberts
text: They didn't even have the courtesy to return our call. If I could I would have given them no stars. I did call Beaver Tree Service and they returned our call promptly and came the next day. Very professional.

name: Marie Eggersgluess
text: Scott's response for quote to remove a tree was very satisfactory and the estimate reasonable.  I would use his services in the future,  when needed.

name: Debra Harlow-Aldecoa
text: Outstanding People and Company.  They did a fantastic job of clearing our trees without any damage to our fence or surrounding trees and houses!  Highly recommend Mr. Parrish and his tree service.  Excellent quality for a great price - very competitive!  Thank you for a superior job!

name: Mayra Pangborn
text: Did a great job at my mom's house.

name: Sullivan Edwards (Sully)
text:
Abraham and his crew were professional, courteous, and performed everything that I expected, while keeping me informed if anything unexpected came up.

They fixed some major drainage and erosion issues in the back yard (see before and after photos) by burying downspouts, building a French drain that went out to the road, and tying the downspouts into the drain. It is super satisfying to watch tons of water just pouring out of the drain into the street after a heavy rain.

They also graded and re-sodded the yard with Zoysia for less than it would have cost me to personally buy the Zoysia and lay the sod myself. I highly recommend Legacy for your personal landscaping project.

resp.text: Mr. Edwards,  We would like to take the opportunity to thank you so very much for the positive review.  Abraham enjoyed working on your drainage project and we are truly blessed to have such great people working with us to help solve issues that our customers may be having.  Have a great summer!

name: Rene' Holt
text: I never like to leave bad reviews and always try to keep them positive, but I contacted this company to help with some backyard design and remodel. I had a meeting scheduled with Jacob this past Wednesday and when he was 30 minutes late, I called the office to make sure nothing was wrong. Jacob called back and offered no apology for being a no-show but we rescheduled for today. It's a hour last our appointment time and he didn't show up again with no call and didn't answer his phone. If you can't be professional enough to keep scheduled appointments, twice, you're not a company I want to work with.

resp.text: Rene', thank you so very much for letting us know about the appointment issues.  This rarely happens, let alone 2 times.  Jacob inadvertently kept the same time from last week's appointment on his calendar and received a notice this morning that you cancelled the appointment, assuming it was this afternoon.  We regret that we were not able to be of assistance with your backyard project and appreciate again the review so that we can strive to do better, even in such a crazy year!    Tami

name: Neva Turner
text:
Our experience with Legacy truly deserves 10 stars. From first contact they have been the best company we have ever worked with. Everything was done timely and professionally. Quality is top notch. They have shown quality of work ethic beyond measure. We highly recommend this company. During this difficult time with Covid 19, working with everyone at Legacy has been inspiring and uplifting.
Great company !!

resp.text: Neva, getting to know you and your husband has been one of the highlights of our year.  You are such a pleasure to work for and your appreciation and kindness have not gone unnoticed.  The crew always enjoys working with you on your projects and we look forward to seeing what else you may have in store for your beautiful home!

name: Heather Meacham
text: Paul and Tami are so great to work with.  They pay attention to every detail and our patio is just perfect.  Very professional!!!

resp.text: Heather, it was such a pleasure to work with you on your patio project.  I absolutely love the color of the concrete,  it was an excellent choice.  Thank you again and enjoy your new patio!

name: Jason Comfort
text:
First let me say that my wife and I are extremely pleased with the work.  More importantly, Abraham and his crew were phenomenal.  They were cognizant of the fact that my neighbors and I are all working from home and kept the noise at a minimum.  They went out of their way not to leave a mess after the first day after asking what our HOA restrictions were.  When they were finished, they had filled in the large hole my dogs had dug and placed down a few pieces of sod to cover some bare spots.  Truly outstanding service.

Lastly, when they were finished, and before they left, your team saw one of my neighbors struggling to unload a trailer.  They offered to help unload the heavy item for him.  They were truly great ambassadors for the company.

We have some pretty grand plans for our back yard that will stretch over the next couple of years.  After this experience, I guarantee that we will be reaching back out to Legacy Outdoor Services.

resp.text: Jason, Thank you ever so much for the review!  Your patience as we worked on your project was very much appreciated as the wet weather  makes drainage work even more challenging.  We are very blessed to have great teams working with us and we can't wait to see what else you have in store for your home.  Have a great summer@

name: debi frankowski
text:
We are so pleased with the work that Legacy Outdoor Services just completed at our house.  They installed and sculpted the most beautiful waterfall feature in our mountainside back yard, along with up-lighting that really looks awesome in the evening.  Additionally, they put in a flagstone patio with a gas fire pit, with beautiful natural landscape features and mulch beds all around.  We have had many compliments on it, and it is surprisingly low maintenance too!  We just love it!
We had several unforeseen complications which were out of Legacy's control, related to our gas line installation and inspection,  that Legacy patiently and proactively worked through.  We appreciated their high level of customer service and commitment, and will certainly use them again in the future!

resp.text: Debi, We absolutely loved working with you both!  You have such a nice home and we were so happy to be able to help you design an outdoor living area that accented your already existing hillside.  You have been so very patient as we worked towards getting your gas issue resolved.  Now you can sit back and enjoy all the elements together that make for a very relaxing getaway!

name: Jacquelyn Pletcher
text:
Make sure your quote is EXTREMELY detailed, and that you’re home and watching every step they take for quotes involving construction. Otherwise you’ll end up with new concrete that is uneven (that will forever pool water TOWARDS your home), concrete paint that is already permanently stained with mud BEFORE they leave/finish, deep tracks in your sod because they will drive a concrete truck in your backyard, ground/grass that isn’t graded back the way it was before construction and therefore leaving extremely uneven muddy hills all over your yard, nails and cigarettes in your yard WEEKS after they leave, and a final structure that is uneven, sealed poorly, with paint drips that have dried.

Would not refer.

resp.text: Jacquelyn,  We just wanted to thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to leave us a review.  It is always important for a business to strive to grow in their professionalism and communication skills.  That growth is hindered if someone does not express their concerns that arise during and after a project.  Thank you again!

name: Aurora Marmolejo
text: I had some pavers placed around my back screen porch and a flower bedding put in front of my home. They did awesome work always done within two days and they cleaned the area really good. I highly recommend Legacy outdoor services.

resp.text:
Aurora, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review!  The crews commented on how very kind you were to them while they were working and that means a lot.  We are excited for you to be able to use your new space and look forward to helping you in the future!
Tami

name: Susan Tuck
text: We hired Legacy Outdoor Services for a drainage issue.  We quoted several other companies as well.  Not only did Legacy provide a detailed quote with the scope of work to be performed it was very priced very competitively.  The entire staff is to be commended.  I was kept informed as to when the job would be started without having to follow up.  When the crew arrived they were well prepared and ready to work.  This is by far the best crew I have seen.  They worked extremely well as a team.  This was a messy job to say the least.  The clean up was amazing.  When they left you couldn’t even tell they had been there!  I would highly recommend Legacy for your outdoor needs.

resp.text: Susan, thank you ever so much for the positive feedback.  We appreciate greatly the opportunity to help you with your drainage issues and we are glad that we were able to meet your expectations!

name: Madeline Ortiz
text: Great experience, really pleased with the result Good communication and work complete on time. Definitely will do business again. Highly recommend this business

resp.text: Madeline,  thank you so very much for the positive review.  It was such a pleasure to meet with you and to design a landscape you can enjoy for many years to come!

name: Diane Cooper
text: Legacy Outdoor helped me get a couple of trees planted in my bare back yard.  They look nice and the hummingbirds are already checking the Japanese Maple out.  Tammy and I worked together to find the perfect trees, exactly what I wanted.

resp.text: Diane, you have been so great to work with over the past several years.  We appreciate the opportunity to help you with new projects and look forward to many more in the future.  Thanks again!

name: J M
text: My yard is really uneven in places after having new sod laid and the length of time for them to get my project done is what gives them three stars. Otherwise, they did a good job.

resp.text: Your feedback is greatly appreciated!  This year has been rather frustrating as covid, weather, and supply issues have caused delays that we have not had to deal with in the past.  Nonetheless, we are grateful for your patience and we wish you a safe and healthy rest of the year.

name: JB Robins
text: Legacy Outdoor Services did a most beautiful job landscaping my front yard.  They installed a stone border around my flower beds and perfectly matched the stone with the stone on my house.  They added so much color to my yard with yellow, red and green shrubs and added even more color with flowers.  It is outstanding and I am extremely pleased.  The landscape workers are very professional and polite.  They were always on time and did what they promised each day.  The owner, Tami, came by most days to ensure that I was happy with the way the job was going.  They are very flexible and allowed me to do add-ons as we progressed.  I plan to re-landscape the back yard next and I will be using Legacy.  Their work is excellent!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Jan, thank you so very much for the great review!  We very much enjoyed helping you with your landscape project and we can't wait to see what new ideas you will have for us in the future!

name: Patrick Miller
text: We are very happy with the work that was done. Owners and workers were extremely professional and courteous. Work was done on time and within budget. We can highly recommend this company.

resp.text: Patrick,  it was such a wonderful experience to work with you and your wife on this project.  To be able to add more outdoor area for you to enjoy while adding a functional walkway was our goal.  It was rather hot and your attention to our crew was appreciated.  Again, thank you for your review.

name: Joy Fitzpatrick
text: Loved working with Legacy on my landscaping and hardscaping.  They have a lot of creative ideas and deliver as promised. Their employees were respectful and pleasant to work with. I'll be contacting them again when I install a pergola and some additional projects.

resp.text: Joy,  Thank you so much for the encouraging review!  You had such great ideas that were not like most cookie cutter landscapes you might see.  It was so much fun finding unique plants and I have to admit there are more "tropical" options for this area than I thought.  You are great to work with and I hope that we have the opportunity to help you again in the future.

name: Carol Johnson
text:
We chose Legacy Outdoor Services to implement the first phase of a multi-year landscape plan for our new house. It was an excellent experience all around and we are very, very pleased with the results. Everyone there is a pleasure to work with. Paul walked through the project with us when he did our estimate, and proposed several changes to our designer’s plan that were improved solutions to fix our yard’s drainage challenges. Jessica, the office manager, was always responsive to questions, and Tami did a great job hunting down the plants we selected — which wasn’t that easy in September. When they couldn’t find the specific plants on our plan, she collaborated with us to select acceptable substitutes.
Austin, our project manager, and his crew were wonderful. They are great guys, hard workers, and do an amazing job. Even the installation was a collaborative experience. Austin suggested an additional dry creek bed on the side of the yard to deal with the excess water that funnels into our yard from the neighbor’s driveway. We are looking forward to working with Legacy again next year when we install the next phase of our landscape plan!

resp.text:
Carol, you were such a pleasure to work with and everyone agreed that your design was just beautiful!
We can't wait to see what the next phase has in store.  Thank you again.

name: Dana Williams
text: I had drainage work done and these guys did great. Paul and his crew got on the work quickly and worked hard to complete the job through some very difficult conditions. Austin ran the crew and he was an expert at his work and went well beyond to finish a french drain, grading and downspout pipes to the street. Austin is a fine person to work with as well as his second in charge Abraham.

resp.text: Dana, thank you so very much for the encouraging words!  You are right, sometimes the wet weather makes drainage work rather challenging.  You were both so very patient and helpful during the whole process and we are so very thankful for the opportunity to help you with your drainage issues.

name: Joey Borders
text: If you need landscaping done give Legacy a call. They do all kinds of work, but we personally had hardscaping done. They came out, viewed our patio, designed a new layout, tweaked it a few times to get it within our budget, and completed the work. I even reached out to several other companies in the beginning stages. Legacy gave us the best design with the best cost. We worked with David the majority of the time. He and the company are professional. Extremely courteous and will answer any questions/concerns. Two thumbs up.

resp.text: Joey,  We absolutely loved your design, it was unique and functional for your family.  You were such a pleasure to work with and we appreciate the opportunity to help you with your hardscape project.  Have a great spring!

name: Diane Moore
text: Legacy Outdoor Services has a great team of people and are so easy to work with.  We hired them to do some ground prep work before we installed our above ground pool.  The workers were very courteous, polite, and always showed up on time.  We couldn’t have asked for a better job and highly recommend them!

resp.text: Diane, thank you ever so much for letting us know about your experience!  As always, it was a pleasure working with you and we look forward to more projects in the future!

name: Lisa
text: Legacy Outdoor Services is the only service of this type that I will use.  They have done multiple projects for me over the course of the last few years.  Their workers are always respectful and courteous. As a woman with workers on my property, that is very important to me.  They truly go the extra mile in making sure that I am completely satisfied with their work.  Whenever the opportunity arises, I am happy to recommend Legacy to anyone who needs work done, and I do so with the utmost confidence in the caliber of work that they will provide.

resp.text:
Ms. Lisa,
It has been the utmost pleasure to work with you on all of your projects.  Your ideas are unique and beautiful and it has been a wonderful experience bringing those ideas to life.  Customer relations is very important and we are so grateful for the opportunity to be involved in meeting your expectations.

name: Tami McGhee
text: I chose Legacy Outdoor Services for a flower bed landscaping project last year and recently for a drainage project.  The owner, office staff and workers were all very knowledgeable, professional and a pleasure to work with.  I was very pleased with the work as well as the follow-up to ensure my satisfaction with the projects.

resp.text: Tami,  It was such a pleasure helping you with your project!  Drainage issues can be overwhelming and costly if not taken care of, we are so very pleased that we were able to help you with your issues and look forward to any future projects you may have.

name: Ch Carter
text: Called and tried to get an estimate to install landscaping in the rear of our newly purchased home and we're told we're outside " Legacy's service area" I wasn't looking for weekly lawn service I was searching for a one time landscape install.  Their website says they provide this type of service, and their office says they service parts of Owens Cross Roads, but don't cover where  I live in Meridianville.  A check of Google maps shows it's basically the same travel distance.  Must be nice to be doing so well that Legacy can afford to turn down a job, sight unseen.

resp.text: Thank you for your response.  You are correct in that we have a set distance of service from our location.  When our office is given an address of service, we then check to see if that address is within the distance we have set for our service area.  Each address is unique and may fit into our service area whether it be in Owens Cross Roads or Meridianville.  It is necessary to have perimeters in order to provide the most cost effective price for both our potential customers and our company.  Good Luck on your project.

name: Mike Gordon
text: Don't bother calling them if you are locating over the mountain in the Hampton Cove area. They even say they serve the "Huntsville" area, but I guess not. I'll take my business elsewhere.

resp.text: Mike, thank you for your feedback. You are correct in that we have a set distance of service from our location. When our office is given an address of service, we then check to see if that address is within the distance we have set for our service area. Each address is unique and may fit into our service area whether it be in Huntsville or Hampton Cove. It is necessary to have perimeters in order to provide the most cost effective price for both our potential customers and our company. Good Luck on your project.

name: Grant Patten
text: Amazing work! Went above and beyond, we were very satisfied. We had them come out for lawn service / hedge trimming / tree trimming / bush removal as well as lawn mowing, and we would definitely use Legacy Outdoor Services again in the future.

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing us to help you with your project!

name: Mark Bailey
text: I had Legacy install a partial fence for our backyard.  The work was performed quickly and well done.  Very satisfied.

resp.text: Mark,  Thank you ever so much for allowing us to help you with your fence project.  We know you will enjoy the privacy for many years to come!

name: Wes G Smith
text: I would not use this contractor again, nor would I recommend them to anyone else.  They did a drainage project for me where I explicitly described the design I wanted and it incorporated solid PVC pipe.  On the day of the job, the workers showed up with corrugated pipe.  When I called the owner, he stated that PVC would be $800 more, so feeling like I didn't want to start over with another contractor, I told him to go ahead.  Then I found out that a portion of the water to be drained to the street running from the downspout  was going through perforated corrugated pipe (pipe with holes).  They assured me that the water would be moving and would not leak out into already saturated ground (yeah, right).  Then I came home to find that the grate to catch water coming off the sidewalk was about 1 and a half to 2 inches away from the sidewalk, requiring the water to run over dirt before entering the grate.  The owner tried to tell me that it would be no problem and the bare dirt would not erode despite water constantly running over it.  I insisted that concrete be put between the sidewalk and grate to keep the water from washing out the dirt.  When I came home, I found they had used a type of caulk between the grate and the sidewalk, and had done a messy job of it, I don't know if that much caulk will ever cure.  After two days it is still soft.  Additionally, where they cut through the curb, the re-concreting was extremely poorly done.  It looked like they didn't even use a trowel, much less a curbing tool.  It looked like they basically packed the concrete on with their fingers and left it.  Part of the contract called for doing a brick border along the sidewalk.  After I paid them for the portion of the contract for the drainage, they informed me that they were waking away from the contract and that I needed to find someone else to do the edging.  The pity is, the subcontractor they had lined up to do the masonry work actually sounded very competent.  Bottom line, this is a company that, in my opinion, cut corners at every opportunity, poorly designed the project, provided shoddy workmanship, and then walked away with nearly half of the contracted work unperformed.

name: Matthew Buxton
text: My experience with Legacy Outdoor Services was great from start to finish. Austin and his crew did a great job, furthermore everything was cleaned up before they left.

resp.text: Matthew,  It was such a pleasure working with you on your project!  Austin and the crew were so very thankful for your help during the process and we are so happy we were able to help you with your drainage issues!

name: Cindy McCrary
text: Very satisfied with the landscaping and drainage work Legacy has done at our house.  Their honest and friendly crew was always a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Cindy, thank you so much for allowing us to help you with your projects.  It has been such a pleasure to be able to work with you over these past several years!

name: Carey Rosenblum
text: Legacy outdoor has serviced my home grounds for several years. They installed a designed row of arborvite trees along my rear property line that are very healthy and provide a natural green screen of privacy. Otherwise they have come out annually to do some re-mulching in my flowerbeds and have given them thst extra spark in appearance. If you have some landscaping issues or need suggestions I would recommend them. They are honest and do good work.

name: Jennifer Benavides
text: Dependable, honest and hardworking! Thank you Legacy for a great job once again.

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you so much for allowing us to help you with your project.  Can't wait to see what your next project will bring!

name: matt demuro
text:
This company gave me probably the worst experience that I have had with a company that has done work for me. I contracted with them to do drainage work, a sprinkler system and landscape lighting.

I was told this would take 3 weeks to complete, with each phase occurring on consecutive weeks. The project as a whole took almost 12 weeks to complete, and this was only because I hounded them with calls multiple times per week.

The drainage work was the first part, it seemed to be fine, though the French drain was not placed the complete length that was discussed originally. Also the fingers of river rich were put in to stop erosion, but almost no grass seed was put in afterwards, so nothing but weeds grew in between the river rock.

The second piece was the sprinkler system. This was put in during a day, but the ground was not backfilled properly and they needed to come back out to fix it. We were told that they would put down grass seed after the lighting job was completed. The lighting work was not completed for another 8 weeks, and there wasn’t any seed put down afterwards. They were also supposed to aerate and oversees the lawn, but since they could not get their mower into our backyard, they told us they would come back with a smaller mower to pull the aerator later. This never happened.

I had to call them 2-3 times a week for 8 weeks to get them to complete the lighting. Part of it was landscape lighting, the other portion was putting in a fan and spotlight in/on our screened patio. The wiring was placed so shallow, that it came out of the ground within a week and they had to come back to fix. The light and fan was supposed to be put in by an electrician, but was just put in by the owner and his friend. They put a cheap conduit over the electrical wire that didn’t even cover the wire.  They sent an electrician out to fix the wiring, but he just rigged another kind of conduit on the bare wire to cover it up.  The uplighting for the trees was sold to us at $65 a light. I just found the lights online for $45 for a 4-pack of lights.

We just gave up with this company and figured we would just be stuck with this work. Over the last year, I kept burying and covering up the wire as it came out of the ground and have been trying to repair the grass in the area where they did sprinkler and drainage work. We are still fighting massive weeds from the lack of follow through on planting grass after their work was completed.

I am writing this review today after I just finished replacing 3 lights that stopped working and half of the wiring that was put in for the landscape lights. Turns out they believe that wire nuts are not necessary and you only need to tape wires together with electrical tape before putting it in the ground.

If you are looking for a company to do landscaping work for you, stay very far away from this company. You will only be sorry if you choose them.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing all of this to our attention.  Unfortunately scheduling can be a challenge when dealing with different elements and sometimes issues arise.  For example the drainage was delayed due to an unmarked water pipe, flooding the drainage trenches.   The ceiling fan was installed by a certified electrician, as was the wiring for the fan, flood lights and outdoor switch.  We would be more than happy to provide the name of the electricians that provided these services.   The contract states that there is a year warranty covering defects in workmanship and materials.   Is regrettable that we did not have the opportunity to fix the issues that you were having with your lights, thus alleviating some of your frustration.  If we had only known of the issues we would have been more than happy to fulfill the contact’s one year warranty.  Again thank you for your comments and we will take them all into consideration to better our services.

name: Stephen Rice
text: I highly recommend Legacy Outdoor Services. Our neighbors compliment our yard all the time and these guys have helped with minor and complex issues on our property. We trust them 100% and most of all, they are super professional for a service company.

resp.text:
Mr. Rice,
It has been a pleasure working with you and we appreciate the opportunity to meet your lawn care needs.

name: Jim Wittenborg
text: I would like to have used this company for a drainage installation job, however, when I called and gave my address (near Hampton Cove), I was told that I lived too far away for their business.  I guess companies just don't go that "extra mile" for business anymore.

name: Richard Brown
text: Good company to work with

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing Legacy to help you with all of your projects.  It is always a pleasure to spend time with you both!

name: Ricky R.
text:
Very professional and friendly team.  Quick to respond and flexible. Highly recommend.

J&H Tree service made cutting 50 ft pines, look easy.  Keep up the great work.

name: Kitty Cobb

name: Barbaracarol 4

name: Wade Becnel
text: Josh and his professional team did a great job. This was repeat business for me since I hired them several years ago to remove several large trees in my yard and they continue to provide quality support. Strongly recommend them for any job you may have.

We always go above and beyond for all of our clients! Let us know when you need some more work done and we will be happy to provide you with our services again!

name: Tyler Campbell
text: Did a great job cutting down two dead trees I had in my yard. Worked with me to minimize damage on my yard with moving the equipment in and out. Did the job very quickly and left it in a clean state. Good follow through on answering calls and texts as we planned out the work.

resp.text: Thank you Tyler for your review! We take our profession very serious and communication is very important to me. name: Aj Ja
text: I highly recommend J&H Tree Service. I received a free quote on Monday (was happy with quote) and on Tuesday J&H was at my home removing limbs and a tree from my yard. They were all very professional and friendly. I will definitely be using J&H Tree Service in the future!!

text: Would definitely not recommend.  Not reliable at all. They did a good job cutting down a few trees but they left  huge piles all over our property.   When I call about making this better he just says someone is going to come back out but they never do. Save your money and use another company

text: Josh came to give a quote the same day that I called for one. He and his crew showed up early the NEXT morning and  the job was completed that day. Which made me very happy. And it was not a small job!! I highly recommend!!

name: robin yelverton
text: Josh and his crew did a great job taking down trees at my family’s property. We had a little communication issue at the beginning but once we got that straight, all my issues were taken care of promptly. I would call Josh again if I needed some trees down.

resp.text: Thank you Robin for that review and choosing us to do your work! I apologize for the lack of communication in the beginning and happy that we have another satisfied customer! We have a high volume of text, e-mail & phone calls everyday and we try to stay up to date with all of our customers. We hope that you use our services again in the future!

name: Gail Clements
text: They came and cut down two large trees.  One was cut up and removed.  The other was left and Josh said they would come back and remove it.  He was paid for both trees and the contract included removal.  After almost two months with no response, Dixie Tree Service removed the tree.  I would not ever recommend J&H or ever use them again.

name: John Griffin
text: We hired Josh in May, 2020 to remove 6 trees and grind the stumps. He came out to our home on a Friday to do the job, cut down three trees, and called us to see if we would be willing to meet him with payment, saying, "we are going to stay out here until the job is done." He cashed our check THAT DAY and never came back. We tried for months to get him to come back out, but he always had some excuse and would not return our money. We are in the process of suing him to retrieve our funds. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE WE MADE.

name: Theresa Long
text: One of our largest trees got uprooted during the hurricane.  The tree was leaning over our pool and home posing a real hazard.  J & H tree service came out gave us a quote, showed up when they said they would, did an amazing, professional job safely! What impressed us the most was the attention to detail they showed in ensuring our belongs and home were not damaged and the property was left very clean!! Well worth the money- they have my highest recommendation!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for that awesome review! I am so honored to get that review and we take our profession very serious. We look at every angle before starting a project and make sure we explain everything to the customer before performing the services rendered. Safety & professionalism is very big with us and we always pay attention to detail. I'm looking forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Kimberle Lindsey
text: The company did a great job for us removing two stumps in our back yard!

resp.text: Thank you Kimberle for the review! We always make sure we grind our stumps 6-8" below grade and clean up all of the wood chips. We hope you use us again in the future!

name: Mary Davison
text: I would highly recommend this company to anyone. After hurricane Michael we had some trees come down and we called J&h. They were very professional and responded right away. resp.text: Thank you so much Mary for your review! I have alot of pride in my team and we work until the job is done! We are very dedicated to our job and strive for great customer service! We are looking forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: PEARL EASTER-WILSON
text: J & H is a very customer oriented, professional and safety focused business.  The company specializes in large tree removal, storm damage removal, clearing property and crane services but also does other services such a laying cement, demolition and lawn care and restoration. The team is highly trained and skilled in operating heavy equipment such as cranes in open and fenced in areas.    They removed trees in my yard that were almost six feet in diameter, very tall and full without any disturbances to adjoining properties or fences.  Prices are very reasonable for the quality of work provided.  Their work ethics are impeccable; they were on time each day, courteous and never left a messy area.  All tree stumps were completely grind down and all debris removed.  I highly recommend this company.

resp.text: I am absolutely honored to get such a great review such as this one! It makes me feel very good knowing that I am gaining another completely satisfied customer! Thank you Pearl Wilson for your business! J&H Tree Service prides ourselves on superior work ethics and safety is our #1 goal on every job. We specialize in dangerous tree Removal such as the job we just done for you and glad it was a 100% success! Can't wait to do some more work for you again in the future!

name: Zachary Marden

They knocked it all out the next day before a large storm came through and knocked other limbs down in my neighborhood.  I couldn't recommend these guys enough!

We are happy that we were able to provide our services to you and look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

resp.text: Thank you so much Judy for the fantastic review! We want our customers to have a great experience with us and pride ourselves on professionalism and 100% customer satisfaction! Very happy to earn your business again in the future!

text: Kudos to J&H tree services. Absolutely great job! Very professional and customer-oriented with reasonable prices. resp.text: Thank you Ana for your review! We are thrilled that you are happy with our services! We are looking forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Jamie Goodman
text: Great company to use for tree removal.  J & H helped us the morning after hurricane Michael with a fallen tree that was at risk of hitting our house.   We called J and H again to remove 2 trees in our front yard, and trim limbs the back yard so our grass would grow.  Josh is very professional.  He keeps his word, does great work, and does not leave any limbs or leaves behind.  We will use J and H anytime we need to remove or trim trees in our yard.

We are very meticulous about our clean up and go above and beyond for our customers! We pride ourselves on professionalism and provide excellent customer service! We want a great experience for our customers! Thank you again for the continued business and we look forward to doing business again with you in the future!

name: Andrew Bath
text: Josh at J&H Tree Service was great to work with! Once he and his team started they had the trees removed that were a danger to our building in no time! We greatly appreciate their hard work, quality, and service!

We do our very best to provide our customers with top notch quality service. We hope that you use our services again in the future!

name: Chris B
text: Highly recommended. I've used three different companies for tree services since I've moved to Dothan in the last 1.5 years. J&H is the only one I would recommend, which is why I have used them three different times already and will again in the future. They provide high quality work and great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much Chris for great review! I am very thankful that you continue to keep using J&H Tree Service. We love all of our customers and we take great pride in professionalism and giving our customers 100% customer satisfaction and leaving them with a great work experience. We go above and beyond for our customers and try to help out anyway we can. Our customers are #1 and we will continue to go by that standard! We want to thank you again for the business and look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Robert Allen
text:
I arranged for J&H to do some pruning and tree removal in my Mom's yard in Dothan. I set up the original appointment via e-mail. I live 5 time zones away and coordinated the work for the week I was at my Mom's. Josh came by, gave me an estimate, and recommended removal of two trees. Both were close to the house, one was a 50-ft oak tree.  Josh was able to reschedule a day earlier than he originally projected.

About 6 hours of work, and the tree felling operations went flawlessly dropping right between house and fence. The crew was professional, Josh was personally meticulous about cleaning and power blowing yard clean, especially around pool. Josh owns and runs this business and of course will be saturated with calls after severe weather events.  That's why I elected to have the work done on my schedule, not Mother Nature's. I had some questions after the work was completed and Josh provided timely responses and follow up to my questions. I'd hire him again.

resp.text: Thanks Robert we really appreciate the review.

name: Rick McCleskey
text:
My first impression and review was only one star since they failed to show up or call with a reason for not showing up to give an estimate on tree removal,,,not once, but twice.
EDIT:  Several days later, they called, made an appointment for an estimate and showed up on time.  Their price quote was fair and less than others I had received so they were hired.
Due to weather and additional trees downed, what was supposed to be a 3 day job  has turned into 5 .   J &H has been great.. They've had as many as 10 to.12 workers here at one time and ALL were very polite and hard working. I'm impressed with the personnel and equipment they have.
I can honestly say,  I'm happy with their work and I'm very picky.  Josh and his personnel are the best and you won't be disappointed if you hire them.. Just be patient if can't get in touch with them right away.

Called them a second time and the prices were now out of sight.

resp.text: Thank you Rick for giving us the opportunity to work for you! We are very thankful and glad that you are satisfied! We take pride on professionalism and great customer service! We are looking forward to doing more business with you again in the future!

A professional company should be on time and provide 100% communication to the customer as we do just that. We are greatful for the business and looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

text: I just dropped their service. They treated my yard for a year and a half and it looks worse than it did when they started. A waste of money!

resp.text: Hi Justin, we're sorry to hear this. If you're interested, we'd like to make it right. You're welcome to contact us via email at jandrus@spring-green.net. Thank you!

name: April Copeland
text: I have Bermuda grass and I have never seen so many vines and weeds. If that is part if the process then ok but I have called them out several times and to me all I got was excuses. I doing my yard maintenance myself from now on.

resp.text: April, we apologize for the recent negative experience you've had with us. Our records indicate that your lawn has not been treated since 3/25 as you had cancelled your service. Prior to that, our technicians had explained to you that your lawn had standing water, runoff, and water control problems. This matter is being handled offline. Should you need anything else, please reach out to your local Spring Green office at (334) 363-2237.

name: Jae Park
text:
I can go on details on how bad this company service is and how irresponsible they are. I been with them for several year. I came to conclusion of  “ find another company “
Worthless service. Horrible attitudes from staff. Ghosting many phone calls and compalints.

resp.text: Jae we apologize you had this experience with Spring-Green. We have contacted our local franchise and they have informed us they have reached out to you in efforts to accommodate you. This matter is being handled offline and you should direct your communication to the Opelika office.

text:
it is terrible service!  I ordered service for a year when I cancel that they till mail me bill again and again! they also sent profit recovery again.

It’s no wonder why everybody uses Skywalker Tree Services. I’ll definitely use them again! #Skywalker #TreeService #TreeRemoval

Beaver Tree Service arrived when they told me with a professional crew and equipment. I am very pleased with the way the tree appears and the service provided.

I cannot thank Beaver Tree Service enough for their tireless efforts and hard work to remove a 70 ft. tree that fell against my house. I was amazed how well they cleaned up our yard…Like it never happen… a quote from Chuck Bomhard…He’s a man of his word.
When I was doing my homework trying to find a reputable Tree Service mainly due to the enormous
Size of the tree that fell against my house and there was several other large trees that not cut down correctly could land on my neighbor’s house.  Can you image if I had hired some cheap outfit and they hit my neighbor’s house… what would happen…I probably be paying out of pocket to fix my neighbors house’s.
That my friend is what lead me to hire Beaver Tree Service they are the real deal; Licensed, Insured and Bonded. I needed the peace of mind that I was protected.

What will bring me back to Beaver Tree Service…Trust, Honesty and Integrity.

Thank you so much you are a God sent,

W. Sims, Ozark, AL.

name: Terry Plummer
text:
I had a large Oak tree that I feared was rotten in the middle, as I had seen a couple of trees in our area blown over in a storm, and they were rotten in the middle. This tree was huge, the diameter of the tree was 4 1/2 ft. I had no idea how you'd take a tree this huge down.
Beaver Tree Service used ropes and a climber to climb up in the tree and drop the huge branches for a controlled fall. When the climber was up in the tree you could see just how large those branches were. They didn't look that big looking up at them from the ground. The branches were as big, or bigger than a man's body. It was a pleasure watching the crew work.
I also asked for the stump to be ground. For a tree that big they have a sophisticated stump grinder. They did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you so much Terry for rating us so highly and for writing such a nice review. It was a pleasure working with you. Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

text:
We lost a big part of a Bradford Pear to a windstorm, and the pros at Beaver Tree came out the day after we called - in no time at all, the tree was down, and there wasn't any mess for us to clean up. Great job at a very reasonable price. They're Chamber of Commerce members, and that made them easy to find! If we ever need tree work in the future, we'll be calling Beaver Tree Service!

Beaver Tree Service is a simple phone call away, and they do great work. They just finished a major project for us, and they left our place looking great. This was their third visit since the first one about a year ago, and I wish I could give them six stars!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this very kind review for us.  Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

name: Ron Wagner
text: Chuck and his crew did a fantastic job with the task we contracted with them to do.  Communication was always prompt (a rarity in the Wiregrass with contractors), the work completed was professionally done, Beaver Tree Service cleaned up the area to my complete satisfaction, they did it unobtrusively, and with a friendly attitude.  Will definitely recommend and use again if needed.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ron for rating us and writing such a very nice review.  Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

Warren and Rhonda Bowron

resp.text: Thank you so much Rhonda for rating us and writing such a very nice review.  Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

text:
Beaver Tree service is a great family owned, local business who's dedication to customer satisfaction is second to none! Great interaction with both Chuck and Dylan, who are extremely professional, courteous, and knowledgeable

I made a unique request to purchase 18 rustic wooden center pieces for an upcoming wedding, and Chuck was immediately accommodating of the inquiry. Discussing preferential wood species, sizes, and price. All handled over the phone, and to the specifications needed. 24 hours later the order was fulfilled and I ( and especially my fiancé) couldn't be happier!

Thank you!!

I would highly recommend Beaver Tree services to friends and family alike!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kit for rating us and writing such a very nice review.  Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

name: Brenda Breland Sims
text: Having noticed that the Beaver Tree Service crew was working in our neighborhood, my husband engaged them in conversation and asked them to give us an estimate on work that needed to be done on our property. They were knowledgeable and courteous and gave us what we considered to be an excellent price. The work was done well and in a timely manner over the course of a couple of days. They trimmed two large pines exactly to my husband's specifications and were even careful to move a Christmas decoration that was under the pines to ensure that it would not be damaged by any falling limbs. They took down a dying oak tree that was very close to our house and to our neighbor's fence. They expertly removed it without damaging either one and were extremely conscientious in removing all debris from our yard and our neighbor's yard. We would recommend them without hesitation.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brenda for rating us and writing such a very nice review.  Please let us know if we can help you again in the future.

I cannot state how pleased I am with the job they did. They were fast, efficient and courteous. To me, when I deal with a contractor, integrity is paramount. This is the ONLY company I found that operates that way.

If you need tree work done, do not call anyone other than Ogle Tree Service. As an added bonus, they have multiple arborists on staff. The only reason I give 5 stars is because 6 or higher is not available.

text: Owner came over the day I called and gave a quote. Then showed up with 4 employees to knock the job out quickly. Fair price did a great job cleaning up the mess. Will use them again.

name: S. Shackelford
text:
I cannot say enough how pleased I am that I contacted Hug'em and Cut'em Tree Service to take care of my sick, split, HUGE oak tree.

I live in a neighborhood with small 1/4 acre lots, and this tree shaded (and threatened to fall on) 4 other back yards.

The first tree service I called proposed a plan that didn't seem quite right. I searched for an arborist on Angie's List to get a 2nd opinion and Angie recommended Hug'em and Cut'em Tree Service. Tim, the owner, came out right away to assess the damage to the tree. He took the time to explain why the tree split, why it could not be saved and how the damage could have been avoided.

I felt like I was in good hands. Tim is someone you'd want to have as a brother or close friend. He explained the situation, came up with a plan, and everything he said he would do, he did. He has an awesome crew and they did great work.  I'm extremely happy with the outcome and would recommend Hug'em and Cut'em Tree Service without hesitation.

* Note: If I had called Tim a few years earlier, he could have recommended ways to save the tree.  So if you're in doubt, check Tim out.

name: Jim Buckley
text: Professional service all the way. He has the staff and equipment to do the job. Does the work for a very fair and reasonable price. Does not take advantage of the situation. A locally owned company with a vested interest in our area. Highly recommend.

text: Tim is on time an does everything he says he will do an will go the extra mile to make sure job is right .You want a company that stands behind there work an will do the job right the first time your in the right place . Call tim he the best in the business.

text: This company is absolutely Professional and they do very good Quality work which is hard to find often, but Arbor Pro has cut down three trees already in my yard and they have always done a Honest and Fair pricing Job! Thank you Arbor Pro!!

name: Kendrea Adams
text: If I could give them zero stars I would. I called them because I had a tree fall on my storage house my insurance company told me to find a professional tree cutting service. The guy said he would come out and give me a quote. After a week he never came. I called back he said he came by but the gate was locked. The first lie was he came by because I have cameras around my home he never once came. The second lie was the gate was locked. When I had spoken with him he told me to leave the gate unlocked and I unlocked it immediately after I got off the phone with him even though I leave the gate locked for safety reason because I have a pool in the backyard. I called back again and asked could they come by  he said he would and still again he never showed up and never even called to say that he couldn’t make it. So I called back again the next following week and another guy answered the phone and said he would talk to the guy that was supposed to come by to give me an estimate and would call me back and let me know something. I have yet to receive a call from either of them a whole month later. They have the worse customer service ever and I honestly don’t see how they are still in business.

text: Well for starters they did work at my house without ever speaking to me & I'm the homeowner. The owner told me they typically knock and let someone know however he didnt on this occassion. I didnt authorize this job and didnt know this was not paid for until the owner come to my house demanding he be paid, which was understood, however I had no idea what was going on! I went on to tell him that I would pay it.  A week or so later he told me my husband called but he hadnt called him back. I called 2 weeks later to find out if it was paid and spoke to "ALI" and left a message for him to call me which he never did so I assumed he didnt because it had been taken care of. So he comes to my home and dumps a bunch of garbage in my yard! Even though that is illegal I'll let it go this time, and I ask him if he got my message and the only thing he said was he did not get paid.well, if you would have returned your phone calls you would have been. Very unprofessional I'm the handling of things especially when I would have paid you out of kindness when I didnt even authorize your work!

text: They did such a great job on removing several trees for me and grinding them also. Our backyard looks so much bigger! I will definitely use them again when I need more trees cut down! They were affordable, timely, and cleaned everything up after the job. Highly recommend!

name: Jack Harrington
text: Today was the second time to use Mike's Tree Service. This time he removed 3 trees, (1 pine about 75-80  feet tall and 2 large hardwoods). Because of the recent rains I was concerned about my lawn being damaged, but he laid 4 x 8 sheets of plywood for his equipment which prevented damage. What also made a difference was the use of a tractor/loader instead of a skid steer. Very pleased with his work including clean-up before leaving. Very competitive pricing.

name: Charmaine Young
text: This is a fantastic and professional company. The came in, removed 7 trees and hauled everything away in 2 hours. Workers were professional and worked well together!

name: Janelle Bonnett
text: We highly recommend Mike"s Tree Service and his crew. They worked quickly and efficiently for us August 26,2020 as they cut down and removed 6 trees on our property. The crew of workers showed up on time with all the big equipment necessary to get the job done and they were finished in about 3 hours. The crew was very respectful, hard working, and efficient at each task needed to complete the job. We were not anxious about the job once we saw how professional they worked. And the price was very reasonable. So what could have been a very tense time was a very relaxed time.  We are very appreciative, Mike, for you and your great crew! We will definitely use you again.  Janelle & Danny Bonnett

name: William Thomas
text: We had Mikes Tree Service come look at removing four trees and agreed on a price and date.  They showed up a month and half late and were very rude and destructive.  They drove their oversized boom truck on and destroyed our brick pavers.  The truck was too big and could not make a turn.  They said they would then need to drive through our landscaped yard and did not have the mats to protect our sprinkler system.  After destroying our pavers we asked if there was smaller equipment available.  Mike then raised his voice and said he was the professional and if we did not like what he was proposing he would leave.  We said we did not want him to destroy our landscaping.  He just just turned to his crew and to them to pack up and leave.  I would not recommend Mike’s Tree Services to anyone other than forestry applications.  Terrible professionalism.

text: This is the third time I have used Mike’s Tree Service and once for my mother. The crew he has is professional, they work well together, are fast, safe, prompt and did an excellent job of cutting 10 trees, large limbs, one tall pine tree and clean up! Thanks for a job well done.  I highly recommend Mike’s Tree Service.

text: We used Mike’s Tree Service to have a half dozen large pine trees cut down.  They also cut down 4 large pines in my neighbor’s yard.  Most of the trees were near the houses and could have easily damaged the house or a fence.  They gave us a very good quote.  They showed up with a crew of 3 and started working promptly at 8 AM on the day they said they would arrive.  It took them two days to remove all the trees and stumps.  I was very impressed when they completed the work.  I don’t think there was any sign that they had been there except that the trees were gone.  I did not even see any pinecones left behind.  I would gladly use them again.  It is refreshing to find a company that will exceed your expectations.

An Angie's List Review:

text: I had Twilleys cut down 4 large trees and since I live in town wasn’t sure how they were gonna do it and not effect my neighbors property but the roped the sections cut them and brought them straight down with power lines and cable lines close by. It was amazing to watch since one of my trees was was about 60 ft high they cleaned up and even planted some grass in places where the ground was disturbed. Would definitely use them again.

text: Chris and his guys showed up when he said they would. Good communication through out, he did exactly what I wanted done and priced to please. Don't hesitate going with Twilley.

name: Traci Manning
text: We had dangerous trees in a tight, hard to access backyard after Hurricane Sally. Chris & crew were great. Safely removed the trees without any more damage and they were friendly & reasonably priced as well. Really impressed with the skill & attention to safety on the job. Thanks for being our hurricane heroes!

resp.text: Thanks

name: C D
text: These guys were awesome! They were very responsive and came right out to get the job done. They made tree removal look like a cake walk! I would definitely use them again.

text: Mr Twilley and his employees were very effecient at their job and friendly and polite as well.He quoted us a very fair price when so many others in our area were price gouging residents after Hurricane Sally hit. Finally, someone who does what they say they're going to do. Thank you Twilley Tree Service!

name: Scottye Bryant
text: Tree Stump Grinding. This is the most amazing thing I have ever seen.  Tony with Economy Stump Grinding was fabulous. He called to say he was a few minutes out. The price was good. He was done in as little as 20 minutes because his machine is capable of quick work. It is something to watch. It is a remote controlled beast. He was so friendly and seemed to really care about his work and that I was happy with it. I read on his website that he is an ER nurse and has this business on the side. You can tell he is a caring person. He only does stumps. We had checked with others but he came highly recommended and gave us a good price. We will definitely use him again. I  highly recommend Tony with Economy Stump Grinding.

resp.text: Scottye, thank you for your kind words about our services. We'll continue to be here for you should anything else come up. -Economy Stump Removal

name: Thomas Burns
text: When you are sick bad you let a medical expert handle the problem.  If you have a stump that needs removal, you need to let Tony (ER Nurse) handle the problem.  He communicated well ahead of time and was even concerned about my yard given it had rained recently.  He showed up on time and went above and beyond to tackle a massive stump so I cannot even tell a tree was at this location.  He went over the spot multiple times to ensure he got every bit of the stump and went deep to ensure no tips were exposed.  Excellent work ethic with a fabulous machine that can tackle any size tree stump.  Highly recommend Tony!!

resp.text: Thomas, thank you so much for your strong recommendation of our stump removal services! It was no problem going above and beyond to tackle the stump, and we'd do it all over again if needed. We'll continue to be here for you should anything else come up. All the best! -Economy Stump Removal

Fast good work. Remained safe and went above and beyond grinding an older stump next to the one we asked for.
Highly recommend them.

resp.text: Gebran, thank you for your support! -Economy Stump Removal

name: Ward Slager
text:
I almost don't have words to express how well the work has been done, how well we've been treated and how competitive the cost was!

After major tree removal, landscape improvement work and pine beetle problems, we had upwards of two dozen stumps needing to be dealt with for cosmetic, access (to our barn) and land stewardship reasons. Tony and Veronica and Tony's incredible expertise with his "wifi" stump grinder were truly a GOD-send. He not only did the "big stuff" expertly, he also decimated a bunch of little stumps here and there as he moved about our 3 1/2 acres of woods. AND, he did it a week earlier than expected which doubled the blessing. AND he did it with relatively minimal "side effects" (e.g. disturbing surrounding soil with the movement of his grinder).

Tony is one of those hard-working, small business experts that is the heart and soul of what makes America and, especially, Alabama not just the home of the brave but also of the free. I heartily recommend ESR and welcome giving anyone a personal recommendation (including a "come and see" - if you're in the area).

Keep up the good work. We've not only been blessed to know a business we can depend on but also to have made new friends!

resp.text: Ward, good service, professional work, and affordable costs is what we're here for! No one likes an unsightly stump, especially more than one, so we're glad we could help you out with removing these from your property. If there's ever anything you need in the future, don't hesitate to reach out and we'll be there for you. -Economy Stump Removal

text: Tony was quick to respond and was available to grind multiple stumps for us just a few days later. The prices were easy to understand and very reasonable. It was also fun to watch him work his “remote control” stump grinder. Thanks Tony!

name: Danielle McDavid
text: I contacted Tony and needed some quick help with getting a stump removed. I had workers already out and putting up a fence and of course the stump was right in the installers pathway. He told me he could come out the next day and remove it. Which he did! He is prompt, efficient, kind, and gives good quotes. Give him a call. You’ll be very pleased.

name: Max Martian
text: Exceptional! Tony was so courteous and friendly. He did amazing work so fast. We called several tree cutting companies and none of them wanted to be bothered with stumps. Tony’s service is just stumps! He texted/called before he arrived. Arrived on time. His machine has the ability to squeeze into a small space so it fit within my 42” fence opening. Took him maybe 20 minutes total to do 2 stumps. He cleaned off our driveway with a leaf blower as well! Nothing short of exceptional. I highly and emphatically recommend Tony with Economy Stump Removal. A+

text: If anyone is looking for stump removal, Tony Camardella is the guy. He was very professional, on time and upfront with what the costs would be.  He was extremely thorough and even checked back a couple weeks later to make sure that he removed it all. You would be doing yourself a favor by giving this guy a call.  Thanks Tony I appreciate you.

resp.text: Spence, thank you so much for your recommendation of our stump removal team. It was our pleasure to provide thorough service for you. Let us know if there's anything we can do for you in the future! Best. -Economy Stump Removal

name: Jennifer Mann
text: Tony arrived on time and let me know when he was close. He knocked out several stumps in short work. He has honest and fair pricing. Friendly and helpful to work with. Highly recommend. It was fun to watch him work with his remote control grinder.

name: Kristian Walvatne
text: Tony was awesome. Very kind and a joy to deal with. their pricing is up front and from what i can tell, an extreme value to everyone else.
