text: Tony did a fabulous job on my two very large stumps. Was in and out in 1 hr . Very nice to deal with a very reasonable and respectful of property.

text: Wonderful, on time, professional and courteous. I highly recommend this service!

name: April Tucker
text: Tony is awesome. Very professional, responded quickly after we called him. Showed up right on time and did a great job. Highly recommend.

name: Hannah Austen
text: Contacted Tony about 5 smaller stumps close to our house we had left over from bushes we cut down. He called me that morning and was at our house the same afternoon to take care of them for us. Very professional and even made sure to show our kids where they could safely stand to watch the action. He charged exactly what he said he would and we are so glad we decided to hire him for the job!

name: Timothy Richey
text: Tony did a really great job

name: J Adams
text: Tony and Lee arrived right on time and got right to work. They both were very conscientious about items in the yard near the stumps such as under ground sprinklers, lighting or drains. Making sure to avoid these items. They are both very nice, polite and easy to work with. Good quality work and more than fair prices. I highly recommend Tony and would definitely use his services again.

name: Lauren Walker
text: We moved into our home a year and a half ago and finally got around to removing two eyesore stumps in our front yard. I stumbled upon Economy Stump Removal on the internet, and I'm so thankful I did! Within a week of contacting Tony, the stumps are gone. He was wonderful to work with. Within 30 minutes, both stumps (one just over a foot long, and one almost 5 feet long along a concrete driveway) were gone, and it only took that long because we were enjoying conversation so much! Plus, he ended up charging $75 less than his original estimate because he said the big stump came down easy - this is even with his already incredibly reasonable prices. Anyway, I'm a happy camper, and now if anyone I know needs a stump removed, I can say "I have a guy for that!"

name: Frankie Downs
text: Great to work with, on time very reasonable and professional. Would definitely hire again!

name: Heather Snider
text: Tony was quick in responding to us about our tree stump removal. He was very professional, prompt, and was finished with the project within an hour. Great price as well.  I would recommend him to anyone.

name: Connie Guttery
text: I highly recommend Tony.  He did an excellent job.  He exceeded my expectations.  He ground several stumps and micro-tilled my garden in the spring.  I am late writing this review but Tony was on time and very professional.  My garden has  produced more this year than it ever has and I have Tony to thank for that.  I will use him again!

name: Kate Watkins
text: We highly recommend Mr. Howell with Economy Stump Removal. He provided us with a fair estimate for the removal of several stumps in our yard along our fence line. He was prompt with all communications both before and after the job. We are very pleased with the results. If we have a need, we will definitely use Economy Stump Removal again.

name: Lisa Muncher
text: Economy Stump Removal did an excellent job on my large amount of stumps and in record time! 10 stumps in less than 2 hours! Tony is courteous and professional and very reasonable on price. Careful and aware of what was close to each removal location, which I appreciated greatly. Not to mention the wood chips left behind are pure gold for your garden! I highly recommend ESR!

name: Brenda Iddins
text: Tony was recommended to us by a friend of ours who had him grind several stumps in his yard and was pleased with the work.  We had a LOT of stumps in our yard and Tony did a GREAT job for us.  The day before he was to be here I was notified of an approximate time to expect him.  The morning he was to arrive he sent me a message with a more exact time.  When he arrived he took the time to explain the process and what to expect (a bit messy).  He was VERY respectful of our yard and plants, letting me know if any would be in the way (plants were not harmed, only the tree stumps).  We will highly recommend Tony to our friends and neighbors when they ask who we used.

name: Saadya Hooper
text: Called about a stump and the next day Tony was here ready to get the job done. We had a small stump so it took no time at all with his awesome machine! Highly recommend to use him to any friends or family.

name: jennifer blanton
text: Wonderful job !!!! The Howell's make you feel as if you have known them for years. Very professional, yet personal, punctual, and the pricing was extremely fair. We hired them strictly from their reviews....... I must say, we made a great decision. You will not regret hiring the Howell's. Thank you Economy Stump Removal.

name: Kristen Ezekiel
text: Amazing and fast! Service with a smile in less than 24 hours. Tony helped my husband finish some tough stump removals.  Highly recommend this company!

name: Houston Lee
text: We called Tony to grind several stumps in our yard.  He not only was able to come that day and get the job done,  he was very professional and his pricing was very reasonable.  I would definitely recommend Tony and Economy Stump Removal for their services to everyone!

name: Daniel Farrell
text: Tony went above and beyond to efficiently remove a lot of troublesome stumps, small and large, that were littering my yard and causing me such a headache when trying to properly care for our land. He worked so hard to help ensure everything I wanted and needed was done and did so with a great attitude! I highly him and his service!!

name: William Lamey
text: Great service, fast response. He had the job done less than 24 hrs after I texted him. Fair price, highly recommended.

name: Daniel Coleman
text: Could not get any other tree services to return my phone calls and give me a fair estimate. Mr. Regan was the only one to return my phone call and even though he only does stump grinding, gave me a solution to getting my trees cut down which saved me money. I got the trees cut down and was more than happy to call him back to grind my five stumps at a fair price. Great punctual, affordable service! I won't hesitate to call on him again.

name: Jeff Decker
text: Regan Howell did an amazing job removing a tree stump in our front yard.  Quick service, so friendly, very reasonably priced and looks wonderful.  Thank you so much.  Highly recommend!!!!

name: Katie Norman
text: Tony and Lee did a great job! Both very friendly and good at what they do. Will use them again in the future!

name: James Adams
text:
We had used Regan Howell's stump removing services about a year ago and was very impressed with the quality of his work.  We needed another stump removed this month (May, 2019) because of poor quality stump removal by the people who cut down a maple tree in our front yard.

We had Mr. Howell's card and planned to use his services again.  We were somewhat disappointed to find out that he had retired and sold his business to Tony Camardella, but we decided to go ahead and use Tony's services.  The results:  just as good as the previous work.  Tony arrived on time and did an excellent job removing the stump remainder and a bunch of above ground roots.  We were very pleased with his services and pricing and will definitely call him again if we need further stump removal.

name: Lynn Giedinghagen
text: Tony did a great job removing an extremely large stump and all the roots for a very good price. Would definitely recommend him for any stump removal.

name: Carmen Clower
text: Regan Howell/Economy Stump Removal did an amazing job on our large stump and root system!! He is very reasonably priced, fast, efficient, and leaves the area quite tidy, plus he's a very nice man!! My husband was completely thrilled with the results!!

name: David Drummond
text:
Regan came out and removed 3 stumps I had in about 10 minutes. Very nice to work with and made the trip all the way to my side of town for an extremely inexpensive job. Best prices around as well.

Thanks for your help, Regan!

name: william shaw
text: Awesome service. I called Mr. Howell, he came out the next day and was even early to the job. He was done in an hour, and took extra care to minimize the mess. The price was great, I checked, it would have cost me more to rent a grinder, and pick it up and return it. I most definitely certain the grinder I would have rented would not have allowed me to finish in an hour, or as completely. This was a great decision, and I wouldn’t even contemplate doing it myself again. Definitely recommend this service.

name: Michael Clay
text: Mr Howell was very professional and his price was fair. He showed up when said he would and fully explained the process up front. The self propelled grinder is very gentle on your lawn compared to the ones they have to tow behind a pickup truck.

name: gtgoad1
text: Reagan was great to deal with! Great price, great service, very professional! If you need stumps removed this is your guy.

name: Samuel Audia
text: After a couple of trees came down in a recent storm, I called Regan.  He had me scheduled within 3 days.  After a couple minutes of assessing the stumps he was off to work and had all 3 taken care of within 30 minutes.  Would recommend and use again!  Thanks

name: Betty Darnell
text: Mr. Howell did an outstanding job with a huge stump that had an extensive  root system.    His fee was very reasonable.  He was professional, timely, and courteous.  I will definitely use him again and highly recommend him.

name: David Woodham
text: Great Service.  Top notch equipment.  Regan is as honest and professional as they come.  He'll spend as much time as you need to make you comfortable with the process and will make sure you know what to expect when he is through.

name: William Sabo
text: Mr. Howell provided an accurate quote upfront and made short work of numerous large stumps. He is a very pleasant man with reliable equipment.  Excellent service!

name: Natalie Daniel
text: Mr. Reagan was so sweet and great to work with! He did an amazing job and was very punctual! I would recommend to anyone!

name: Jackson Carr
text: Mr. Howell is the real deal. Like many of the previous reviewers, I found Mr. Howell to be extremely professional, fairly priced, and he did an excellent job. I wouldn't hesitate to call on him again in the future, and I would highly recommend him to anyone.

name: Larry Wells
text: Professional and friendly.

resp.text: Larry, we're grateful for the excellent review! If there's ever anything you need, please get in touch. -Economy Stump Removal

name: Daniel Kelmenson
text: Great price, did a wonderful job, and was creative about getting his machine into our backyard as we had obstacles in the way. I strongly recommend him!

name: Brandon Sharp
text: Tony was prompt and courteous.  Communication was easy and convenient.

name: El Jay
text: AMAZING!! I called Reagan this morning, and he was onsite in 2 hours. Very professional, the price was right and delivered exactly what was promised. I'll definitely use his services again!

name: Jarry Taylor
text: Mr. Howell was friendly (no jokes about him being "chipper"!!), very professional, called the night before to confirm his appointment, and actually arrived early--quite a change from other vendors who often show up late.  His equipment was first rate and, in no time, 3 stumps in my yard disappeared!  I even shot video of the equipment in action so that my wife could witness the miracle.

name: Dennis P
text: Great guy! He did my stumps for less than I could rent a machine for. He did 43 + trees for me in less than 30 minutes. It would have taken me all day to have done it myself. I have used his service twice and he's always done me right.

name: Parker White
text: I called Reagan regarding a few small stumps at my house that I couldn't dig out. He was able to come out a few days later (on a Saturday morning no less) and complete the job. It took him less than 30 minutes to grind up 3 holly bushes and one large pine stump. Overall, he was very nice and professional. He even stayed around a bit to talk about his machinery with me. I wouldn't hesitate to call him in the future if needed. Thanks again Mr Howell!

name: William Huggins
text:
Mr. Howell could not be a nicer man..

i called him to remove a few stumps..he was out within 24 hours...removed the stumps with ease and decent price  even helped plant a tree.

cannot make a higher recommendation

i forgot to mention the stump removal machine...it was remote controlled and did not disturb any of our other landscaping...

name: Jake R
text: Mr. Howell was great! The pricing was very fair for what he did and how much time and work I saved on my end. He was quick to provide a quote and willing to come do the work at the drop of a hat. I had a vast amount of stumps of all sizes (4"-18") and he gave me a set price and stuck to it. I highly recommend Economy Stump Removal! DO NOT rent a grinder and try and do it, waste of your time and more expensive in the long run. Just hire Mr. Howell! I honestly wish I had more stumps so he could come back.

name: Grant Jenkins
text: Tony and Lee did a great job and very competitive pricing.

name: Ryan Matson
text: I needed several stumps removed to make room for a parking pad for an RV. I found economy stump removal on the internet and decided to give him a shot since he had such positive reviews. I am happy to report that his service is exactly as advertised! Mr. Howell was upfront about his pricing and what to expect. He called to confirm the night before he was scheduled to come out and arrived the next morning exactly when he said he would. I was expecting this whole process to take hours, but he had all of my stumps ground up in about 45 minutes. I was impressed to say the least. I would not hesitate to contact him again, and intend to do so if the need arises.

name: Mark Mcleroy
text: This is my second service from Regan, really enough said. Everything about the process was great, from the stump removal, estimate, and friendly service.  What a great local resource to have in the North Jefferson communities.

name: Ron Tapp
text: Great Job!  Mr. Howell was here and stump was gone. Painless, and fair. I highly recommend.

name: Keith Higginbotham
text: Terrific job! Showed up right on time and did a fantastic job removing multiple stumps. Was in and out in less than an hour. Will hire again if needed.

name: Kaylee Gunn
text: Great communication. Arrived early, affordable, did an amazing job and will use again!!!

name: Jason Murray
text: Excellent service. Quick and very good value for the money. Look no further!

name: Sue Quick
text: Great job,on time, all around good experience. Professional job and Regan Howell is trustworthy.The price was more than fair . We would definitely call on Mr. Howell again.

name: Ryan
text: Mr. Howell arrived at my house about an hour after I called asking for a quote and ground up what he said was the largest stump  he had seen in 15+ years of stump grinding. Was very professional and courteous.

name: Lena Frankl
text: Very professional and affordable! I highly recommend!

name: Ashley Owens
text: Mr. Howell was there before the scheduled time. He was very professional and we would highly recommend his services.

name: Bill Williams
text: Sure wish I had called Mr. Howell sooner. I am a DIYer, but it makes absolutely no sense to do this job yourself.  Considering it costs a few hundred dollars to rent a grinder, combined with hours of labor, it's a no brainer.   This is coming from a guy who cut down and grinded about 30 trees this winter. The service was great,  time spent doesnt compare, and his prices are unbeatable. He knocked out 7 stumps, 24 inches or greater, in less than 45 minutes. I will definitely use him again.

name: Heather Shipman
text: J & C was working at the neighbor's house, and they did such a nice job, we asked them to come by and give us a quote too! They cut down a huge tree that was too close to the garage, and also took care of some other limbs. These guys (and ladies!) were very professional and obviously know what they're doing. They also did a great cleanup job. Will definitely call them again!

name: Tracie Fuqua
text: Excellent Customer Service in Athens.We had two pine trees that lost branches during the ice storm, and the branches went through the roof of the house.  We needed to get the trees down before the new roof could go up so we started getting quotes for the two tall trees to be removed. Alex came the next morning and gave us a quote, so after getting other quotes too and reading their reviews we decided to give them a chance to earn our business in Athens.  They were able to take down both trees in one day. They even put boards in the yard to avoid making deep ruts from the heavy equipment after the ice and snow. Everything that was promised was delivered and they did a wonderful job cleaning up the yard.  The price was extremely reasonable compared to the other quotes and they were able to complete the job before our new roof was put on. Very thankful to J and C trees and they do have the required incense and insurance required by the city of Athens. Photos below. I will try and add stumped removal photo also.

resp.text: Thank you very much

name: Lee J.
text: I highly recommend this company. This was by far the best customer experience I have had from a company. They are very professional, responsive, and go above and beyond what they are hired to do. I hired them to remove a tree and these guys did a phenomenal job as it was close to my power line and hanging over my house. They were able to remove the tree without any issues and left the area very clean with absolutely no debris left behind. Great job!

name: Victor Abrams
text: I had several trees removed. The crew was on time, efficient, and did a great job. They cleaned up the area after the job was done and ensured i was satisfied before they left. Their prices are very reasonable. I have used them in the past and will definitely use them in the future. I would highly recommend this company for your tree removal needs.

name: Traci Berry
text: Great service from J&C!  We needed a stump ground and are so grateful to have found them..  He came and got the stump ground, cleaned up, and finished in a timely manner and at a very reasonable price.  From the initial phone call all the way to the finished job, we were met with professionalism and politeness, which is a rare quality these days.  We highly recommend using them!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: Joseph Kestner
text: J&C Tree Experts did an incredible job removing two of my trees. They were at my house on time (maybe even a little early) and were very hardworking, and precise. They really were like tree surgeons taking down the trees in a safe but very quick manner.  One of the trees was about 8 feet from my garage and they removed it safely with no damage to my garage or roof. They gave me a very fair price and did more work than the estimate quoted. 5 STARS and then some!!!  I can't imagine anyone being disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: Jay D
text:
I heard about J&C Tree Experts from a friend who had trees removed from his yard and I am glad I did. I have used them twice, once for two trees and then again for a five tree job. The entire process from start to finish was great. I called for a free estimate and they were out just a few hours later. Their prices are extremely reasonable, much lower than other companies. They were very responsive as well, getting the estimate emailed to me promptly, letting me know when they were coming etc.

As for the work they did, it was excellent. The first job involved two dying trees that were 80 feet tall. The second job included a huge tree in an extremely difficult position. But they removed them all safely. The cleanup was done well and all the workers were nice and polite.

If you need tree services, I 100% recommend J&C Tree Experts.

resp.text: it was a pleasure working with you thanks for the opportunity

name: Frank Hepburn
text: Excellent service I was very pleased with J&C Tree Experts professionalism the crew was told where the property lines were and kept within those limits as much as possible (which made my neighbors happy too).  Hugo Juarez is a great person to work with and was very responsive when I had questions.  Overall an excellent experience I highly recommend using J&C Tree Experts and will again if I need any trees removed in the future.  Thanks Hugo

name: Tony Prestis
text:
We had a large tree that needed taken down. We got 3 quotes and they were half the next lowest. When the schedule changed for weather they had good communication.
Tree was in a tight spot so it could not be dropped. They took it down safely with a good job on the clean up.

name: Crutcher Financial Group
text:
J&C Experts done a tremendous JOB of Tree Removal/Tree Pruning. Alex and the Crew were very courteous and professional. Pricing was reasonable. I will use J&C Tree Experts again. I totally recommend J&C  Tree Experts without hesitation. Great Tree Service.

Thanks so Much,
Winfred Crutcher

name: Mary Starnes
text: I had some small stumps from Foster Hollies in my shrub bed that I wanted removed along with the roots. J&C did an excellent job with the removal and clean up, and their price was very reasonable. I would highly recommend this business.

name: Thomas Neumann
text: Alex had his crew here on time! They worked to remove a monster pine tree in my backyard. They worked non stop for 2 days. These guys are worth penny I spent. I would not hesitate to recommend this company! Fair rates were especially welcomed as well.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: i82phoneu
text: Did excellent work in a timely fashion and cleaned up after themselves. Work recommend them anytime. Their rates were the cheapest compared to the others and they did not jerk me around like the other companies.

name: Scott Mcdaniel
text: Excellent company and Alex was a pleasure to work with.  He quoted us a price and we didn't have to pay a dollar over.  They removed the two pine trees from my property a lot quicker that I would have imagined.  Will recommend J&C Tree experts to any who ask.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: Matt Eaton
text: Excellent service from J&C Tree Experts. I needed 13 large trees cut down and wood removed. In addition I required a few of the stumps grinded. J&C tree experts offered an great quoted price and were able to do the work within a week of getting the quote. The crew was very professional in felling my large oak trees near my house and neighbors house/fences. The crew cleaned up and nicely stacked wood I requested to be left behind. I would definitely recommend and be repeat customers.

resp.text: it was a pleasure working with you thanks for the opportunity

name: Patrick O'Neal
text: Great company to do business with on Tims Ford Lake. I had a really large tree (approx. 75 feet tall) next to a deck. There was no access for a bucket truck. It took them about about 4 hours to remove the entire tree and clean up. Impressed with their safety precautions, and their quote was very reasonable.

resp.text: it was a pleasure working with you thanks for the opportunity

name: Shirley Baldridge
text: We were very pleased with Alex and the entire team.  They were prompt, professional, and Alex was great at coordinating getting our trees and stumps removed.   I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: Hilda Lee
text: Excellent work. They came on the day they said they would and cleaned up afterward.

name: Matt Knupp
text: They delivered a large pile of free wood chips for us to use in gardening and landscaping and dumped them exactly where we asked them to. Would definitely recommend them if you need free wood chips or logs.

name: Patrick O'Hear
text: Outstanding service. I will strongly recommend them! Reliable and professional!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity to work with you

name: Linda Mahony
text: Was a good experience. Did a great job. I would refer to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to work with you

name: Danielle Shurn
text: I ordered multch from chipdrop.com and they were the arborist they sent to me.  The crew was very nice and dropped the multch after talking to me first (usually they just dump and leave)  They even asked me if I was interested in another drop later in the day.  I was very happy with their customer service. You have good guys J&C Tree Experts!

resp.text: Thank you very much

name: John Weis
text: They were professional, very reasonably priced and did a great clean up afterwards.

resp.text: Thank you

name: jonathan ford
text: Jason came out to my father in laws house a few weeks ago to give him a price on removing some trees. He did such a good job we gave him a call. Hands down best company I’ve used for tree service and stump removal. Theses guys are top notch!!!

name: Justin M
text: Fair amount of work for a great price. His guys went above and beyond to make sure i was satisfied before leaving.

name: Jeffrey Cowgill
text:
We were recommended to use Colburn's Tree Service by our contractor. When we met with Jason he was prompt, courteous and on time. We discussed the project which involved a large white oak that was literally 6in from our house as well as giant red oak and four other smaller oaks and pines that needed to be removed. I also discussed keeping a portion of the hardwood for myself.  We also agreed on trimming a couple of other trees nearby.

It was several weeks before we saw him again. Jason contacted the day before and confirmed it was good for us.  They showed up before 9am and had all trees down safely, stumps ground and all debris removed by 3pm.  They're a hard working bunch, they have the equipment and know how to use it.

We were extremely happy with their work ethics and efficiency. The price was VERY reasonable as well!

Urban Cowgill
August 2020

name: J Leonardi
text: Recommended by a friend to cut two big 60 year old trees down. Good pricing and very good service. The clean up job was excellent, couldn't even tell the trees were once there. Will definitely use Colburn's Tree Service again.

name: C. Gosa
text: Great job! My husband and I are very happy with the service and the price! They cleaned up so well when they finished, we had to look up to even know they had been there!

name: Jesse James
text: Did an amazing job! Didn't even look like a tree had fallen after they were done. Highly recommend. I will be using them again for some other tree work around my property.

name: Alan Beckham
text: Owner and employees are very friendly and helpful.  Fair prices and great service. Has done work for me twice and I will use again.

name: Amanda Corley
text: Friendly, but I've had no luck getting them to come do the work. I got an estimate 8 months ago, and even called to see if I was to be scheduled soon. They said I was, and months later, still have not heard from them.

name: Ray White
text: Professional.

name: Jessica Dekok
text: We have just started using TruGreen and so far are very satisfied with their services. I like that you don't have to wait around for them and a detailed service note is left for you each time they come. They show up when they are supposed to and I appreciate any suggestions for improving the lawn. It has already started to look a lot better and they offer an array of services.

name: Dave Mac
text: TruGreen is a great company.  Mike was our tech. Very  professional and very knowledgeable.

name: John Moses
text: These professionals performed my weed control swiftly and competently.

name: C. Kent Riley, DMD
text: We decided to try TruGreen of Mobile about a year ago, and initially the service seemed to be marginally effective at weed control, fertilizing, and pest control.  However, over time, we noticed the results became less & less apparent, and the invoices seemed to become higher & higher.  Then, finally at some point last winter, there was some apparent weed spraying along my property’s entire fenceline that left behind a 3-foot wide swath of dead grass, which became painfully obvious when the lawn came out of its winter dormancy in late March 2021.  All TruGreen tech had to say was that it must’ve been from a cold winter & some other BS, and that maybe it would eventually grow back; however, none of our many other neighbors that don’t use TruGreen, but do have the same type of centipede grass, the same type of shadow box fence, and the same type of winter weather showed no signs of this kind of problem.  So, I have to call B.S. on this lame-brain & accept-no-responsibility explanation.  TruGreen management was notified numerous times about this complaint, and we never got a reply from anyone about it.  Needless to say, we were forced to cancel this expensive & negative impact lawn service.  Now, I have the wonderful task of ripping-up thousands of square feet of dead grass along my entire fenceline, and purchasing expensive & dirty sod to put it all back myself.  Then, I have the wonderful task of watering it all back to health very early in the morning for the next several weeks.  Thanks TruGreen! 👏

name: Sheila Dear more
text: We have used them for 2 years. The last couple of visit we have seen no reductions in weeds and stickers. Called and they sent someone to spot treat areas, still no results. Called and spoke with manager named Brandon, he was suppose to come out Weds to take a look, never showed or called.  Waited a day still no show or call.  I also referred to co workers months ago and never received referral discount. Have canceled service and will be going with another company.

name: William Barton
text: I originally contracted with TruGreen via the lawn service I used  at the time.  I've recently switched to being a regular direct customer.  The switch over was quick and painless.  The office staff was very helpful and efficient.  The technicians that provide my treatments are likewise professional and the results are outstanding.

name: Charles Owen
text: After the last treatments by trugreen, my yard was worse than the prior year. Grassy weeds all over the place. Called them to fix things. They treated the yard again and the weeds persist. I had to order weed killer and treat most of my yard.

resp.text: Mr. Owen, I am having trouble locating you in our system at the Mobile, AL location. I do apologize that your service with TruGreen was not up to your satisfaction. You can give us a call at our office 251-653-3242 & we would love to help you resolve your issues. Thank you, The Owners

name: Percy Cox
text: Doesn't give accurate information

name: David Breitkreuz
text: I’ve used TruGreen fertilizer service for several years for my lawn, we recently parted ways, because my lawn looks horrible, and they have down little to diagnose and tell me what was needed. I’ve since fertilized myself and it looks better, I’ll be doing soil sampling etc to understand better what’s going on. In short, I’m not sure what I was paying them for, very disappointing, they take your money, but very poor value in my experience. Note they said they would come  by and look at the lawn after I left them, they never followed up.

name: John Northcutt
text: My experience with TruGreen has been Excellence. They are always on time and do a Great job when they get here. I would recommend them to anyone who needs work on their yard.

name: Jack Caddell
text: They do a great job and are always on time. Reasonably pri ed also

name: Bob Williams
text: TruGreen has done a great job with my yard. Mike is a great technician and makes sure my yard receives the best treatment as well as treating any troublesome areas that may need it. It took a few years to get my yard looking pristine but TruGreen made it happen. I am glad I stayed with them throughout the process. I am a truly satisfied customer. Thanks, TruGtreen.

resp.text:
Mr. Williams,
Thank you so much for your recent review. We share these comments during our weekly meeting. We are a family owned franchise and pride ourselves on improving based on any feedback we receive.

name: Reserve of Foley WessCorp
text: The lawn has looked so green and weed-free this year.  They did a great job of keeping our property looking great.

name: John Anderson
text: Highly recommend! I’ve only had 2 applications so far, but I can already tell a huge difference! My grass is so much greener with next to no weeds left in it! I have always done my own yard when it comes to weed control and fertilizer, but choosing to have Trugreen come out and take over was the best decision I’ve made in terms of my yard.

name: TwinsMama 2018
text: Our TruGreen service has been great! Randy, our tech, is always polite. Our lawn looks great thanks to TruGreen's service. We also appreciate the  detailed notes that Randy writes after each service.

resp.text:
Mrs. Deuster,
Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your feedback. We are so glad to hear that the lawn is looking great & that Randy is doing a great job!

name: Patrick Doggett
text: Can't say enough about how knowledgeable my service tech Brian is. He definitely knows his stuff. I am happy with the product/service I have received.

name: Faydene Reed
text: My yard went from spotty green to a nice green yard with no big bare spots and lots of weeds!

name: Rachael Stubbs
text:
We have been so happy with TruGreen. Jay has been servicing our yard for 7 years. It looks beautiful and we are constantly getting asked what we do to keep such a gorgeous yard. We always reply, it’s TruGreen. They are experts in the field and we could not be more thankful to have them to keep our yard looking gorgeous, year after year.

Highly recommend!!!

name: Daniel Stover
text: Randy our yard tech is great. He is efficient and never misses an inch of grass. He always takes time to explain what treatment is being applied and to make sure I know if I need to water it in. My yard has really improved in the 18 months Tru Green has been treating it. Weeds are almost non existent and the grass is really healthy. Thanks for making my yard look great.

name: Sonya Murph
text: I’ve had two sessions and my yard is looking so much better. My husband passed away  two and one half years ago and always took good care of our yard.  Needless to say it has suffered, however, Trugreen is making it beautiful again!

name: Michael Williams
text: TruGreen has done an excellent job keeping my new lawn in good condition. They are prompt to respond to any requests and their technicians are always friendly and informative on what we need to do to keep it that way. Only improvement would be a discount for seniors to help lower costs.

name: steven goguen
text: Very satisfied with service and cost.  My lawn is looking great.

resp.text:
Mr. Goguen,
Thank you so much for your review! We appreciate your feedback. We are so glad to hear that the lawn is looking great. Have a great day!

name: Sue Powell
text: Very pleased with service.

name: Richard Brinson
text: TruGreen arrives as scheduled and let's us know what they are doing to our lawn.  Our lawn's appearance and condition has greatly improved since we started using TruGreen.

name: Ben Turner
text:
I was somewhat skeptical when I first contacted TruGreen. My yards were not in the best of shape. As time went by I began to see a noticeable improvement. The service technician that took care of my lawn is very nice and professional. He gave me some tips on how to work my lawn between visits, all of which worked as he said they would.

All in all in am very satisfied with the TruGreen service and I intend to continue my relationship with them when the time comes.

Thanks,

Ben

name: Robin Coker
text: We have been pleased with TruGreen since they started! Would recommend them!

name: walter dennis
text: Our technician, Randy, was very knowledgeable and courteous. He was extremely polite and took the time to give me suggestions to improve my lawn. His professionalism is truly appreciated.

name: ROBERT GRAHAM
text: I have worked with. Several lawn companies since purchasing my home in Malbis. TruGreen by far the best i have dealt with. Provide excellent service and make my yard shine. My service tech, sorry I'm bad with names, is the most professional and courteous person to work with. I highly recommend TruGreen for all yard and lawn care.

name: Sarah DeShong
text: We downsized and wanted less yard work , smaller flower beds, etc.  We found exactly that.  However, keeping our smaller lawn healthy-a beautiful carpet of thick green grass-free of weeds, insects/applying fertilizer, nutrients...still took a lot of work .  We decided to call TruGreen. Was one of the the smartest things we ever did!  They are experts in lawn care & do a wonderful job.  In fact, neighbors began asking what we were doing -told them to call TruGreen and now they have lawns to be proud of too.  They provide services according to your individual needs and budget!!  You don’t have to be at home- they leave you a TruGreen tag on your door stating what they did.  AND, if you need them or have a concern, just a quick call and it’s handled.  TruGreen has maintained our lawn for 4 years... we know how great they are!!  We look forward to weekends now..NO YARD WORK... more time with family & friends ..THANKS to TRU-GREEN!!

name: Vernon Edington
text: I will be glad to help you. However,;I'm recovering from surgery. I ask that you give me some time. Vernon Edington

name: Jay Day
text: The staff seems friendly and knowledgable. This is my 1st interaction with TruGreen. I will post more as I have more interaction with this company

name: Ann Durrett
text: Service provided has been very good.  Recommendations have been spot on and our yard looks great.  Highly recommend their service.

name: Paul Gaming
text: Great customer service and attention to detail. I appreciated the detailed lawn care plan left for me when I arrived home. Truly professional and experienced in what they do. I would definitely recommend.

name: Machelle Thompsôn
text: TruGreen has done a wonderful job on our lawn. It looks much better than many of our neighbors. We recommend them to all that ask how we have such a beautiful lawn with no weeds.

name: Bryan Watts
text: Great results and great responsiveness.

name: Thomas Lang
text:
Very attentive to detail. The  lawn  never looked better this time of year. Nick their tree and shrub teĉh  offered suggestions regarding a  number of shrubs that will save them so I won't have to replace. All their service technicians, and office personnel are courtesy and take time to answer questions and offer advice. They never appear to be in a hurry to get away. I  regard them all as very professional and recommend them highly.
Tom  L.

name: Karen McRaney
text: The treated areas of my 5 acres looked good this past year. We avoided crabgrass infestation. Sedge kept to a minimum.

name: Rob Ballantyne
text: Very happy with yard service. My yard's appearance has improved 100 percent. Thick and green after 1 treatment. The staff is very friendly.

name: Derek Najdowski
text: TruGreen is a tremendous company and value for my money.  I highly recommend their services

name: Anthony Payne
text: I’ve struggled with weeds for years and did not have that problem this spring.  It was great to see a noticeable difference in my yard compared to my neighbors.  I’ve recommended TruGreen to all of them.

name: Gail Ghilardi
text: We have a program for our lawn and bushes and trees.  We are typically very satisfied with the results, but should an issue be experienced, we simply call their office.  They dispatch one of their people to investigate and address the issue at no charge.  We are very satisfied with their service.

name: Leslie Cobalt
text: My lawn looks the  best  it has ever looked. I am so thankful  for the hard  work and  attention  to detail from Trugreen   that  has turned my lawn around. It is truly incredible  how beautiful it looks now.

resp.text: We are glad we can help, Ms. Cobalt!

name: John Hall
text: We had TruGreen servicing our lawn for 3 years in South Carolina and got amazing results so when we moved to Alabama contacting and having TruGreen do our lawn servicing was a no brainer. The technicians are always friendly, knowledgeable, and conscientious about making sure our lawn is maintained and kept looking the best it can.

name: Randy McQueen
text: Cody did a fabulous job for us. He took his time and sprayed for weeds in my lawn especially around the edges of my flower beds. Other companies have told me they cant get this close but he did. My lawn as a whole looks great and I'm glad Cody is my regular lawn guy.

name: Elizabeth Ambrose
text: Trugreen is doing a wonderful job on my yard. They manage the care of my lawn and keep me update on every visit. I’m a widow and it is one less thing on my plate to worry about, which I tell everyone.

name: Joe Oswald
text: TRUGREEN saves me a lot of time and effort. They know what my lawn needs and when to apply. This takes all the guess work out of lawn care.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We share these comments during our weekly meeting. We are a family owned franchise and pride ourselves on improving based on any feedback we receive!

name: Boccadoro Narciso
text: They are not worth inviting to your lawn. After paying fully for their crappy first service, I have discontinued them and  they have the gall to bill me $20 for backing the "discount" from that payement. DO NOT SIGN CONTRACT! THERE ARE MANY SERVICES IN THE AREA THAT ARE GOOD, HONEST AND RELIABLE!  response to the owner, I did not disclose my real name as I do not trust you, in fact i just received another mail with the demand of $20. NEVER AGAIN!

resp.text: Mr. Narcisco, I am having difficulty locating you as a customer in our system. We  actually do not have one TruGreen customer that signs a contract as we are non contractual, and have been for all of our 18 years of business. We have no signatures, no cancellation fess, and no binding agreements for our service. We assure you that we run our business with the utmost integrity, and I am sorry that you did not feel you experienced that. As I stated before, I am unable to locate your account in my system or I would be glad to look into this for you.

name: Roy McBryar
text: Professional, friendly and helpful staff. Did an exceptional job on the first treatment of my lawn.

name: mcqueen family
text: Great customer service and adorable prices

name: Winston Miller
text: They discovered the PH of my lawn was off and they have worked hard to get it to the desired PH. I have received a lot of comments about how good my grass looks since they started all of their various treatments. I think they saved me from needing to put down new sod.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind comments Mr Miller. Ill pass that along to our team. Keep in mind that we offer $30 referrals if you want to recommend us to the neighbors who like your lawn.

name: Paul Geene
text: Great service! From the ladies in the office,to our technition,Randy, in the field,we receive the highest level of both professional and personal attention as promised. They understand positive interaction with a customer, sadly a lost art today.  Thank you,again.  Paul and Michelle

name: Danny Phillips
text: As our lawn began to green up this spring it was looking really good...until Trugreen has started their "treatment".  Now the backyard has large dead spots, and there are large yellow and dead spots in the front.  We now have the worst yard in our neighborhood-far worse than our neighbors who don't do anything to their yard, except for our next door neighbors who use them, too, and whose yard is almost as bad as ours.

resp.text: Mr. Phillips, I am having a problem locating your account in our system. Is it perhaps under a different name? Our goal is 100% satisfaction, and we assure you that we will always go the extra mile to ensure it. With our yearly lawn program we offer free service calls to our customers, so that if you are ever experiencing any issues with your lawn we can send a trained technician to your home for free to ensure that your problem is taken care of promptly. We did experience a particularly harsh winter this year, so winter injury is more prevalent than usual but we strongly believe in our product and our technicians ability to combat it. Please give us a call at the office  at your convenience so we can discuss this further and develop a plan of action.

name: John Mickler
text: TruGreen is courteous and professional on every visit.  I feel like I getting a good value for my money.

name: Debra Hibbert
text: Always friendly and professional  with the added benefit of giving me suggestions on how to improve my lawn.

name: Brenda Taylor
text: They treated my yard and my neighbors last year with NO improved results. I ask to speak to the manager. Sent them pictures of my yard afterwards and still almost a year later no response. This year my yard looks terrible. Will have to figure something else out. Can’t  trust these people. They really DONT CARE!!!

resp.text: Ms Taylor, I am sorry you didn't get the results you expected. I wish you would have stuck with our agronomic plan. My records show that you only took 2 treatments early in 2018 and your neighbor took only one application. With our rainfall plus weed & pest pressure we have found it takes treatments throughout the year and not just once or twice in the spring to eliminate weeds and correct problems that have existed for years. I am also sorry your lawn looks terrible this year. Hopefully you continued to care for it after you stopped our service almost 12 months ago.

name: Bob & Carolyn
text: They are prompt and courteous.  Whenever it looks like my lawn has a problem, weeds, et cetera, I call and they are right on the spot taking care of it.  I appreciate them very much.

name: *Chevy Meg*
text: Rian was amazing and super sweet! She helped me make my yard so green!!!! I would highly recommend

resp.text: We appreciate your business, thank you!

name: Christina Rollo
text: Fantastic service, always friendly & knowledgeable! Exactly what you want in a Lawn Care service!

name: Catherine McCaslin
text: No fuss. They do all the work and apply everything at the right times. I do not have to call and get things corrected because they have already identified the problem and are working on it.

resp.text: Thank you Catherine!  That is our goal. It is hard to hit that goal sometimes in Horticulture since we are dealing with the environment so thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Paula Thornhill
text: Great  people to work with!  Very knowledgeable and dependable!

name: Kevin Jones
text: I have dealt with TruGreen for years and have been extremely satisfied with their service and the way my lawn looks. Thank you

name: Dave Riddle
text: Our lawn has never looked better!

name: Susan Brown
text: These guys have done a fantastic job on my lawn for years and are always professional and courteous! Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Ms. Brown.

name: Nicole Barker
text: This company offered a discount for services if I would put my card on file.  Came and did the services but Then charged my card the full amount. Which is fine accidents happen. When I called back to have them fix it the first time they said it would be handled they saw the mistake. I waited a week for the credit to go back which it never did.  Then when I called back the second time the lady was so rude and unwilling to give me the credit but offered to try and discount it on next times services   Agreed that it should not of been charged that way but not helpful in getting it credited.  So now I have to dispute with my credit card.  I clearly would not recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Ms Baker I'm sorry for the confusion but you were to receive a $20.00 discount for signing up for our auto charge billing option and agreeing to our yearly program. You did not want to continue with our program, which is fine, but you cant quit the program and still receive the discount. This was explained to you and is printed on every marketing piece we use. I'm sorry again for the confusion.

name: Riland Jones
text: Ok at first, then they started charging me randomly during the month for services without ok. I ended my service 2 years ago and I have begged them to stop calling me, put me on a no call list and I still get calls. Will not recommend to anyone

resp.text: Mr Jones I am afraid you may have our South Alabama location confused with another TruGreen. I attempted to look up your account and we have no record of you ever being a customer. We are a small family franchise and my wife and I are the owners. We never charge customers without their approval and for that matter never call customers ever unless it is to schedule a requested service. Please give our office a call @ 251.653.3242 if you would so we can find the TruGreen location you were working with and help you reach out to them to resolve any issues you may have.  Sincerely, Randy McQueen Owner/Manager

name: Larry Thompson
text: Great lawn service. Couldn't ask for any better.

name: Michael Garner (Mik3ron)
text: First treatment made a big difference.  Will continue with further treatments and report back.

name: Lucy Kerlin
text: The worst if you want weeds that look like plants they were not treating yard right side yard died paying premium price go somewhere else tied of pulling weeds when it was there job but they did not do there job.

name: Chris Harper
text: Great customer service and attention to detail.

name: Mike Lipp
text: If you want a dead lawn, call these guys! I have used them for years in other states. These jokers are ridiculous!!!

resp.text: Mike I'm sorry you had a bad experience with TruGreen locations in other states.  If you ever get down to the Gulf Coast give us a call. We are a small family owned franchise and my wife Elizabeth and I are the owners. We are both Degreed Horticulturists, Volunteer our time and resources to spreading Horticulture to Schools and Senior Centers and Donate to help provide landscapes for Habitat for Humanity. Maybe  we could change your mind that we are "jokers" and "ridiculous".  Thanks, Randy McQueen

name: Sue Rich
text: Very professional and friendly

name: Lauren Wiggins
text: This company has the WORST customer service I have experienced in quite a while. If I could give negative stars I would. After speaking to the office manager about a problem we experienced, she took it upon herself to cancel our service. My complaint was about a note left on our door by one of her employees, which I felt was very unprofessional and rude. She dismissed my complaints and told me they actually did me a favor by coming back out and spraying and didn’t understand why everyone is so offended these days.  This was all started by a feedback email I received from them. If you don’t want someone’s opinion about your services- don’t ask. I wouldn’t recommend this company to anyone.

name: Scott Young
text: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND  APEX Restoration for any and all mitigation needs. Colby and the DKI water mitigation team did an outstanding job from start to finish.  I can't say enough about their professionalism, courtesy, care and concern for our home.  We had significant water damage from a attic mounted Air Conditioner.  The came in assessed the damage a provided us with not only a estimate but walked us through the process. They worked diligently to get our home restored as quick as possible, despite the fact that the temperature in the house was over 100 degrees.  Glad to have professionals of this caliber on our side in our time of need.

name: Richard Weaver
text: Colby and the DKI water mitigation team were rockstars!!!! They were Johnny on the spot when the city sewer backed up into our house. Very professional, very courteous, and they were very thorough. The fact that they are good at what they do is a bonus as well. Glad to have professionals on your side in your time of need. 10/10 would use again. Don’t want to HAVE to use them again, but should the need arise, they’ll be my go to.

name: Lisa Grupe
text: After Hurricane Sally damaged my new condo, DKI Apex Huntsville (Colby Swaim) was assigned to do the mitigation. Mr. Swaim was knowledgeable, personable, thorough, attentive to detail, and empathetic. He answered my questions in person, via text, on the phone, and via email. He always did what he said he would do, and he went above and beyond by sending me photos when I couldn't be present and by working with me on saving some custom cabinetry.  In a time of stress, his calm presence was very beneficial. Other condo owners expressed similar satisfaction with how neat and clean this firm was in the mold removal and water damage cleanup.  Thanks Apex DKI Huntsville!

name: Dee Dee Bond
text:
My Kitchen caught a fire in Oct. Apex did a great
Job in cleaning things up. They have 2 employees that are great works. Their kind ,organized , very hard workers. Mike and Zack are the nicest young men. Can’t find people like that these days.

name: mike smith
text: Like the others have said....if I could give a zero I would.  I have no idea why my insurance company uses Apex, other than they must be low cost.  I'm not going to waste any more of my life on these guys writing a review, but since I use google reviews I will tell you don't, just don't

name: Cameron Galbreath
text: Do not use this company. They cut corners and just want checks signed whether it's done correctly or not. There was a problem (that I personally noticed and pointed out and it was never brought to my attention by the contractor). It could have been easily fixed during the repair process but was not addressed and work that was completed now has to be undone to fix this. In addition, they have acted like this is a total inconvenience for them when they failed to notice the issue (or ignored it) in the first place. Use any other company but this one. They billed for several services they did not provide  It took over 3 weeks for anyone to even come out and evaluate/fix the issue after it was pointed out to them (they already had all of their large checks signed at this point).  And their "fix"was more like a bandaid and try and tell my wife there wont be any issues with it. Slow response times. Poor customer service. Their "customer service" team that is supposed to regular check in with you called 1 time at the beginning of the job and never heard from them again. This job was a 2-3 week job and is now on month 3. If you want repairs done timely and properly look elsewhere.

name: Amber Rausch
text: Let me start at the start of my process. I explain to them what the job was going to intel. But yet for some reason they were not listening. It took them five time coming out to my home to understand the full detail of what needed to be done. They put my repairs on the back burner as long as possible, stating that they would start this day but when it came to that day their employees were at another job. When they did come out, I was told that x y and z would be complete that day by the project manager, will only x was explained to the crew that came out and they were tasked with other jobs so they could not finish when I asked why they were not completing that days work. I was never provided samples and they wanted to charge me more for what I wanted because I had to go out and look for my own flooring, never provide with vanity or tub style before they installed them, and they claimed they did more work to the insurance company then the actual done, I fired them and finished the job for them.

name: Chest Rockwell
text:
Absolutely horrible experience with a small restoration. My insurance company recommended this company, and I'm not sure why. They are incredibly disorganized and communicate even worse. They show up when they aren't scheduled and don't show up when they are scheduled. In one case the workers just didn't show up and the PM didn't realize it until the next morning!! Too many issues to list. TERRIBLE project management and I would NEVER pay them on my own. I'm firing my insurance company (USAA) over this debacle.

Please find another restoration company if your insurance provider recommends these people, then find another insurance provider.

resp.text: Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with me so I can learn more about the problem and so I can address it. I promise you, this is NOT how we do business at Apex. My personal cell is 931-434-4706. Thank you, Michelle Keller, Customer Care

name: Christina Williams
text: I worked for them for two months. They never got materials on time. They jack the work order up to make more money for themselves. Their project managers were sloppy and smelled like old onions first thing in the morning. They tried to fire us but we quit before they had a chance. How can you work for someone when you know more than the so called managers? Before you hire those guys, you'll come out better doing it yourself! If have USAA insurance,  they prey on you. Go small if you want it done right. They don't do background checks, so you might have a murderer in your home. STAY AWAY FROM APEX! DKI!

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Fired Apex DKI today.  My insurance company and I caught them in lies so that their slow movement towards ordering materials wouldn't look as bad.  They have known of my job since February 20th, and have been paid since February.  They started work the last week of APRIL.  Their contractors are poor communicators and likely to misinterpret instructions.  We were stood up by contractors twice in 5 days.  I fired Apex DKI today.  This has been the worst experience that I've ever had with any company.  So bad that I'm going to change homeowners just because they recommended Apex.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Randy Little
text: So far so good, I pray now when the work begins on restoring my house they continue to do as good a job as they have done getting everything in place contract wise!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Randy Little. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kevin Breuers
text: Cant give a zero, but would if I could.  Not very organized.  Recommending to Insurance Company to not use this organization.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: TR
text:
APEX started our bathroom in May 2016. They said they would be done i n 7 to 10 days. As of July 20th they still had not finished. We had a vacation planned and upon our return, the unprofessional work ethic and attitude continued so we fired them.
The problems:
They have installed the tile flooring incorrectly, it is very uneven, has to be removed and replaced. The tile was uneven, grout lines not the same and tile was crooked. They chipped floor tile trying to fix the mistakes they made.
They rebuilt the shower walls but made the shower to large. The cabinets now do fit in place. The shower walls have to removed as does the mud bed for the shower.
The tile work they did on the shower had to removed because they had a 1 inch bow i n the wall. The bow in the wall was due to APEX's contractors putting inch of thin set or mortar behind the tile, inch thick!
The floor pan was not sealed or glued correctly. This was pointed out to me two other contractors who have given us bids.
APEX also did not install the left counter properly so they cut the stone back splash and side splash to try to make it fit. They cut the back splash uneven.
They broke fixtures in the bathroom.
I had to make them put insulation back in the walls.
Apex did paint behind the counters in the bathroom.
Apex contractors would show up and work for a couple of hours and then leave to g to another job. At times they didn't even show up.
I was told not to worry about the job in progress but the end result. If your foundation on the job is not right the finished product will be junk!
APEX would lie to us about job finish date. They would tell us we will be done by this Friday, but the tile had not been ordered or was not going to in till the next week.
The contractors would sit out back and smoke under my Gazebo! One of the guys had his girl friend hanging out all day. They did fire him after I brought this up.
I had to tell them to not smoke under my Gazebo, don't put your stuff on my grill, do not smoke on my porch, do not turn on my outside fans and for them to clean up after themselves.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Meghan Burns
text: Horrible, horrible!!! Do terrible work, and tell you they will be there at a time, then not there.. and no contact.

name: soule64
text: First off, a 1-star rating is too good for this company. Apex was referred to me by USAA for a water damage insurance claim that occurred in early December, and they just now finished. This was not a huge project - about 8 sheets of drywall and 2 doors, and I elected to paint, yet it still took nearly 4 months to complete. The drywall work was so bad that it took me an entire weekend to prepare it for paint. Debris was dumped in my trash can despite them billing for removal. I voiced my concerns with a quality manager, but heard nothing else after. Communication with Apex was frustratingly bad. Calls to project managers would go to voicemail and would not be returned. Weeks went by without updates despite my numerous calls and texts. I don't know how these guys are still in business, but I do plan on voicing my concerns with USAA to at least get them off their recommenced list so this never happens to another veteran.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: DelAnn Sundwall
text: These young men were very friendly. The problems were, they didn’t return very often (nor when they said they would come) to check on the progress of drying out our home, we had to change positions of fans because they would not returning for long periods of time. Apex was careless in how they performed their work, the equipment was running so long (unchecked) that it killed a large section of our grass. We finally had to move around the equipment in the yard to keep from killing more grass. They finally picked up all there equipment 30 days later.  After job completed we had a heating and air person check in crawl space, only to find Apex left some duct work torn. We are insured through USAA AND ALL THIS HAS BEEN FILED WITH THEM. I PLEADED WITH USAA TO NOT USE APEX FOR FUTURE WORK.  I hope this helps anyone in search of a restoration company.

name: Krystina Teal
text: I would give zero stars if I could. This company is so unorganized and couldnt keep anything straight. I gave them our information multiple times and they could never keep it straight. After aeveral attempts to talk to the person they sent out to look at our roof, I decided to go with somosom else .

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Krystina Teal. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with us on (256) 883-6000 and we'd be happy to help you out.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kimberly Flynn
text: Great experience working with APEX. Would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We strive to have all of our customers feel this way about us. Please let me know if there is anything that we can do for you in the future.
