name: Mike P
text: My parents recently hired this company to take care of some heavy pruning for a large magnolia tree.  As it turned out, they needed some additional work and the guys on site were more than happy to take care of the work.   My parents don’t use Google reviews so they asked me to add their experience since they were so pleased with this Company, it’s employees and their great service.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We appreciate you and your parents.

name: Lawana Rooks
text: I highly recommend Action Tree service! Dennis and his crew removed two large fallen trees from our home after the recent tornado damage in South Roebuck. Action tree service kept their word and had the trees removed the same day. Excellent customer service!

name: moe money
text: Best tree service in town .

name: Jake Hodges
text:
Had a large tree come down across the driveway. Called Action and they were there within minutes.
Dennis and his crew did a great job and cleaned up afterwords. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you Jake for your kind review.  We enjoy our work and are happy to work for you.

name: Clement kouassi
text: I get no word to describe their professionalism I can call tbem flash they sooo speed, they don't care about money, they just wanna make the job done,they are crazy in the good way of the world thanks guys,I give you extra stars 🌟🌟🌟

name: E Malone
text: Highly recommended

resp.text: THANKS!

name: jack Terrell
text: That was the most respectful courteous keep up the good work

resp.text: You’re very kind, thank you, Monica with Action Tree.

name: Tessa Daniel
text: Needs to teach his drivers to driver or learn himself. Nearly caused an accident by pulling out in front of me on Hwy 31. Then had the nerve to shoot me a bird because I blew my horn at him. I had to slam on my brakes and screech my tires to avoid hitting him.  He pulled out in front of me taking up both southbound lanes of traffic. If your driving a truck pulling a trailer with a bob cat on it , I would suggest you be a little more cautious or I hope that you have very good liability limits on your insurance.

resp.text: Heavy equipment (T870Bobcat) pulls out and uphill much too slow for our liking too; we apologize for the inconvenience.  Shooting the bird, or any obscenities, are never acceptable.  Thank you for bringing this behavior to our attention.

name: Kristen McIntosh
text: Very professional crew who went out of their way to cut large trees that were located in very tight spots near our house and shed. Friendly in person and responsive on the phone. I would recommend them.

name: Jared & Renee Vincent
text: HORRIBLE business practices. They will NOT complete the job and say they did. GET YOUR AGREEMENT IN WRITING, WITH DETAIL!!!!!!  They completely ripped us off, took advantage of the hurricanes and our out of town father, to NOT finisht the job. DO NOT USE THEM! They'll make a deal with you and then you cannot get a hold of them, good luck!

name: Darren Owens
text: Leo and his crew are fast , honest, friendly,  and professional!! The crew did and excellent job!! I would highly recommend them! Thanks again Leo and crew.

name: Catherine McCaslin
text:
So happy with their work!

I called because I heard on their commercial that they trimmed palm trees. We desperately needed to remove a large dead palm and trim up the other four. They Happened to be in Mobile for the day and came out almost immediately. They did the job in record time, everything looks great and we were very pleased with the price.

name: Chase Lynch
text: 5 stars all day long. Leo and his crew were able to remove a large oak tree that hung over my house. It was a very tricky job, that was done professionally and affordable. I highly recommend WE TRIM TREES and will use them in the future

name: CNT DUKU
text: Best tree service in the area by far! Leo does amazing work for a great price. They cut down some trees for me and were even kind enough to mulch them for me. If you need trees cut in the area Hel-Co is the way to go!

name: Paige Townley
text: Leo and his crew went above and beyond to help us out on very short notice. We contacted him on Sunday and he and his crew were there on Monday morning at 8am ready to work. We had two large pecan trees that were overhanging the house, HVAC system and carport. Not only did they take care of those two trees for us effortlessly, but they also helped me out that morning when my car wouldn’t start HA. - not part of the gig, but they were so kind and willing to help. Great group of guys!

name: Courtney McLarty
text: Great company! They do a great job and, are very hard workers.

name: Karen Pecoraro
text: He never bothered to call back

name: Drew Kerley
text: Had a huge oak tree fall in my back yard. Got multiple quotes and Brian's pricing was best, so I went with him. His entire team was courteous and professional. They were efficient and did an outstanding job removing the tree and cleaning up all debris. Would use again in a heartbeat!

name: Greg Moore
text: This tree company is the best! Been taking care of our trees for many years now. Brian and his crew are very friendly and professional. They always clean yard before leaving premises. Highly recommend this company!

name: Daniel Jackson
text: I sent out 2 requests for estimates Brians was the best. Service was prompt, he removed 2 very large dead trees. Very pleased with his work.

name: Lori Miller
text: Single mom here...just had four trees cut down and one trimmed, and couldn't be happier with the service and price.  Won't hesitate to call them again.

name: Freeman Presson
text: Just facilitated a cat rescue for us; it went really well. Also got an estimate for a limb removal. Super nice people, quick service (I'm nearby). Prices are competitive.

name: Kim Balzli
text: I have seen him in action at my neighbor's house and he was quick and got the job done!

name: Tammy Yingling
text: Never seen

name: Cheri Johnson
text: Amazing work at a fair price and when he says he will call, be there or call back later, he does!  We had a huge tree next to the house and they worked safely and quickly to get the job completed.  We highly recommend!!

name: Brian Strait
text: I called Donnie at 830 on a Tuesday and he was at my house giving me an estimate by 915. We discussed the scope of work and he quote me a very reasonable price. The tree was leaning over a 1000 sq foot deck, outdoor bar and swimming pool. He said I'll be here Thursday to take care of it. Thursday morning Donnie and another gentleman (forgot his name) arrived and he scales the tree and had it on the ground in about 80 mins (see pics attached). Donnie did what he said he was going to do and was very profesional and polite throughout the whole process. If you're looking for someone who will show up and do what he says he is going to do then give him a call. I'll be using Woodland from this point forward! Give him a call you won't be disappointed.

name: Prentiss Griffith
text: Donnie Pitts, the owner, is a good man. He will do what he says. Does excellent work at a very fair price.

name: patsy pryor
text: Donnie Pitts is an acrobat with a chain saw! He does exactly what he says he can do and his  team works together professionally and with precision. They are personable  and  have attention to safety  for his team that relieved me. he completed exactly in the time frame I had to have ,it doesn't get any better. I will recommend at every opportunity. Thnx Donnie!!

name: Zani Family
text: Super awesome people and amazing work! Would recommend to anyone!

name: Michael Hamby
text: Did a awesome job. My trees was in bad area’s and they professionally knew how to lay them down. Would highly recommend using this company. And I will be using them in a future date.

name: ChrisSaldana4real
text: Great friendly service

name: Living Man
text: Awesome

name: Elaine Littleton
text: I have called upon York tree service on more than one occasion and have been more than pleased with the work they have done for me; exceeded my expectations on service and cost. I am thankful to find trustworthy people to call when I need something done- York tree service has earned my complete trust!

name: Tim Webb
text: Excellent work! Great customer service. Very reasonable and fair price. Highly recommend!

name: Traci Frees
text: If you need anything done, use this guy! He does exactly what he says he will do, his prices are fair, and he does a first rate job. He and his guys are very polite and easy to work with. He took down about 5 of our trees, trimmed 3, and ground the stumps. They are so accurate in dropping large limbs in tight places. You will not be disappointed.

name: charlie neal
text: Called George (the owner), he came out to look at our dead tree within the hour. He came the next day and cut it down. He made it look easy! Everything went well. Affordable, reliable, and professional.

name: XXXKOUNTRY FAM
text: We had just bought a new home. And needed  some trimming  done  and  whight taken off a very  large  oak  over  the  house . We called yorks  he  was  on  time  did  what he said he would..showed  up  with the equipment  to do the job. Him and his guys was very respectful.  Did a great  job.  We will be calling u guys again thanks.

name: Decie
text: Isbell handled the spray foam insulation, vinyl, and gutters on my new construction. The cost was fair and the work was quick and accurate. Keith did a great job sharing information and getting the work done in a timely manner. Steve did a hell of a job on the vinyl, and left not a single shred of material on the ground at the end of each day. The spray foam is one of the best decisions that we made for this house. The black gutters against the white house look awesome. Good job guys!

name: Chris Kozak
text: Keith and his crew put a deck next to our above ground pool.  It surpassed our expectations, and the craftsmanship is outstanding.  We are beyond pleased with their work.  We had a few small adjustments but thanks to the quick communication and responsiveness to our changes by Keith, the project finished in a timely manner and surpassed our initial vision of what it was going to look like.  We will call Isbell and Keith when we decide to do our siding and patio covering.  Thanks Keith and Isbell for a professional job well done!

name: Hayden Reed
text: I recently had some siding and exterior trim work done on my house, and Isbell did a fantastic job. Working with Keith was easy and they delivered on time at a great value. They went above and beyond to ensure every cap was clean and square and even readjusted my screen door in the process. Would highly recommend and will be using Isbell again in the future.

name: Lynda Fields
text: Isbell siding made my home look better than new!! I'm so proud...thanks!!

name: Wanda Littleton
text: Twice we have used Isabel services for window replacement and both times we were very pleased with the job.  They use quality products and install them with care.  I highly recommend them.

name: Robert Sabbagh
text: Isbell siding built us a  fabulous top for our existing deck. The top was good looking and strong, enough for a good size man to walk on the top of it with no regret, Mat done all the work himself and was very polite and friendly during all his work. Keith Kennemur  gave us a great quote and came by  a lot to check on the progress in building our new top. If you decide to build a top for your deck ask for the Sana Fe kit. you will love it as we do. Bonnie and Bob Sabbagh  Cottondale, AL

name: Captain Chris
text: Did a great job on replacing some windows. Keith is a great guy to have come out! Fast service and windows look great!

name: Patricia Atkins
text: Outstanding and excellent quality work on my screened in porch and patio cover. I highly recommend them.

name: RJ Thompson
text: The absolute worst, rudest business experience I have ever seen. Isbell Services installed the roof on my home and I called to set up an inspection after I had two leaks that damaged my sheetrock. The owner contacted me and stated that I would have to find someone else, they don't stand behind their product and hung up. I would be extremely cautious using Isbell for ANY service.

resp.text: This review is very inaccurate. The house he is speaking of was roofed by Isbell for another home owner 8 years ago. He wanted us to come and do repairs for free and was told the warranty was nontransferable. Apparently he did not like the answer. Also I (Jeff Isbell) am the owner of Isbell Services and I would never hang up on a customer Write or Wrong.

name: Rebecca Parris
text: This is our 2nd house that we have used them for gutters the crew did a awesome and flawless job.  Can’t wait for the rain!!! 😊

name: Christi Wood
text: Isbell Services was the roofing contractor for my townhome complex built 3 years ago.  We have had significant roof leaks this fall, and Isbell evidently offered only 12 months of warranty on their roofing work.  what good is a 30 year shingle if it's installed incorrectly, and the installer doesn't stand by their work?!!

name: Sibyl Fondren
text: It took a few days to come out for the job but I later understood why. They must be in high demand due to their impeccable work and customer service! They had the job done (replacing brick with vinyl siding over a garage with drooping lintel) efficiently and professionally. A few bricks from another area of the facade came off after repair and installation. They came and repaired it a couple of days later without a call having to be made. Our family will recommend and definitely use Isbell again for any home repairs!

name: Jason Polancich
text: Another example of an unreliable local Tuscaloosa home improvement company. Had them out week before Thanksgiving for a quote to replace/repair gutters on a historic home in downtown Tuscaloosa. Was told Id have a quote out by the next week and they'd be able to start within a couple weeks. Two weeks went by and no quote. I called them, was transferred to a rep named Mike "who handles all the gutters." He told me he'd follow back up with me by the afternoon. Now, first week of January, called back and got mike who said "We're not going to be able to help you on that job." Im guessing it was too low a cost threshold for them, but it would have been very nice to have known that back in November. Great people. Don't advertise gutter repair/replacement if you dont actually do the work!

name: Joseph Mcguire
text: I'm a grad student who just bought their first home. Being incredibly busy during working hours, Isbell was super easy to work with via email and text to arrange for gutter installation. They color matched to my paint without my even thinking about it, were quick, and overall did a great job.

name: Daniyell Henderson
text: Cause answer all your questions they do a great job very good customer services

name: Joe Fey
text: We offer a wide range of Home Improvement amenities. From Siding, Roofing, Gutters to Windows.and Insulation. We have great salesman who promptly and properly explain what our services are. Also we have very dedicated work crews who are diligent and prepared to get the job done in an efficient and expedient manner. Call us today to make your home hey more efficient and good-looking place to live

name: Ray Miller
text:
They replaced some soffits, fascia and gutters after tree fell and damaged house. i was quite pleased with their work and their price. Their workers were courteous and knowledgeable of what they were doing. They got in and made  repairs quickly.  They are in demand so you may need to wait a week or two until they can get to you, but for the quality and price it is worth being a little patient. I will definitely call them again should the need arise. I do recommend them if you need their services.

I had Isbell Insulation come out again this week and add a board and batten siding product to part of the front of my house. Frank and Jeff came in the morning and work was completed by lunch time. I could have not been more pleased with their quality of work and professionalism. These technicians really take a lot of pride in their work and it shows. This product has about half inch insulation rigid backing that makes it more solid. Looks like actual wood when driving up to the house. It matches other wooden board and batten we have on front of our house. I was tired of painting and replacing weather worn boards. We ordered color that matches the paint we have on the house. No more on ladder for me on this particular wall of the house. Once again i do recommend Isbell. Really nice technicians that do a great job. As other time price i believe was real reasonable.

name: Raymond Milner
text: Will not return calls after job is completed when customer is not satisfied

name: Slow and Curious !
text:
Did not get any work from this company but the guy I talked to on the phone was terrible with customer service, cost them my business forsure. Asked me when I would be free to have him come out and give me a quote, I responded 3pm - and after and he could not fit that into his schedule, anyday of the week.

No problem I will find someone else, and I did.

name: Keith Kennemur
text: Isbell put gutters on my pole barn house I built. It’s a metal roof on an 8/12 pitch. So the water flies off. The 6” gutters handles all the water on the first big rain I had.

name: Kimberly Davis
text: Thank you, Isbell Services, for doing such a great job installing my new roof and vinyl siding. The work was done in a very timely and professional manner with "doing the job right" at the top of your list. Your company provided me with the best price, the workmanship was of the highest quality, and most importantly you always stand behind your work. I will personally recommend your services to all my friends and colleagues.

name: Julie Salter
text: The guys at Isbell were great to work with for our roof repair. We got someone out to our house really quickly and they were able to repair the roof for us that week. This company was easy to work with and I would use them again!

name: Joey Barnett
text: I’ve heard good things about the work that they do, but I didn’t make it as far as to see their work for the lady that answered the phone. Very rude, short, and demeaning.

name: Kelsey Williams
text: Super easy to work with and did a fantastic job!

name: Laney Hamner
text: The men at isbell were a pleasure to work with. They were very considerate of what I wanted. I plan to use isbell again in the future. I will be recommending them to all my family and friends.

name: Billy Morris
text: Good

name: James Fields
text: Quality Service

name: Ailie Inc
text: Work done with integrity...

name: wolf lonnah
text: Nice

name: Kelli Taylor
text: I built my dream home with a certain look in mind. I credit Isbell Services with working outside the box, envisioning each detail with me and bringing my dream to fruition! The Sales staff and each employee was very professional and always helpful. I can honestly say, when Frank completed the vinyl and fiber cement around the perimeter of my home, there wasn’t a punch list. Literally, everything is absolutely perfect! Selecting Isbell Services to do work on my new home was the best decision I made throughout the building process!

name: Horace “Boogie” Copridge
text: I didn't use their service; they recommended me to another agency, sense they were booked for several days.

name: Chuck B
text:
Crew did a great job, very professional and at a great price.  They left the property exactly as they found it (minus the tree I wanted removed).

I'll absolutely call them again if we need more work done.

name: Lin Cochran
text: Bama Bob and his crew did a great job cutting down a large tree in our backyard this summer. We'd been turned down by another tree removal company because the access to our backyard was too narrow, but Bob was able to get all his equipment in through a 36" gate.  Fast work and good cleanup!  Stump grinding was amazing. Well worth waiting until he could fit us in.  Thanks, Bob!

name: Steve Cook
text: Bama Bob's crew did a very professional job in removing a large tree. They cleaned up and left the work area in a better shape than it was. Pleased with price and time to do the job. Highly recommend them for your tree work.

resp.text: thanks Steve

name: Lisa Knott
text:
Came to do an estimate. Seemed excessively high (12k vs a 3k and 6k estimate) But I didn't mention that to him. I asked for a 2 prices, one to just cut 3 trees to the ground, and one to also cut to lengths we could split ourselves into firewood.  He insisted that he absolutely could not just cut my trees to the ground and leave them. He went on about what a mess it would leave, and that it would "be the same price" if I cut it up or he cleaned it all away, so I should just let him take the large oak tree's wood. I explained that my husband had already cut 2 other trees like them and cut them up at his leisure. Finally he just said "I can't do this job, goodbye" and left. Wow. Maybe he was having a bad day, but someone needs PR skills.
Edit:
I most certainly did NOT ask for "50 different ways" to cut my trees. I had 3 trees, and wanted cost to cut and leave, and cut down, then cut up for firewood. The only question extra was if it would be a happy medium as far as cost to cut up only the huge oak tree. That's THREE prices. He definitely saw dollar signs when quoting me 12k to cut my trees and take that huge oak tree's wood.

resp.text: I was not able to do work for this lady and she is correct after asking 50 different ways of cutting a tree And how I should do it I had to leave. Maybe her husband can take care of it not every trays the same I hope she had a good job done

name: Rosa Wells
text: I had a large tree removed from my front yard and we were very happy with the service. They were professional and had great equipment that made the job go smoothly.  I would definitely recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you very much Miss Wells I’m glad you had a great experience we try to do the best we can do with what we got! Call again anytime Bob Bama Bob’s Tree Service

name: Richard Taylor
text: They did a wonderful job. I would highly recommend this company

name: John Russell
text: Good boys. They work hard and are concientous of what they are doing.

name: John Bernhard
text: I just hired Bob and his crew to trim a some branches.  The branches were seriously huge (the biggest was >18" diameter) and overhung my home...not an easy job. Bob was good about keeping me informed regarding arrival (with all the rain this spring).  The crew was friendly and did a good safe job.  The price was very fair for the work involved and they cleaned up nicely.  I would certainly call them again.

resp.text: Thanks, John!

name: steven hypes
text: These guys have taken down some seriously big trees on a couple different jobs for me. They are very knowledgable with great pricing.

name: Misty Lebischak
text: He was very timely and reasonably priced compared to others. He did an excellent job on the stump removal. I would definitely use him again. Now my neighbors are using him.

name: Megan Cain
text: I called Bama Bob to ask him to remove a tree for us. He told me to send him a picture and he would reply with an estimate. That was 5 days ago. I never received an estimate or had him get back with me. I will not be doing business with him again. I have since found another person to remove our tree.

resp.text: Sorry I cannot get back to you I’m usually pretty good about it technicalities do happen sorry for the inconvenience I hope you had a good job done!

name: Adam Watson
text: Was skeptical at first due to some of the reviews. Called Bob and he made it over within 24 hours to cut 5 trees for me. Needed quick service to allow dump truck access to my new home site. Verified twice of price and allowed him and his crew to continue. They were in and out within an hour and absolutely left me blown away by the attention to detail. I highly recommend this service if you're looking for tree removal. Just let the man work and be amazed when he is finished!

name: Jessica B Robinson
text: Bob removed 3 trees for me at a great price compared to other local companies. He and his crew performed the work in one day and cleaned up the site prior to leaving. I highly recommend Bama Bob's Tree Service!

name: Tracie Travels
text:
Bama Bob came to the rescue today !!!! We had terrible storm damage and a large tree down in our yard. His crew removed all evidence of the tree smoothed out our yard and left it looking great. They were very professional and courteous to me. His price was very reasonable!!! I highly recommend him and his crew for any of your tree service needs!!! Thanks Bama Bob!!!

Sincerely ,Tracie Bowman

name: Candice Cotton
text: Needed trees cut but they Never returned my phone call

resp.text: Call me back I don’t know who this is!

name: James Alan
text: Great service, very professional and awesome prices. Did a excellent job grinding my stumps. Thank you BAMA BOB will be using you again in the future. From James in UNION GROVE AL

name: Bert Hubbell
text: This is the second time I have had Bama Bob to my home to remove trees and grind stumps. I could not be more happy with his work. His crew did an excellent job, again. I will always use him when needed. He is both courteous and professional.

name: Taylor G
text: Very professional crew, they did a fantastic job removing a dead tree AND stump from my backyard! Absolutely recommend. Thanks again!

name: Ent Reception
text: If I could figure out how to give 0 stars, I would. Came by my house and gave me an estimate and a day to come out and said he would bring a contract the morning we scheduled the work to be done. He did not provide any liability insurance certificate at that time but assured me that he had liability insurance and that he would bring that along with the contract. Then he changed the day on me. Said we had agreed on a different day, so that messed up my work schedule. Then on the day he finally was supposed to come, his crew showed up without a contract or any liability insurance certificate. I called him 4 times and his VM was full, Sent him a text message and he never responded. I refused to allow the crew to start with out the proof of insurance or a signed contract. Finally he answered his phone and was mad at  me because he "can't afford to pay my crew to stand around for 30 more minutes while I drive to your location". He said I was costing him money by not allowing the work to start. I finally put my fiance' on the phone with him. After some discussion, Bob demanded payment in cash or certified check before the job even started. I asked him how much and he upped the rate we had previously agreed on by $50. I told him I would get the cash, show him I had the cash, but he wouldn't get a penny until the job was done. He said I gave him "bad vibes" about doing business with me. At this point, after I had power disconnected from my house at his request and was an hour late for work I fired Bob and sent his crew away. DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS MAN!

resp.text: I have work for thousands of people in the Huntsville area, and there’s some I cannot work for and this was one of them sorry for any inconvenience but some people are not a match for each other just because I have a business doesn’t mean I have to be held to different standards and the truth really comes out not just what you say but what you do.

name: Ami
text: Fast, reasonable, and professional. We have used him twice (for total tree removal/stump grinding and for branch trimming) and had great experiences both times. Highly recommend!

name: Raymond van Outer
text: I was on vacation in Madison Alabama for 12 days, at my girlfriend's house and we both over the age of 50.. Bama Bob's tree service was suppose to be there on a Friday, they called that day twice to give us delays in their arrival. The third call cancelled Friday and confirmed for Saturday.  They arrived around 9 am and we're slow in getting started. Everything was going well until they dropped the trees without removing the tops, which was what they were supposed to do. Bama Bob did not give a written estimate, or written instructions to the less than competent crew. Only one of the crew was working, the other two stood around and one played with his cell phone all day. They dropped the trees, with out topping them, and damaged two other trees and other items in the yard. Then it started to rain then they left without letting us know, they just left. Then through the rest of the following week until the day before I had to return home, he would be at other jobs without completing ours. Also, Bob was not very interested in the damage his crew caused but after much bickering he reduced the price a bit. So after rain delays and Bob not showing up, it is day 11 of my trip and they are finally here. They said they would be here first thing in the morning and they showed up at noon or so, now another wasted day with Bob and his crew, but the job is at least done. As an Army retiree I expected a bit more professionalism from his company, but it didn't happen.

resp.text: I cut down trees I don’t control the weather we go as fast and safe as we can and that’s all we can do!

name: Chaz Sal
text: Great service, great price, dependable and professional, highly recommend!

name: Joseph Childers
text: Very professional...Work was done in a timely manner..the price was fair..and the crew was amazing..5/5 ..I will definitely use Bama Bob for future tree service

name: Sherry Bonds
text: Confusing!

name: Charles King
text: Branching Out removed a dead Magnolia tree for me.  The estimate was provided in a timely manner and they were able to do the job relatively soon after the estimate.  They were on time, removed the tree as specified, and cleaned up the yard good as new.  The price was fair and the work was high quality.  I'll be using them again for all of my tree removal needs.

name: Sandy Boone
text: Branching Out Tree Service does way above average work and I HIGHLY recommend them. Doug (and Joel) worked hard to bring down 5 trees. And then trimmed one. They worked very hard on a really hot day and raked everything up, loaded their trailer with all the wood, and protected (carefully) our shed and other trees from damage. I did not have to clean up a thing when they were done - amazing! Doug is an expert about trees and it’s a one man show taking down monsters. He ended up coming out on an emergency basis (one split and began to fall towards power lines), same day, a lot faster than I thought he’d be able to, and he kept it from falling on the power lines. Thank you Doug for your integrity and expertise. We are blessed to have met him.

name: Stephanie Miller
text: Doug did an absolutely amazing job for us!! We had 7 large tree trunks about 5 feet tall each. He removed the trunks and then ground the stumps. We cannot even tell those stumps were there!! Very professional and outstanding work. We highly recommend!!

name: Mae Crane
text: Doug did an amazing job trimming a huge tree in my backyard.  He set a scheduled and constantly keep me updated on the process I also felt his price was very fair.  I would recommend his service again.

name: Jeri Roser
text:
Branching Out Tree Service is amazing! When I called for an estimate, Doug was on time, checked out all we needed to have done and discussed with my husband and me some options. He was very professional and answered all of our questions. We appreciated the extra time he gave us to discuss several alternatives.
The estimate was very fair and the work he did was very professional. Doug is so knowledgeable and helped us so much. He is kind and patient and went the extra mile to make sure that we would be happy with the decisions we were making. He does excellent work and has always surpassed our expectations!!

name: Tim Powell
text:
I have used this service several times to my complete satisfaction.  Twice they were able to remove trees that overhung fences without touching them.

When I asked about removing limbs on a certain type of tree, they recommended against it and gave good reasons which convinced me.

They were courteous and left the yard in better shape than when they arrived, including carrying the trees and debris away.

I have unreservedly recommended them to friends who needed their services and will continue to do so.

name: Belinda Raymond
text: Doug, sorry it has taken me a while to write a review of the tree removal and the vista that you created on our other tree. Very impressed with the attention you gave to safety. The job was very well thought out and professionally executed. My wife and I are both very pleased with the removal and cleanup which was exceptional itself. We will gladly recommend your services. Again thank you. Frank.

name: Elise W
text: Doug and his crew took down a large black walnut tree and several other semi dead trees for us this week and did a great job! There were about 1,000 walnut pods in the yard to clean up and they got them all!  They left us some great firewood to cut and hauled everything else away. He is a great guy to work with a very responsive and kept us updated as the week progressed.  I will definitely be hiring them again when we decide to take down a couple more big trees in our front yard.

name: Parker Gillum
text: Doug did a great job for a great price. He was courteous, on-time and knowledgeable. I would definitely use him again!

name: Tori Trudeau
text: Very quick response time. Extremely helpful  and beyond kind. Went over and beyond to assist with my tree removal. Need more great companies like this. Would recommend to any and everyone i could.

name: sngn2ns
text:
Doug has completed several tree projects at our house in Madison. I will continue to call him for my tree needs and will continue to recommend him to my friends and family.  He is extremely competent, timely, and has always been polite and dependable.  His rates are low because he does most of the work himself. I've asked him to come out for estimates and everytime they are free and informative. In fact, one time he talked me out of a job because he believed the hickory tree added value to the house! I always appreciate his honesty, candor, and reliability.  He's the go to guy!

Zach
Madison, AL

name: Jim Brodie
text: I had three trees in my front yard that had died or were about to die. Doug came to my house and gave me his honest opinion of what needed to be done. He pulled them up and indeed they were dead.  Honest opinions and honest work. I would recommend him and his company anytime.

name: James Lang
text: Douglas gave me an estimate that was under my other quote.  He showed up on the day he scheduled for me.  I had five large, dead hardwoods cut down.  He was very safe and accurate felling them.  He was friendly and professional.  The wife and I are very pleased with the results.  I have referred my daughter to him and would not hesitate recommending him to others.

name: Mike Morris
text: Doug came out to 2 of my properties and removed trees for me. He was very professional, extremely detailed and did an amazing job. He removed one tree with no effort that someone else said could not be done. I  would highly recommend him over anyone else. Thanks Doug!

name: David Shockey
text: We've used them on several jobs.  Doug always does a great job and has reasonable prices.

name: Thomas Turner
text: Outstanding work done quickly and just like he said it would be.  The work was once, and he triple checked what we wanted done to make sure it was to our satisfaction.  He wanted to make sure that I understood what he was doing, and did everything to make sure the work left  our yard looking good.

name: Mary Withington
text: Branching Out Tree Service has done all my tree work for several years because I trust the expertise, fairness, knowledge and integrity of the owner.  He is prompt, cleans up and offers help with which trees need to come down and which we just need to watch.  I have great respect for this company.

name: monkeying around
text: Doug has cut 23 trees for me in the course of a year. Each one was done correctly and with no damage to surrounding trees or property.  Stumps ground and area cleaned so there is no evidence there ever was a tree there. I highly recommend his company and his services.

name: Don Goffena
text:
Responded promptly to request for bid for tree removal. Worked with me on ways to cut cost. Scheduling was tight,   crew arrived early and finished job well ahead of schedule. Good clean up, no wasted time. Would not hesitate to recommend.

Don

name: Debi N.
text: I have used this service twice and both jobs were completed with no issues.  He provides a great service with a great price for all that is done. I would recommend his services to anyone!! :)

name: Heather Meacham
text: Doug is extremely knowledgeable on trees.  He was very professional and trustworthy.  It was a blessing to work with someone so kind and nice.

name: Christy Todd
text: I had a tree leaning toward my house with roots coming up and a storm was coming. He came immediately and tied the tree to secure it and aim it away from my house until it could be cut down the next day . I had seen a lot of good reviews from my Nextdoor app and my neighbors recommended him as well . Thanks to his prompt response I was able to sleep in peace that night !

name: Miguel Stricklen
text: I randomly searched the internet for a tree service and Branching Out Tree Service came up. Doug listened to the pickle I had gotten myself into, and assured me he could help. He came out to assess and estimate. He immediately used his equipment and took down the tree. I asked his opinion on a second tree and we ended up cutting g that one down too. Doug's professionalism, vast knowledge, and willingness to help people turned an unpleasant situation into a positive experience that I am truly grateful for. His service and prices are unmatched by anyone.

name: Ken Strickland
text: We would highly recommend this service. Had 11 trees removed last week. They were on time everyday and couldn’t have done a better job. They were very respectful of our property and to us personally. Their fee was very reasonable and they could start right away. It was a pleasure meeting Doug, Shelby, and Harry and we will definitely use them again.

name: James Allison
text: I had a small, but very exact job that needed to be done. Doug didn't hestitate to take the job and didn't charge some outrageous minimum price to come out. He did the work for a very fair price, performed the job promptly, and did exactly what was needed. As well as being very professional, Doug was extremely pleasant to talk with and spent the time to find out exactly what my needs were. I will be using him again in the fall for some more limb removal...

name: David Hall
text:
We had several mature (10 - 18 year old) trees removed in Oct. '19. Among them were three huge Leyland cypress', a flowering cherry, a huge holly, a crepe myrtle, a pistache and several other small trees.

Doug did a GREAT job. He arrived on-time for the initial survey and promptly sent us an estimate. He also arrived on-time a couple of days later to begin removal. He spent 2 days to remove the trees and do clean-up. He also applied herbicide to all of the stumps to ensure they would not send up shoots.

After waiting a week or so for the herbicide to do it's job, Doug returned (on-time!) and ground down the stumps, then did more clean-up. When he was finished, except for a few wood chips and flat, bare earth, you couldn't tell that any trees were ever there.

Doug is a true professional. He's courteous, friendly and easy to talk to. And he knows trees - how to care for them, how to prune them, how to remove them.

Would we use Branching Out again? Yes!
Could you find someone else to do it cheaper? Probably...
Would they do as quality a job? No way.
Would you regret your poor decision to hire someone other than Branching Out? Yes. Yes you would.

name: Charlene Robinson
text: Mr. Cure and his crew did an outstanding job! Excellent work at a more than fair price. He and his crew were easy to talk to and work with. We will never look for another company to help prune or remove old trees. We were highly satisfied.

name: Der Kong
text: Fantastic!  Doug transformed our oak tree and it looks fantastic.  I hired them to remove some low branches and to clean up the tree and what they did was stunning.  The tree looks beautiful.  I liked the tree before but it looks soooo goood now I cant believe its the same tree!   They are professional, safe, on time, had good communication, and prices that were very fair.  Hire them...

name: Teresa Russo
text: I needed several trees removed and was fortunate actually blessed to find Doug. His pricing is competitive but much more than that he not only is professional doing a great job and clean up, he and his crew are amazingly courteous, polite, friendly and went far beyond my expectations. He kept me up to date on the progress of the job and explaining the process each step of the way. I wholeheartedly recommend him and his team!!

name: Marnie Fautuaalii
text: Very professional,  prompt, reasonable and did a great job.  Will definitely use again.

name: Dimitrios Stathopoulos
text: I used Doug to grind 3 Bradford Pear stumps and he did an excellent job.  He doesn't leave your yard with a huge pile of debris that will cost extra to remove.   Wouldn't hesitate to use him in the future for any tree related needs.

name: Al Davis
text: Do not invite these folks on your property. Very stand off attitude and refused to do an estimate.

name: Bill Moquin
text:
Arrived on time, work was done according to plan, they did a great job and cleaned up afterwards.

The also gave my advice on how to maintain the look of my trees.

I’ve already scheduled and appointment for next fall!!!

Highly recommend Branching Out Tree Service!!!

name: Douglas Cure
text: Specializes in low impact pruning, tree removal, emergency rigging, and professional service.  Firewood and stump grinding also available on request.

name: Jimmie Taylor
text: Did excellent work

name: SouthEast Turf Care
text: Great service and adorable prices!

name: DavNan Larch
text: Just want to thank Jack being such a wonderful businessman and taking care of fixing our gate. Jamie Stewart is a awesome asset to Hemstock Tree Care. He fixed our fence and replaced our gate in a few hours. So professionally done and such an OUTSTANDING tree company . I would never hire anyone else to tackle my yard work. Thank you Jack and Jamie again.

name: Carl Herring
text: I contacted Hemstock Tree Service to cut some trees and big limbs over and close to my house and shop. The crew came out and did an outstanding job! They were very professional and executed the job perfectly.  I dealt with Cliff, Jack, and Billy about different aspects of the job and they were outstanding to work with! Hemstock communicated with me before, during and after the job. I could not have found a better company to do the job. Thanks to Hemstock, my property is better protected now and I give them an A+++ rating. Carl Herring

name: Larry Crim
text:
I contracted Hemstock to cut and remove several trees from my property.
They cut the trees but have never removed them.  It has been 12 days and the trees are still laying on the ground.  I've contacted their representative and he keeps promising they will be removed.  However, now they are not returning my phone calls.  I've paid them $3950, but now I doubt if the trees will ever be removed.

name: calli kittie
text: Ground was too wet and we asked if we should reschedule to avoid damage. They assured us they would not damage yard and brought plywood they did not use. Sprinkler heads were broken, lattice on a shed was broken when the tree fell beside it and they did not bother to tell us. They did not reinstall fence for  2 weeks. Several pieces of equipment  was parked in front of neighbors homes for several days. They left hundreds of broken twigs in the yard and changed the back and side yard to a mud pit.

name: james gibson
text: Never got work done. They missed appointments 3 time. I have been over a month trying to get a tree cut down that is looming over my house. Quoted me a decent price, but I kept getting pushed to the “if we get it” list it seems.

name: The Awakening Enthusiast
text: Absolutely AMAZING SERVICE! The day it snowed last week our heat wasn't working so I called to see about firewood. Even though the weather was terrible and most everyone was shut down the guy still delivered wood to my home in Madison. He was super nice and very prompt. I highly recommend this service to anyone who needs it. If every business ran like this one the world would be a much better place. I will be calling them for all my tree care needs and firewood.

name: Kelli Green
text: If you live in the Huntsville or Madison area, I highly recommend Hemstock tree service.When I called for an estimate, Cliff, the owner came out that day and gave a very reasonable price. They came and did the work the next day. They were very professional and did a great job! I would recommend them to anyone. Thanks so much!

name: TGC
text: We had Cliff and his crew remove two trees on 3/27/2017, both rotted and leaning towards the neighbors house, approx 60-80ft tall. This was a very tough job that needed an experienced professional and the trees were removed safely and successfully. While he and his crew work very hard, what impressed me the most is that he took the time to explain what he was doing to my 8 year old son and teach him about everything that was happening because he was very interested. We had a dead tree next to the ones coming down that had some limbs damaged by falling branches so he instructed his crew to take that down too, that was nice. His team cleaned up and hauled away/chipped the wood quickly and left the yard cleaner than when they got there. I would definitely recommend Cliff and Hemstock Tree Care to anyone needing tree removal, we will be using them again.

name: James Ponder
text: I would highly recommend Hemstock! They were professional, friendly, on time, and they did exactly what they promised. There are some bad tree companies out there, but these guys are the real deal. Quote was also reasonable. Call these guys!!!

name: Krystal Johnson
text: I talked to Cliff at Hemstock last week and today took delivery of 1/2 cord of seasoned hardwood. The price and service are excellent, the 2 young men who delivered the load professional.  We will be doing business again.

resp.text: Mr. Johnson, We would like to thank you for being a valued customer. We are grateful for the pleasure of serving you and meeting your firewood needs! We are looking forward to doing business with again. Thank you most sincerely, Hemstock Tree Care

name: Mike S
text: The firewood is always well seasoned, is cut to the perfect size, and the team is very professional.  I plan to continue doing business with these folks for as long as possible.  Thanks guys.

name: Stephanie Kokan
text:
Cliff and his crew did a fantastic job removing a large tree for us that was damaged in a recent storm.  It was in a tricky location with limited accessibility and it was evident that they really knew what they were doing - they had the whole thing out of there by midmorning with no damage to the adjacent trees that we wanted to keep for privacy, our neighbor's fence, or even our playset which happened to be right in the way.  The whole crew was so polite and pleasant to talk to, and they really took care to protect our lawn from damage while they were working.

We initially chose Hemstock because they were the only company who actually returned my phone call after I contacted multiple places to request an estimate, but we had such a positive experience that I'd definitely choose them again!

name: syretta robbins
text: I tried to contact them about getting some wood and they never returned my email or called me.

name: Mike Voss
text: Great place

name: Stephanie Alvarez
text: Wonderful!! I had a tree fall on my house, they came out the next morning to look and had it removed the next morning.  Thank you!

name: Justin Swift
text: I couldn’t be happier with the service and timing. Great Company! Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Gloria Warren
text: On time, went straight to work. Cleaned up all debris and very professional. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you!! We appreciate you!

name: Melanie Taylor
text: They are good people

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Deb Oh
text: They did a great job. The tree branches were shaped naturally, not just cut off flat. Clean-up was completed quickly

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad you are satisfied with our work!

name: Deborah Anderson
text: Dwayne & his crew do outstanding work.  They show up on time, take care of business & clean up all debris.  I would recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Pat Jowers
text: Great job!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Lynn W
text: why  didn't  you wait more  than  10 seconds  before  leaving, I  had  to  get my  cane

resp.text: Our apologies! We'd like to give you an estimate. Could we reschedule?

name: Sandy Catchot Rosson
text: Tree service

name: James High
text: Chris showed up on time even though he had a flat tire on his truck. Very friendly, professional and neat. We are very pleased with the service provided. Good price and would recommend him to anyone. Thanks for a great job!

name: Greg Cooper
text: Chris is "the guy" to take care of your trees!

name: David Hunnicutt
text: I highly recommend these guys. Chris and his crew are awesome...great service, value, and professionalism. They removed ten fairly big trees and cleaned up thoroughly. It looks great. Skip getting all the other quotes and just hire Chris.

name: Paul Bippen
text: I called Chris' Tree Service because Chris took down a tree at my residence about 10 years ago and did a great job.  Yesterday, Chris took down one large Bradford Pear tree and heavily trimmed one large Hackleberry tree for me.  He was able to come out the day after I spoke with him.  Chris's "Climber", Mark, worked quickly and safely at very high heights.  I watched the entire operation on both trees and Mark's skill level become apparent very quickly as being professional & skilled.  He exhibited acute knowledge as to the cut sequence, the manner of cuts to be made, and the procedure to lower very heavy limbs to avoid a fence that actually adjoined one of the trees.  Joshua provided the ground operation and worked in conjunction with Mark to ensure limbs were dropped in a safe area.  As an old guy who previously worked in Project Management, I tend to grade companies on Cost, Schedule, and Performance.  Chris' Tree Service performed very well (and as we agreed on), was on time and extremely prompt, and at a reasonable cost. text: I’m posting this for my mom who is elderly and was taken advantage of by this company. When he came to collect payment he was asked if he’d be returning to complete the job. He indicated that he would return to complete the job, but needed payment first. He never returned. When he was contacted again he lied about ever agreeing to return. Someone else needed  to be hired to complete the job that he was hired to do and didn’t. Looking into this company after the fact I see that he’s done this before taking advantage of people and taking their money and leaving them with a mess a to clean up. This company is unprofessional you should not use it or trust the word of the owner in any kind of verbal agreement. Never pay him until he’s completed the job he agreed to.

name: Jared Wilkinson
text: Had them raise the canopy on some older oak trees and they did a great job. The price was half what one of their competitors was and in all I would use them again if the price was right. The minus one star was for cleanup and for the pieces they left for firewood. I asked for some of it to be left to use for firewood in a firepit which they were happy to do. The issue is that they left pieces that are 3-4' long which is near impossible to split by hand even with a good splitting maul. I will likely have to haul this to the curb for the city to pickup or rent/buy a chainsaw to be able to use any of the wood.

text: Top notch company! The owner and crew are very knowledgeable, courteous, and professional. They did terrific work on the limbs we needed removing. They even disposed of the limbs for us. text:
I've used them twice to remove trees. This last time they had to remove two XL Oak trees that didn't survive our home construction last year. BOTH were hanging around our new wildflower garden.

I don't know how, but they removed both trees and barely a flake of saw dust fell on our garden. They picked up every stick and even reapplied pine straw to the natural areas that were disturbed.

A+ tree removal service.

resp.text: We are truly grateful for you allowing us the opportunity !

text: Eastern Tree Service removed a large, dying tree in our front yard.  Everything about their service was stellar!  They came when they said they would and did the work in a very professional manner. I highly recommend them and will seek them again if tree service is needed.

Excellent. Professional. Best in town!

text: We could not be happier with the service we got from Easter Tree Service. They were friendly and professional. Also, they were so accommodating. I half expected rolling eyes and a big mess, but it was stacked as I asked, and they regularly double-checked that they were saving what I needed. Plus, they had the most competitive quote. text: I’m a firm believer that you get what you pay for. My experience with Eastern Tree Service shows that it’s possible to get MORE than what you pay for. resp.text: Man , Thank You ! awesome review !!!!We hope we can continue to service you and your home for many ,more years ...

name: Amy Taylor
text: We have had ETS remove several trees for us in the past,  and the service is always fantastic.  So, in the recent storms when we had a small tree fall that was on the house and very close to a power line, we called ETS 24 hour service.  Robert Young, the owner actually called us back himself, and let me send him pictures so he could see what it looked like.  He assured us that since the storms were over, and the way it was resting on the house, we would be fine until morning.  He then came out to the house first thing in the morning to check it and take care of it for us.  Could not ask for better customer service!  Highly recommend this company!

resp.text: We truly appreciate you giving us the opportunity to serve you and your family for all these years !

resp.text: It has been such a pleasure working for you and your family !

text: Eastern Tree Service did a wonderful job! We recently purchased a new home. The previous owners did not maintain any of the landscaping over the last 3 years, so it was quite the jungle out there. I had no idea what I wanted to have done, I just knew it needed to be cleaned up. The team was such a huge help advising me on what to have done to make our yard look nice! Ultimately, we ended up have a hugeeee pear tree, tons of vines and brush, and some large rocks removed. All of the guys I came in contact with were so kind and courteous. I am so grateful!

resp.text: We are excited to help you get adjusted into your new home . We truly hope that God blesses it with Love and Joy !

I have 2 large pecan trees in my back yard which shed limbs periodically and are pretty old.Bob came out today to inspect them and make recommendations for maintaining their health.He suggested removing portions of both trees sometime this winter and reassured me that they are healthy and should be fine.He took time to explain the rationale behind tree maintenance to extend the life of a tree and what to look for if the tree is having problems.He gave me an estimate so I can budget the expense.
Bob put my mind at ease and I look forward to working with him next winter.

resp.text: We are Thankful for your kind words !

text: We had a very positive experience with Eastern Tree Service. Less than an hour after a tree fell on our roof, an estimator pulled into the driveway. text: We had a tree fall on our house in the middle of the night.  The next morning, I called Eastern Tree Service.  They sent out a project manager, Bob, within 30 minutes. I could not thank them enough for their immediate attention to our situation.  Thank you Eastern Tree Service!!!!

resp.text: Thank You ! We are thankful no one was hurt !

The office staff was polite but not very knowledgable and did not return calls, but I was eventually able to talk with someone. Overall a great experience and I will use them again and recommend them to others.

name: Chutney Johnson
text: I am terribly remiss in this post. Called in February, way out for estimate because of the storms. Called again, after storms, and they were in the area. Being Birmingham's only Certified Arborist, they suggested what needed to come down. Discussed what I wanted, and was pleased with the estimate. Day of work, they were on time, and Hubcap, the team leader, walked the yard with me to be sure everyone was on the same page. They worked like dogs all morning, then finally took about a 30 minute break, back to work again. The entire crew was courteous and very friendly. Absolutely no collateral damage, and the yard was neater than when they got there! Little long to get trees picked up, but they had A LOT going on in the area. They did get picked up in a reasonable amount of time. Both me and my 82 year old Mom were very pleased with the results. I have absolutely no hesitation to recommend Eastern Tree Service. They have an excellent reputation, because they earn it every day. When I need tree service again, there is ONLY one place I'm calling, period. Eastern Tree Service. I know I will be pleased with the work they do!

name: Susan Turner
text: Great company, the crews are very friendly and hard working.. They do great work in the time They are there..would tell my friends and family to use them.

I would highly recommend Eastern Tree Service.

These guys are some of the best. I've worked a lot with Robert at Eastern Tree Service and it is clear to me that he cares about his customers and how well that his company takes care of them and the quality of the work.

I could write paragraphs on how much I admire his character and the great company he has built.

I can highly recommend Eastern Tree Service.

name: Leo Vargas
text: I got quotes from 3 separate tree services for 3 trees and eastern was by far the best price. The crew was polite and finished the job in a timely manner. The clean up crew was very good I did not find one single limb from any tree or any spike balls from the sweet gum tree. The only reason I didn't give 5 star is because my back yard yet from green to dirt.

text: I have know the owner since high school (20 years ago) and he has always been nothing less than respectful and kind!  I would trust Robert to handle an tree service that I would ever need!

name: Allen Golightly
text:
I cannot rave enough about Eastern Tree Service. Their Professional  work ethic is outstanding. The team that was assigned to work on my project were very courteous,respectful and professional. They paid extra attention to make sure that no damage was done to my yard, flower beds, and rock wall when they were dropping the 8 trees. The clean up was fantastic. I was surprised at how much care they took to make my yard look as normal as could be. Now, shout outs. First I want to thank Bob Young.  When I first called Eastern Tree I was told that someone would come to survey my job site and give me an estimate of the cost of the job. I figured that it would be about 3-5 days till I saw someone. The very next afternoon Mr. Young arrives and does a very thorough assessment. I was amazed at his knowledge of trees plant life in my yard. And what a professional and gentleman he was. The cost quote blew me away. Not only was it fair it was honest. The second shout out goes to the 2 ladies that run the tree service office. They are Ms. Donna and Ms. Michelle. If you want to talk to the most sweetest, kindest, knowledgeable (about all aspects of the tree service business), and  the most professional office personnel  you will ever meet; then contact them. Oh, by the way, the other local tree service companies ever returned my calls. I was shocked because I used their services in the past. But let me tell you the truth,  Eastern Tree Service is a professional establishment and trustworthy, and they will treat you with respect. I urge you to call them for your next project.
My thanks to everyone at Eastern Tree Service.

resp.text: Thanks Allen !

name: Michael Taylor
text: Very professional, Christian organization that will work with you and help make your tree removal process seamless and easy. Thank you so much for your help.

resp.text: Thank you so much michael !

name: Roderick White
text: I had some trees cut and removed from my yard. The guys at Eastern Tree Service did a great job.  Earlier I had received a couple quotes and then a friend recommended I call Bob at Eastern.  He came by to take a look and his quote was in line with the other companies, and since I had a friend refer them and spoke highly of their reputation, I decided to award Eastern the job. Two of Bob's sons, Samuel & Jacob, along with Josh and a couple other guys were on the team who cut the trees down.  They all worked well together and did a good job.  I'd recommend them, not just because of the work taking the trees down, but because they were a good group, easy to talk to, and were cautious as the worked and cleaned up well.

name: Linda Franklin
text: Due to so many recent storms we needed a tree service. Was very professional and on time. Great prices and very professional services. Would definitely recommend them.

text: Didn’t think companies like this existed anymore. Came out for a quote, ended up dropping the tree right then, price was awesome, service was exceptional. Will use them for all future tree service needs.

text: ETS is very good. Had a tree fall on Sunday, late afternoon and another tree was literally propping up the fallen tree and preventing it from hitting the house. I called ETS immediately. Jeff & Allison Phillips

text: These guys have to be the most trustworthy and considerate tree removers in Alabama. What a pleasurable experience to have them work in our backyard and cut down a tree that was a huge liability for us. I highly recommend them.

name: Thomas Rodgers
text: Robert Young is one of the most humble and nice people that I know. Eastern tree service have been out twice now. The service has such consistency and the equipment used is modern and superior. resp.text: Thank You Thomas ! Our owner will be ecstatic to hear this . His thanks is to God for helping him become the man he needs to be .....

name: Mike Seals
text: Robert is one guy with honesty and integrity.  They provide great quality service and are there when they said they would be and did a EXCELLENT job.  I highly recommend Robert and Eastern Tree Service!

text: ETS provided a reasonable quote, finished the job on schedule, and were mindful of my landscaping on a very tricky job - downslope cuts with a lot of privet/underbrush to fight through. name: Hinton Family
text: These guys were amazing! Not only were they fast and efficient, they were also professional and well mannered. They were more picky than I was about how my yard looked as they cut! I would recommend them to anyone and will call them if I ever need help again. They took care of my trees, but they really took care of me!

text: I moved to my new house last week, needed to remove some trees from my back yard in Hoover, Al. Had three estimates. I picked Eastern Tree Service for their price. They cut down two large oaks and grinded three stumps. They cleaned really well. I was really impressed. I would recommend Eastern Tree Service to anyone.

name: Steve Norris
text:
An excellent tree service that is a drug free work inviroment .highly skilled laborers , who do fast , safe , quality work.
This company is licensed,  bonded , Insured and arbor certified.
We give God the glory because it is by his grace alone , that this company exist and by his grace , she'd blood of his son Jesus,  that we have the free gift of eternal life through genuine repentance.
Ephesians 2:8-9
Romans 10:9-10

name: Jimmy Bearden
text: I have known the Eastern Tree Service family for over 10 years. I can say without hesitation they truly care for their customers. If you need any tree work done this is the Company you want to call.

name: Robby Wright
text: The owner and employees were very professional, they introduced themselves,  something you don't get these days by saying their names and shaking your hand especially coming to do a job like they had to do and time of day . My wife and I have our own business and wish we had employees like he has . You want professional work and to be taken care of with no worries ,call Eastern Tree Service ! We will be calling them back to keep our trees  healthy because they are very intelligent about trees and that is a must for not only the look around your house but the safety of your loved ones in your house . Thank you The Wrights .

name: Bill Belski
text: I had 3 trees cut down and the crew did a great job at a very reasonable price. The gentlemen were very professional and they left the work site in pristine condition. I would highly recommended this company to anybody...

name: Valarie JONES
text: 2 gentlemen arrived in mid-June and gave me a written estimate for the job, which involved cutting and removal of a line of trees and bushes running parallel to my home.  After several delays, a crew finally arrived at the beginning of August with lots of machinery.  The crew leader talked to me for a few minutes regarding the work to be done.  I had to leave for 20 minutes to drive a family member to work.  When I arrived back, the crew and machines were at the bottom of my street leaving.  They said the job would be double the amount quoted and told me the office would call me.  It is now mid-September and the office has still not called me.  I would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: Becky Troullier
text: I heard about Eastern Tree Service every Saturday morning on 105.5 – so I decided to give them a call.    I had 3 trees that needed to come down and two that needed a good trimming.   My husband talked with Terry and got an estimate.  As usual I had lots of questions so Terry came back the next day.  We spent an hour talking and he gave me a very fair estimate of the work.    On the day the work was to be done the crew showed up earlier then what was expected and had completed everything including clean up in a matter of a few hours.   Everyone on the job was very professional – I was impressed.   We have a back yard now --- and we very much looking forward to seeing grass growing in our back yard instead of leaves, tree branches and sweet gum balls everywhere.  Thank you Eastern Tree Service -- these guys are the best!!!

name: Joyce Elane
text: Great service cut two pines. Workers worked as a team trees were  down in no time. Cleaned up . Hauled the trees away. Ground up the stumps. Highly recommend.

name: Charles Denson
text: Robert and crew are some of the most professional, easy to deal with groups in the industry.  You can count on them to do you a fantastic job in a timely manner.

name: Wendy Roberts
text: Called. Left message with someone 5 days ago and still no one has called me back.

resp.text: Hello , we do apologize for the delay , but apparently we took down the wrong number , if you could please call us directly , I guarantee we will have someone assist you immediately !  (205)856-2078

name: Cathy Fohl
text:
I wish I could give this company 10 stars!!  These guys are unbelievable.

Our neighborhood was recently hit by a tornado causing damage to homes and property.  Within hours after the storm, a neighbor called Eastern Tree Service (ETS) to come help with restoration.  ETS arrived promptly and began calling in its crew and within hours the properties that were being serviced by ETS were transformed back to a livable state.  ETS started removing trees and debris from our homes before noon and by the end of the day they had cleared the trees and hauled away all debris.  The stumps were removed the next morning.   I was amazed by how well these guys worked as a team allowing them to get the job done as efficiently as possible.  They were very respectful of my property and went to great lengths to make sure they didn’t tear down what was left of trees and shrubbery.   I was also impressed with how the owner was working side by side with his employees.   It was evident they took great pride in doing the job right.

Last but certainly not least this company was very reasonable on its pricing.  Prior to this incident, I had several trees removed by other tree services and ETS’ pricing was in line with what I was quoted previously.  I was very appreciative of this fact since I had heard countless stories of price gouging in storm cleanup.  After all the cleanup was complete, the owner stopped by one last time to make sure everything was handled to our satisfaction.

On a final note, what impressed me most about this company is what the owner did for an elderly neighbor.  Having found out this neighbor was weak from having chemo treatment, he restored his property at almost no cost.  The owner is not aware that anyone knew about this gift which makes it even more commendable.

Great job guys!!

resp.text: We are very humbled by your kind words ! We enjoyed being able to serve you and your neighbors !

name: susan turner
text: Does a great job!!! Great workers and very friendly.

resp.text: Thank You so much !

name: Ashley Hollis
text: I highly recommend Eastern Tree Service. I have known the Young family for many years! They are very honest and great people. I refer all of my friends and family to ETS. They have all had great experiences with ETS!

name: Brad St. George
text: This company cut down a tree for us on a job site. The job was done in a professional timely manner. We were pleased with their services.

name: Jamie Theodore
text: We had a pretty big tree fall across our front yard and driveway in some storms today. Robert and his crew happened to be in the neighborhood doing another job. On their way out of the neighborhood, around 7:30 pm, they saw us in our front yard and stopped and asked if we were okay. Then, they immediately hopped out of their trucks, cut up the tree, and cleared our driveway. They did all of this unprompted, and when we asked him how much we owed them he told us we didn't owe him a thing. Thank you Robert and your crew SO much for your kindness and generosity! We can't tell you how much we appreciate your help!!

resp.text: Thank You for the kind words ! We Love our job and the opportunity to serve !

name: C SR
text:
I called Eastern Tree to get an estimate for a tree removal. They were prompt in coming to my house. But, while going over the estimate with Robert (the estimator), I mentioned how they’d given me an estimate a couple years ago, and he curtly asked me, “Well, why did you call us again?!” VERY RUDE!!

I tried to give this company my business and received a major attitude in return. This is terrible customer service and a poor business practice. Needless to say, I will be giving my business to another tree service company.

resp.text: We are truly saddened to hear of your fustration, the price unfortunatley does change the more dead a tree becomes due to the safetly issues it presents ... Robert is a very kind hearted person and was trying to work with you ; unfortunatley that doesnt always work out to your advantage . We do hope you were able to find someone to take care of your needs safely . We hope you have a great year !

name: Will Winslett
text: Charles and Rachel are fantastic to work with! I had a big project needing to be done around the house. The project consisted of cutting down 13 big pine trees, digging up the stumps, moving dirt, adding fill dirt and grading my yard back. Charles and his team are extremely professional. Everything about this project was discussed up front and handled perfectly. If I had any questions or concerns Charles or one of his guys was there to answer. I am extremely happy at how the project turned out and would recommend them to anyone. If you need tree or dirt work you should definitely consider giving Terraform a call. Two thumbs way up.

name: Nick Pronesti
text: The team is very polite and did do a good job  however I am still struggling with the price I paid and how they changed the price on me from original visit to the next. When they came out to bid us Charles told me $2,000 but that it was a couple weeks before he could get to me. I checked in periodically. When they finally could get to me they raised the price to $3,000. We were semi-desperate because of the hurricane season and what we had just seen sally do. We spent $3,000 for them to remove 2 large branches from an oak tree over our house. After speaking to other tree companies this should have been around $1,800. In hindsight we wish we would have looked around more.

resp.text: Nick, we are so sorry that we didn’t know of your concerns sooner. Looking back on our records, we see that the scope of work changed after the initial bid was placed, and that’s where the price difference came from. However, our company is built on customer satisfaction, and we want to do whatever we can to change your opinion of us from 3 star to 5 star. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. 251-359-6777.

All of the other companies said that they did not need to contact the power company.  Craig’s Tree Service coordinated the job with the power company and I deeply appreciated the professionalism.

text: These guys had the lowest prices but did awful work tore up my yard. I definitely learned my lesson about going with the lowest bid.
