text: 2nd time I've used them. Both times they have been reasonably priced and took care of me quickly. Could not be more satisfied.

name: Stephen Entrekin
text: I have used Craig's service twice and have been pleased.  Other services I tried to contact either never called me back or took weeks to do so.  With Craig, I got quick response for an estimate, and work was started promptly.

name: calaboonetail11
text: Nice people...hard workers.

name: Jane Toothaker
text: We had multiple trees cut down. When I called to get an estimate Craig was here within 2 days. The men that came were professional, courteous and friendly. They cleaned up the yard & did some extra work. I will definitely call them  again.

name: John May
text: I wasn't impressed at all. After reading all the great reviews I am left wondering what happened when they got to my house. They trenched up my yard with heavy trucks. They went through my neighbors yard and damaged his yard. I spent the better part of a  day for me to clean up the mess they left.

name: Gibson Mosley
text: I would give to them 0 stars if that was an option. Waited for a call back for 4 days. Beware!

name: Jane Doe
text: I am giving one star for answering the phone & one for reasonable pricing, those are 2 decent qualities about this company but other than that they are very slow about getting things done & they poorly communicated to us about when they are coming back to finish the job, also because the job we called them for is under $1000 they unprofessionally told us that our tree situation is not priority to them, yet we've been waiting a week now to be serviced because they dont have the proper equipment to work on muddy terrain. Can't wait till the job is done & we won't be using them again. Sorry, not sorry.

name: Jim Downing
text: Craig and his team are very professional and efficient.  A tree fell on my house and they were there in just a couple of hours in the storm and rain.  They had to get a very large oak tree off and out of the house.  Craig was very helpful with the cost.

name: Jared Braswell
text: Wow. Craig has a great crew and they worked very hard to make sure I was happy during the large project they did for me.  Craig's had all the right equipment to handle the job and left my place cleaner than when they arrived. Craig and Danny were very easy to deal with and I strongly recommend him for any tree care work.

name: Kate Logan Newbill
text: Fair prices, courteous and experienced crew, and immaculate cleanup after each job.  I love these guys.

name: Katara Mack
text:
Craig's is a great company with excellent customer service.  They will take care of you.  Highly recommend....
#comanche

name: Annette Rowland
text: Professional and fast! Friendly staff that does sticks to their quotes. I recommend Craig to anyone needing brush or trees cleared.

name: JERRY GUTHRIE
text: Had a large tree fall on a rental house  on 6-26-16. Called Craig. Within a few minutes of my call they were at work on my tree. Took about six hard hours to get this giant tree off the house. These guys never missed a beat. They know what they are doing and they hit the ground running. I could not ask for better or faster service.... I am one happy customer.

name: Blksheep325
text: Had several trees removed, stumps ground and fallen trees removed. All done by a professional crew. Will call on them again when need arises. They are highly recommended by me.

name: Gwendolyn McZeek Foster
text: Wow these guys were great. They were very nice and professional all in one. Very friendly 🙂. They came in did the job made sure it was done correctly and safely. Price was reasonable and made sure everything I wanted was done to my standards. I loved the Idea that they cleaned up after themselves. I would always recommend these guys they're the best. Number 1 in my book. If you need tree work give them a call. My "buddies". I think I've found new friends 💕💞

name: Monika Johnson
text: Myself and my partner got estimates from three other companies before choosing Coastal Tree Co., and we are so happy we did. Not only was the pricing much more fair, the professionalism they exhibited in their estimation process,  scheduling, communication with their office staff, and the actual tree cutting process was great. Their guys are friendly, have great attitudes, and do their job really well. The owner is a certified arborist so if you have any problem trees this is the company for you. I will most certainly be using them again in the future.

name: Jeff Stone
text: Outstanding service! They showed up when they said they would and went above and beyond. They paid close attention to detail and left no mess behind. I highly recommend Coastal Tree Company!

name: Josh Bair
text: There is not enough stars to rate them. 100% the best experience I’ve EVER had. They are beyond friendly, wonderful guys. Jaxon took care of me from the get go. Josh is wonderful. Even the office manager. I can’t thank this group enough for making a HUGE difference in our stressful decision. This was a huge stress dealing with trees for us. They made it completely comfortable and stress free. When I found out we would be the first customers with their new equipment I was thrilled! Was totally worth watching. This group of dedicated employees will NOT disappoint you. If you need any tree service done call them! 100X would recommend.

name: Jessica Zito
text: Had some trees fall during the tornado so we called Coastal Tree Co. They gave a fair quote then did a great job removing the trees! Excellent service! Definitely recommend!

name: Nicole Marasca
text: These guys were super dependable, friendly and did a phenomenal job! Every stage of the process was a pleasure to deal with these folks...from Chelsea with the scheduling to the final completion of the job...I would wholeheartedly recommend their services! Very satisfied customer!

name: DJ Williams
text: The owner (arborist) gave an educated consult to what needed to be done then supervised over 2 tree removals and some large at risk branch removals. They didn't destroy my yard in the process and even went the extra step to ensure satisfaction by filling some holes. I've been happy with the efforts.

name: Nick Melton
text:
I emailed Coastal and got a response from Josh within 12 hours. He came out the next day (on a Saturday!) to review my problem and give me an estimate. He quoted me the best price (by far!) of the three places I contacted. He also said he'd take care of it as soon as he could. We ended up responding back and forth as I worked out some issues and questions with timing and things and he was very helpful, responsive and patient. He and his team even showed up a bit earlier than they said they would. He worked with me that day (it was extremely cold and my wife was caring for our newborn and our house was without power while they worked so we had to get it reconnected and it was a whole ordeal) to do everything efficiently and I believe they even finished a bit quicker than he estimated. I am very grateful to have a good guy and company like this to call on when needed.
My job was a huge oak that was leaning towards my house. It was in a kind of land-locked area  behind a bunch of houses, so it was very difficult. All the companies said no vehicle or bobcat or anything could get back there, so that made it more expensive. It was a difficult job and they took care of it safely and in good time.

name: Terry Finney
text: Grate crew. Clean fast and efecent

name: kaitlyn young
text: Josh and his crew were friendly and showed up exactly when he said we would and his pricing was great! We had about 12 trees taken down in a single day and we were so impressed With the speed and precision in which they worked. He went above and beyond our expectations.  I would 100% recommend Coastal Tree Co. to anyone wanting tree work done. We are highly satisfied and will certainly be having Coastal Tree Co. back out in the future!

name: Jennifer Pearson
text: Reliable and gets the job done quick! I had trees fall from a storm and they came to examine, give me a quote, and got the job done in just a couple days! Very professional!

name: Angie Taylor
text: Honest, fair, and dependable company.  Highly recommend utilizing this company for all of your tree service needs.

name: Destaney Fantroy
text: Super friendly and dependable! Highly recommend! 😁

name: Kristen Hudson
text: Amazing work, super reliable, and affordable!

name: jason houghtaling
text: Quick and reliable

name: Melody Black
text: We first did business with them to get two trees removed and the stumps ground out. They were on time and extremely professional. We called them back for a larger job that took a week to finish (it was THAT big!). The property was cleared and groomed by some of the best people it has ever been our privilege to work with! They kept us apprised of every situation and left our property in the best shape ever. We will never have any business but Briscoe Tree Service maintain our trees. Good people, fair prices and service after the sale. Don’t miss out on great group of people!

resp.text: Thank you it was a pleasure doing business and getting to know you and your family

name: Miranda Blocker
text: These guys absolutely deserve more than 5 stars. We are very picky about who we hire to do work for us and these guys went above and beyond. They are very trustworthy and they do exactly what they say they will do in a timely manner.  We would highly recommend them and they will definitely be back to do more work for us.

name: Michael Tougaw
text:
These guys are truly professional!!! On time, courteous, honest pricing and went out of there way to make me happy. Tyler and his crew cut and cleaned up everything beyond my expectations, and I will call them again. I gathered many estimates and Briscoe Tree Service beat them all hands down.

Thanks,
Mike

name: Rachel Morris
text: These guys came with the best recommendations and the best price! They did a great job taking down a 90 foot oak tree very close to my home. I highly recommend them.

name: Stacey Wright
text: So IMPRESSED!!! Wonderful job!! Honest up front. Great prices. I compared there bid to 7 others and they are the cheepest, don't let that fool you. These guys are top notch. From climbing, to domino 2 trees at once, from roping and cutting. These guys really work great together! Recomended!!

name: Len Yarbrough
text:
Saw a video with a good old boy driving a Briscoe Tree Service truck with a couple dogs that were riding unsecured in the open back. One of the dogs fell out and was visibly injured. The driver commented, “dog shoulda known better”.

I’ll be happy to change this review once I see definitive action from the company owner. I can’t recommend this tree service until then.

name: Sandra Mann
text: Cut two giant trees at our house and last I check this reviewing is for "their business performance " which was great.

name: RedneckXperience Guide Service
text: Great reliable and knowledgeable trees service.. Top notch service!! Highly recommend!!!

name: Nathan Williams
text: Great folks

name: Christopher Miller
text: Three Ranger Tree Service is by far the most professional group of guys I have done business with. I had a dead pine tree I needed cut down, and they were very quick to respond. Kaleb gave me a good price, and gave me suggestions on how to keep the cost down: Kaleb and his guys did and outstanding job, and even did more than expected. I’ll definitely be using them again when needed.

resp.text: Thank you for the support and glad we could help you out.

name: Derius Thomas
text: When looking for good companies online to do business with i always look for reviews first. Three Ranger Tree Service was one of the 3 companies that i called because of the high reviews and i'm so glad that i choose them. The experience was professional, affordable and they made me feel like i was an old friend. My parents just bought a house that had very tall pines in the front and back yard, a total of 8 all together. They did the job right and we were very pleased with their work. They are now locked in my phone for any future tree service needs that i may have.

name: Not who you are seeking
text:
I called 3Ranger the latter half of March 2019 and invited them to come out, look at the scope of the work I wished completed, and provide me a bid.  I had contacted several local companies, some were not interested, some interested but not in coming out, and some did not return my call.  Kaleb showed up on the evening we coordinated and we walked around the yard looking at each of my +100’ oak trees. He provided me a very fair price and set a tentative time for the first half of April.

One a Friday Kaleb showed up, down loaded his equipment and got to work.   After about 5 hours, he had trimmed the trees to my complete satisfaction, cut down another tree, and pulled it all out of the way. He cleaned up the grass, blew of the driveway and sidewalks, loaded up his gear, and was on his way.

I worked with him and his employee throughout the day, enjoying the bantering back and forth, and the hard work they put forth.  Never did I have a concern for their safety or mine.  Never did I worry about my property or structures.  Both of them worked hard and wasted no time.  His equipment is in excellent shape, chains sharp, ropes more than long enough, and expertise enlightening.

3Ranger will get my business the next time my oaks need to be trimmed.

name: Donald Nestor
text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND this gentleman. Amazing quality of work. Very professional and safety minded. The fee he charged for his work is extremely reasonable. He went above and beyond in removing our diseased tree. Look no further!  Go with Kaleb. You will be impressed!  He is a Veteran!

name: J Sauerwine
text:
Kaleb does Awesome work!
Gave a fair quote and removed a tree in no-time.
Will definitely call again if needed in the future.

resp.text: That you for your support. We strive as a family business to do quality work.

name: Jeffrey Cronk
text: Job well done. Did exactly what I needed and wanted. Price was very affordable. No fuss, he was in and in out of the job quickly. Plus went above and beyond to help me with a tree I had cut and got it stuck in another tree. AWESOME people!!!! AWESOME JOB!!!!

name: Michael B Dunbar
text: Absolutely amazing service! We had somewhat of an emergency situation after a big storm and needed a large pine removed ASAP. Three Rangers got out there quickly and removed it without any issues. We opted to have them dig out the stump as well. Our house is safe and our yard has never looked better. Outstanding service.

name: Marina Savashynskaya
text: Kaleb and his team did an excellent job removing two huge trees from our yard. All other tree services in the area said a crane was necessary for the job but he was able to do it without one, thus cutting the cost in half. Fast, straightforward and affordable.

name: Stephen Miller
text: Kaleb is an outstanding individual and extremely knowledgebal. He was polite and went out of his way to help us and got the job done right. We will be using him a lot in the future at home and work.

name: Karin
text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND this gentleman. Amazing quality of work. Very professional and safety minded. The fee he charged for his work is extremely reasonable. He went above and beyond in removing our diseased tree. Look no further!  Go with Kaleb. You will be impressed!  He is a Veteran!

name: Jenny Crotts
text: We scheduled a tree assessment that afternoon  and he never showed up. He never phoned or messaged to say he wasn’t coming either. Too bad because I needed his help with a limb that was threatening my house.

resp.text: Ma'am, the day you called us about the tree limb you were requesting to have a consult done, which we explained to you was different than an estimate for a job. We spoke to you at 1307 and then immediately texted you saying we could be there in 20 minutes. We didnt receive a text back so we tried calling twice, once at 1331 and the second time at 1337 again receiving no answer or message back. We are sorry we weren't able to provide you with the services you needed and hope you will give us a chance in the future to work with you and provide you with any tree care needs you may have.

name: May Jordan
text: The Three Ranger Tree team is awesome. Professional, responsive, thorough, quality services, and fair pricing.  Highly recommend their services and will use again.

name: Trey Thornton
text: Kaleb does an excellent job at a affordable price ! Fast and great cleanup. Definitely recommend these hard working military men for any tree jobs you may need.

name: Larry smith
text: I called Three Ranger Tree Service they made time to come out and estimate the job I needed done.Kaleb came out did the work for me in one day.I was more than satisfy and would recommend him to all my friends and neighbors.

name: Misty Dyer
text: Kaleb does an amazing job. Great pricing. He gets a A+++ in our books. WE will definitely recommend his service.

name: Kelly Ratliff
text: Great work at a reasonable price!  Lower prices than other estimates.

name: Suzy Wells
text: Kaleb has excellent skills, sevice,  and outstanding prices!! Will definitely use him again!!

name: Newberry 2010
text: They never showed up to do the job.

resp.text: I'm sorry but we looked back through our records and cant find your name on any estimates. If we did give you an estimate we would of needed an signed contract to put you on the schedule. We would welcome the chance to talk with you about this and see if there is a fix to this situation.

name: Michelle Michael
text: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Jon's Tree Service. I've been collecting estimates for a few months to remove 2 "complicated" and dangerous pine trees and was quoted very high amounts from 3 different businesses, who also couldn't promise that surrounding trees and new sod wouldn't be destroyed. Jon's however had the right equipment to get into a tight spot and remove these trees with ease, and with NO DAMAGE to surrounding areas, and at a very reasonable cost compared to my previous estimates. Also they were the only business that sent me an actual estimate document and a copy of their liability insurance, without me even asking. Two days later, the trees are gone! The crew arrived on time, was so polite and respectful, and really amazing to watch. I've waited a long time to find someone worth paying to do this, and this is it! I get nothing for this recommendation; I'm just so satisfied and like to support good businesses.

resp.text: Thank you so much Michelle! We apologize for the delayed response to your amazing review. We greatly appreciate your kind words and recommendation! We are very grateful that we were able to provide the service that you expect. It was a pleasure serving you!

name: Laura Timares
text: Jon responded quickly to my request for an estimate (2 days), and once he saw my large termite eaten tree leaning towards my house (The bark fell off the tree revealing the dangerous state it was in) he made it a priority to schedule its removal. Difficult to access, tight against other trees - OTHERS QUOTED MORE THAN DOUBLE his estimate, which he kept to. Quoted on a Tuesday, his team was on site on Thursday. They were courteous, efficient, made safety a priority and did a fantastic job cleaning up and promptly hauling away the remnants. That was important, as they had to set up their bucket lift in my neighbor's yard (Thanks neighbors!). Neighbors were so impressed they asked for Jon's business card for their future needs. Per my request, they were careful not to damage my hydrangea just under the canopy!  I have had to deal with a lot of tree services during my 20 years here in Bluff Park. Unfortunately, some are vultures. Some get the job done adequately. But Jon's service has been exceptional.  GREAT VALUE, GREAT JOB.  (LT)

resp.text: Thanks Laura, I’m really glad we were able to get it cut before it fell. We appreciate you guys very much!

name: Freecons Gaming
text: Very efficient crew, they know what they're doing, and they do it well!

name: Lynn Alexander
text: Showed up on time and did a great job. Highly recommend.

name: Brendan Owens
text:
After getting estimates from 3 other companies I decided to go with Jon’s because they were a better rate and more professional while keeping excellent communication. I was concerned about possible damage to my fence during tree removal. They said if any damage was done by their crew, they would fix at no extra charge. That did not matter because they were able to remove 4 trees without any damage to fence just a few feet away.
Thank you so much Jon’s Tree Service!

resp.text: Thanks Brendan for the kind words and great review of Jon's Tree Service. We greatly appreciate you taking time to write about your experience. We are very happy we were able to provide you with the level of communication and service that you expected! Thank you so much for your business it was a pleasure serving you!

name: Lindi Pearson
text: Great work at a great price. I had a tree limb fall through my car port and crush the roof of my car. The owner Jon has harsh personality. It's just how he is. Do not let that discourage you from hiring him. His crews are top notch, well equipped, hard working, professionals. He gave me a quote to prune a 100+ tall tree on a Thursday and his crews was here the following Wednesday. Set up to clean up the work was done in 2 hrs. Easily a 2 day job for a company without the top notch equipment. I am thrilled with the work done and the more than fair price. Thanks Jon I will use you from now on and will recommend Jon's tree service to anyone who needs this kind of work.

name: Chuck Gray
text: We recently contracted with Jon's Tree Service to have several trees removed/trimmed.  I am totally pleased with every aspect of their performance.  They were prompt and at the house ready to work at 7 am, just like they had said they would.  The crew was very efficient and courteous, and it was obvious to me that they all took pride in what they were doing.  The yard was cleaned better than I expected and the debris was hauled away the same day that the work was performed.  If you need tree service performed, I highly recommend Jon's Tree Service.  You will not be disappointed.

name: Wanda Hendrix
text: Three trees were on our house from tropical storm Zeta. Jon's Tree Service came out the next day and removed the trees.  The workers were professional and the cost was reasonable.  Will use this company again for future tree services.

resp.text: Thank you Wanda for the kind words from your experience with us. We greatly appreciate you taking time to write and share what you liked most about us. We look forward to helping you in the future with any tree removal projects you may need (hopefully not a storm). Thank you so much for your business, it was a pleasure serving you!

name: Donald Bivins Jr. Ministries
text: Good job removing trees and grinding but not so good at removing the roots from trees. Instead of having a truck to put debris in they put all the debris on my lawn and part of the street. Took two days to remove the debris and when they got it up. There are big dents in my grass said they would fix but didn’t just filled in with sand. Called had words with Jon and he and I were unprofessional. Said he would come look at it but didn’t, I sent a text telling him not to come. For what I paid them to remove 14 trees, they could have spent less than $100 to fix my yard. I told I could fix me own yard like I want it. My neighbors complained about his the unprofessionalism when they were trying to get to there homes because he had the street blocked. I Wouldn’t recommend their services to anyone. I should have used Gray’s.

name: Lynn Rodgers
text: Jon has been my tree guy for many years. Very professional. Pricing fair. Crew does awesome job. Cleanup everything including blowing off the driveway. Jon has even come by after to rake up debris when his crew was on another job. Will continue to use him for all my tree work.

resp.text: Thanks Lynn, we appreciate you very much!

name: Jessika Ashlee (Hip and Simple)
text: Had a tree fall down after some wind. Jon came out quickly to assess and then had his team in and efficiently working on time. I heard the team members saying "beautiful" back and forth to one another as they worked closely to safely make cuts and remove logs and branches. The team worked well together and cleaned everything up. I didn't want to have to use this service but they helped make a not fun situation really easy to deal with and I highly recommend!

name: Vicki Baker
text: Best company ever, professional, detailed, clean up extronare. We have used them for 3 years. Highly recommend them can't say enough good things about Jon's services.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your five star review, Vicki! We are very thankful we have been able to provide you with awesome service the past few years! It has been our pleasure to be able to serve you on your projects! Thank you again for your kind words!

name: WD H
text: Jon and his team were prompt and did an amazing job.  Pricing was fair. Clean-up after the tree removal process was well done and thorough.  Jon even personally power washed the driveway removing a muddy buildup caused by rain while the trees were being hauled off.  Would definitely hire him again.

resp.text: Thanks Wayne, we really appreciate you. Look forward to next time!!

name: traci brosch
text:
We called Jon's Tree service to remove branches from 2 OLD oak trees and they did a fabulous job for a great price! They promptly removed the debris and blew the whole entire yard. They went above and beyond with the customer service. The end result was a much more aesthetic yard than at the beginning of the project. I would highly recommend this company because their equipment did not damage our yard and the crew was entirely professional, prompt, and cost effective.
Traci B.
Vestavia Hills, Al

resp.text:
Hi Traci, Thank you very much for your review, we really appreciate it! We are very glad to know you were pleased with the work we did for you. Have a great day!
- Jon's Tree Service

name: Woody Norman
text: After receiving quotes from tree service companies, they gave an 11-week delay. We called Jon’s tree service and got a quote with a 10-day delay. The workers were professional and efficient. The quote was 15% to 20% more than the other quotes, but well worth it.

name: Jimmy Mcwaters
text: 5 guys, 4 trees, 3 hours and a yard that looks like they we're never there. That happened 5 min ago. Awesome, on time, VERY under priced after 2 other estimates. Jon was very honest and friendly.

name: kathryn michael
text: Jon’s team arrived on time and worked quickly and efficiently removing two big Leyland Cypress and trimming and pruning all the many trees my husband planted and forgot.  They did excellent work and left the place spotless, and I would highly recommend them.  They know what they are doing!

resp.text: Thank you guys, we appreciate it

name: David Marler
text:
MAN these guys a great .I am speechless for how good this team of guys are .with having a tree fall on your house .it sure is nice to have someone come out and take such good care of your property and job .
this owner is truly blessed to have a team that works so great together .

name: David Marler
text:
MAN these guys a great .I am speechless for how good this team of guys are .with having a tree fall on your house .it sure is nice to have someone come out and take such good care of your property and job .
this owner is truly blessed to have a team that works so great together .

name: Jason Green
text: Jon is A+ in my book. Made two trips out to help us with a cat stuck about 50' high in a tree. After being blown off by several tree services, a buddy recommended Jon. I fully expected to be laughed at but he was 100% willing to climb the tree and get the cat down for a reasonable price. I know that isnt their normal gig but they were very helpful.

name: Alva Summerlott
text: Friendly fast and efficient. Took care of my two trees safely and professionally. Im very happy and will be using them if i have any other tree to take care of. Thank you jon.

resp.text: Thanks buddy, we appreciate you guys!!

name: Sarah Jones
text: I was well pleased with the work done for me by Jon's Tree Service. Response to my initial contact was quick and very professional. Communication was prompt and good. The crew was professional, worked fast, and cleaned up the entire area. I will definitely call them for future work. The price was reasonable.

name: Gobblers Knob
text: We have used Jon's Tree Service several times, they are hands down the best to work with.  Pricing is always reasonable, service impeccable.

name: Kristin Bartlett
text: The crew was AMAZING! I didn’t have to worry about anything! A pleasure to work with! All cleanup was handled and they went above and beyond!

name: Coach Jimmy
text: Great service and price.

name: Bob Opkins
text: This is the 2nd time I have used Jon’s service. He did another great job at a reasonable cost. Good job cleaning up too.

name: David Plourde
text: Excellant work, worth every penny.They cleaned up and took care of everything.

resp.text: Thanks David, we appreciate it

name: Jessica Leesburg
text: I hardly ever write reviews but wanted to take a minute to share what a wonderful experience we had with Jon and his team. I found Jon on google and after one phone call with him I knew I had found the right company. We had work done several months ago that left us with a HUGE MESS in our back yard. Jon came out and gave us an estimate and said he would take care of it. This morning his crew showed up with four trucks and right on time. Everyone was so professional and kind. My husband called me just a short time later to tell me how great everything looked. We couldn’t be more pleased! Jon will be my FIRST call for any needs like this in the future. My only regret is not calling him 9 months ago to get the job done right the first time.

name: Gwen Skinner
text: Jon’s cut down a massive pine tree, removed the logs out through a very tight opening in my azaleas with absolutely no damage to them.  Jon’s also removed or trimmed  several other good size trees. His crew was respectful of all my plantings and irrigation heads.  A very professional job for a fair price.  I will use Jon’s in the future.

resp.text: We appreciate you very much!!

name: J Live Overdrive
text: Contacted Jon to get a quote on cutting down a tree. Send over all the information and then the next day Jon asks me to call him that I was 30 mins from his business (and?) That "if he was gonna come out he'd have to get at least $1200. " Did not care to come give a quote and basically just threw out a number cause 30 minutes just to far.  So Jon needs to change his website to If you are more than 30 mins away I'm just going to throw out a number and if you dont like it, oh well. Very bad business practices.

resp.text:
Hi There, We are really sorry we could not help you out.

At Jon's Tree Service, we have a very specific service area that we cover, so that we can have as little downtime as possible between customer appointments. This keeps our costs low since we can get to our customers quickly and helps our response times be as fast as possible.

We cover primarily Shelby County and parts of southern Jefferson County and unfortunately Trussville is out of our service area. Your location would be closer to an hour away from us and because of that we would not be cost effective by the time it's all said and done.

We appreciate you reaching out to us and sorry we could not help you out.

Jon's Tree Service

name: Adam Ladner
text: Jon's crew came out when they said they would and had the tree down very quickly. They were professional and went the extra mile to clean up some other limbs and debris. Price was also the most competitive.

name: Steven Burdick
text: The guys who work for Jon are the best. They keep the yard nice and clean. Can't tell they where ever in the yard with equipment.

name: Ed Day
text: Just what I was looking for: commitment to service and the job at hand, reasonable price, honest service, safety. Jon set a schedule, budget and accomplished the job as stated.  What a pleasure to work with and a company with it's service heart at work around the world spreading the word of God.

resp.text: Ed it was our pleasure!

name: Bob Blackwell
text:
Outstanding is the best description for the service provided.  Jon and crew did everything promised, were on time, finished the quickly.  Stumps were removed complete beneath ground level and the ensuing cleanup was perfect.

Best ever!

resp.text: Thank you Mr Blackwell, we appreciate you guys!

name: Kevin Jones
text:
"Honest Businessman"
The owner actually came by to give me an estimate about three weeks ago. John stated that he would gladly cut down a huge tree adjacent to my house if I really wanted the tree cut down. However he felt like the tree was healthy and did not need cutting. he also explained to me some other factors that quailed my concerns as far as the likely hood of the tree falling on our home. John did find a different tree with some possible root damage but it's not an "immediate concern. John emailed me an estimate of "all" the trees I want removed and at some point I am going to have the trees removed for my personal peace of mind. I highly recommend John's Tree service. Going from 459 to 65 S, I encountered a truck, a white Ford, with the exact same logo... On the side, it said Jon's Tree Service. Not in green, but same artwork....

This truck was in the North bound side of the ramp, tailgating this lady... So I figured since he had plenty opportunity to get over South, I would speed up to get out of the way just in case.

Then he whoops in behind me in a true bumper jumper fashion and tailgates me going on 65 South. Then he floors it, flips me off, mouths a few words, and takes off at least 90mph or more, because I was going 75 and he was out of sight in a few seconds.

So if Jon's Tree Service can't follow basic traffic laws, or exhibit common courtesy while driving, putting other drivers in a dangerous situation..... How safe do you think these guys are going to be around your home?

name: Paula Berg
text: We had Tru Green for 2 years and still have just as many weeds as when they started. We paid over $1300.00 for the 2 years of service. We decided not to use them this year. Apparently if you do not cancel them they will still come service the yard the next year without permission. I came home and found a sign in my yard that says We didn't service your lawn today but we'd like to in the future. The next day we get a bill online for $94.45. I called and asked them why I was being charged if they didn't do anything. She said they did service the yard but would wave that charge if I signed up for service. Sounds like blackmail to me. I declined and had to pay the $94.45. I told her I didn't want them back on my property again.

resp.text: Hi Paula, we sincerely apologize for your negative experience. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your name and phone number so we can look into this. Thanks for your feedback as it is one of the many ways we can improve our services.

name: Shawn Nelson
text:
One year of service and my lawn looks horrible. Caught the technician treating my neighbors house by mistake, not the first time my neighbor got a free treatment. Had one technician treat during a thunderstorm downpour, and customer service had the audacity to say that the treatment would work in rain.
I now have dandelions, clover, and various broad leaf weeds growing in the front and side yard as well crab grass springing up in new places. Very disappointing and expensive failure.

Update:
A very knowledgeable lawn technician conducted a thorough fertilization and weed control application one month ago and the lawn is recovering. He explained that due to the mixed grass I have, they had been killing the fescue and encouraging the bermuda growth. This resulted in large dead areas that were previously fescue. Reseeding (done by me) with bermuda has taken and the lawn is recovering.

Recommend better explanation and consequences of  recommended treatments to homeowners. Thank you for trying to fix the problem.

resp.text: Hi Shawn, We appreciate you for bringing this to our attention. We will follow up with the right teams to ensure this doesn’t happen again. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can get this taken care of!

resp.text: Hello Wendy, we apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you. We will be happy to take you off of our call list. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com, and a member of our team will assist you from there. Thank you!

name: Mary Dixon
text: They aerated my lawn and made a mess.  My back yard looks like it was tilled in places.  Pulled up a small section of my sod.  I went to the office and complained, Sent pictures and videos and didn't even get a call.   Today got a bill for $204.  Did I mention the cut internet, phone and Directv lines?

resp.text: Hi Mary, we’re sorry to hear that your experience was unsatisfactory. We would like the chance to review your account in order to resolve your situation. Please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your name and account number so we can take a closer look. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: Ricky Bobby - Shake n Bake
text: Always do a great job and lawn looks better than it has in years...

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Ricky! We work hard to exceed expectations, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you.

name: Donna Richardson
text: We have been customers for many years and very pleased with the lawn pest control and customer service team members.

resp.text: Hi Donna, thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. We're glad that you are having a great experience with our team!

name: Nicholas Liberatore
text: Awful.  I've had TruGeen for 17 years and it just keeps getting worse and worse.  The services they have provided are lawn/weed control, Tree and Shrub services and mosquito control.  I've given them so many chance to make things right.   TruGreen misses most of the services.  They leave an invoice on the door and a sign in the yard when they supposedly provide a service but we know they haven't been there.   We've been home and we know they haven't been in the yard.  They just stick a sign in the yard and leave.  My yard is full of weeds.  They seem to miss the pre-emergence year after year.  I'm done with them.  Going to give Turf Doctor a shot.

resp.text: Hi Nicholas, we are sorry to hear that you are having issues with our service. Our goal is to give great service every time we’re on your lawn. If you are still willing, please send us an email at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your name and email address so we can work toward a resolution. Thank you!

name: Brooks Latta
text: TruGreen Huntsville destroyed my lawn that was less than a year old.  We went out of town on Friday to a lawn that was green as can be and came back Sunday to a brown lawn throughout.  A chemical was applied that is to never be put on fescue. They showed no accountability sending a turf specialist out once after numerous phone calls and promised to send a manager out with plans to make things right but never followed through.  I called over 10 times to get help repairing my brown lawn.  Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere for lawn fertilizer and weed control unless you want a destroyed lawn.  They simply cannot be trusted.

resp.text: Hi Brooks, we are sorry to hear that you are having issues with our service. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. Please send us an email at reviews@trugreenmail.com so we can review and get in touch. Thank you!

name: Matt Adams
text: So disappointed with my service. Firing them and finding someone else who doesn’t spray just water on my lawn. Every lawn in the neighborhood that uses TruGreen has the same weeds in their yards. It’s amazing. Just shows trugreen is consistent in not proving a quality product for their customers.

resp.text: Hi Matt, We are sorry to hear our services didn't meet your expectations. We would love to get this resolved for you. Please reach out to us at reviews@trugreenmail.com, and we will have our team review this. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Randy Marshall
text: I have had TruGreen for over three years paid them for three years know still have just as many weeds as when they started. They had done a good job of fertilizing the weeds just knot killing them. This is probably a good time to find another company

resp.text: Hi Randy, We are sorry to hear our services didn't meet your expectations. We would love to get this resolved for you. Please reach out to us at reviews@trugreenmail.com, and we will have our team review this. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Glenn Cunningham
text: Can't say enough good things about TruGreen and Jonathan Steele. The results after the first service were amazing. I had a competitor doing the service previously and would have changed to TruGreen long ago if I had known the results were going to be this good. Further, Jonathan Steele/my TruGreen Serviceman, even though I know he has a lot to do, had the patience to stop what he was doing when I came up to talk to him and answered all my questions.  He pointed out the different weeds in my yard and the challenges with each type. I'm VERY picky about my yard and enjoy working in it (when it's not too hot !) so I asked Jonathan if I could pull a few of the remaining weeds in the lawn since the first treatment had wiped out 90% of the problem weeds and the 10% remaining looked like something I could help with. Jonathan advised what weeds or foreign grass I could pull and which ones if pulled might aggravate the problem and possibly make the those particular weeds spread instead of eliminating them due to their root structure.   I knew then I was working with a true KNOWLEDGEABLE professional. Jonathan said he would be specifically targeting the residual weeds in the following treatments while at the same time promoting the health of my lawn which now looks like a lush thick green carpet after only two applications.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Glenn. We will share your feedback with your specialist!

name: Douglas Orange
text: I myself do not recommend them to no one, I had a bad experience with them and I read up on complaints on them and that is why I give them a bad rating

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that your experience was unsatisfactory, Douglas. We strive to provide excellent care for each of our customers, but it looks like we missed the mark here. If there is anything we can do to help at this time, feel free to reach out to us at reviews@trugreenmail.com, and a member of our team will be happy to assist you in any way we can. Thank you! -RS

name: Daniel Cecalacean
text:
My experience with TruGreen has been awful. One year and a little under $1,000 spent with them...my lawn looks worse than at the beginning. I told them I was willing to spend whatever it took to get the results and I relied on them to provide the expertise, they promised it would not be a problem and delivered nothing.
I am very disappointing especially with the superficial job of the field teams and their customer service.

name: rob roth
text: I have used Trugreen for the last 4 years with excellent results!

resp.text: Hi Rob, thanks so much for the positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear our team has been making your lawn a success.

name: Shawn Hoban
text: Good lawn weed control Very good weed and insect control on shrubs.. I had to call them three times to come back out and retreat the lawn. They came within three or four days each time at no additional charge.

name: John Ward
text: Never even made it to having lawn care service performed. Made my interest known online and requested a call on Wednesday last Sunday. Received 28 FREAKING CALLS afterwards Monday and Tuesday. I answered over 20 of them and kept saying “yes I am interested but I am working right now and won’t be available until Wednesday, please don’t call me again until then. I finally lost my temper on the last caller and informed them not to call me any further until Wednesday, but did not do it nicely this time. Here we are on Wednesday after asking for a call Wednesday and getting 28 calls NOT ON WEDNESDAY, I have not gotten a single call today. If the people running this company can’t follow simple instructions like that, why in the hell would I trust their workers to follow more complicated instruction as to what I want done? TLDR: Asked for call Wednesday, got 28 calls before then and not a single call on Wednesday. Terrible customer service. Would rather talk to debt collectors than these people.

resp.text: Hi John, we are sorry to hear that this was your experience with us. Please email customercare@trugreenmail.com so that we can get your name on our no-call list. We apologize for any inconvenience you have had with our team.

name: Debbie Malone
text: Our yard was destroyed and is now being brought back to life from the services we have received.

resp.text: Hi Debbie, thanks so much for the positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear our team has been making your lawn a success.

name: Amanda Donald
text: We got the service 2 weeks ago, the rep came out and set us up on a plan. I’m thankful we checked the reviews before we decided to pay for the service in full instead we decided to pay for just one service. They came out on a Friday for the first “treatment” we were told that they would call us and text us before they arrived and that they would notify us when they were on the property, this did not happen. Our primary problem was in our backyard and we requested to have service done while no one was at home so they could take care of the backyard without disruption. The Friday of our treatment our ring doorbell picked up someone ringing our doorbell at 1:36 PM.  By 1:44 PM, we received another ring at the doorbell and the service technician was already gone, I could see everything the technician did while on our property, Spoiler alert nothing was done. When I got home, there was a service sheet listing all the services that have been performed during our visit that day. They claim they did an application and an evaluation of the yard. I have no idea how a Service technician was able to perform an entire application on our front and back yard in 8 minutes.  MAKE SURE you have video if you were going to get the service. The rep who assisted us with setting up the plan stated if we had issues during our service to reach out to her, when we did, she ignored our text message. We’ve canceled our service and we will not return. If you ruin your first impression, you do not get a second chance. I’m also filling a complaint with the BBB, if I do not receive a refund as promised.

resp.text: Amanda, , we are sorry to see that you had a less than satisfactory experience. We can understand why it is upsetting for you to feel as if your results were not up to par. We would like to look into this for you. Please reach out to us via phone at 800-515-3380 or via email at melissavickers@trugreenmail.com with your address (including city/zip) and the best contact number for us to assist you.

name: Craig Pickel
text: Trugreen is the worst lawn care service i have ever dealt with.  Here are the pictures of my lawn after they started caring for it.  Half my yard is now dead and the other half is full of weeds.  I have been calling and trying to get some help from Trugreen for over 2 weeks and I have only received unfulfilled promises to come and re-service the yard.  Over the 2 week period I contacted Trugreen on 4 separate occasions and did not once receive a call from any service provider or manager to discuss how they intended to deal with my issues. I have cancelled my service with trugreen and am left upset that they collected over $150 from me for nothing but destroying my lawn.  I will go back to taking care of it myself.

name: Kim Triesler
text: Should be called TruBrown instead of TruGreen.  My lawn has more weeds this year and is the worst it has ever looked in 10 years.  My neighbor did his lawn himself and it is a vibrant green and thick, too.  I may stop TruGreen and do what my neighbor did, and save a bunch of money,  too!

resp.text: Hi Kim, we want you to have an awesome experience with our service, and we’re sorry it didn’t happen this time. We would love to get this resolved for you! Please reach out to us at customercare@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can review this further.

name: John Buckelew
text: Have used TruGreen for years. They're very good at what they do.

resp.text: Hi John, Thanks so much for the positive feedback. We're thrilled to have you as a part of our TruGreen Community!

name: Hedgehog Hollow
text: So we are in the middle of a national viral outbreak (not the you tube kind) and are to be self quarantining and a true green rep has come to my house in a no solicitation neighborhood not once, not twice but three times in one week! Even if I had ever considered using true green I would NEVER use them now!

name: Kristi Krieger
text: I really hate doing 1 star reviews but this time it is worth it.  I had gotten a call from my TruGreen rep Jonathan about setting up service.  We had service from TruGreen 2 years ago and stopped mostly because we didn't feel that the service was worth what we were paying.  We would get call around 9 AM for same day services so we hardly ever got our backyard treated, etc.  Also could never get ahold of a person at the Huntsville Office to talk about our service.  Well 2 weeks ago we decided to sign up again.  We signed up for the yearly service and I also asked about getting aeration set up for the lawn. So here we are 2 weeks later and we were told it would be on a Thursday and Friday of the week after we signed up.  Thursday rolled around and it was raining so of course they wouldn't be out.  I called Jonathan (no VM) so I texted him to find out that they would be out on that Friday.  Friday came and went without any service.  Texted Jonathan and was told it would be today (Monday).  So it's Monday and I texted Jonathan to find out when so I can unlock our back gate, etc and was told to go to the app to find out when they would be out. There is no place on the app to check this so I started a chat with an "agent" only to be told to talk to my representative on when they would be out.  In the mean time we have had two lawn applications in a matter of a week.  I'm beyond frustrated with True Green and will never recommend them for my friends and family.  I will be canceling my service and going with a more local company.

resp.text: Hi Kristi, we are sorry to hear that your experience was not more positive. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. If you are still willing, please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com so our team can take a closer look. Thank you!

name: holly mcginness
text: Do NOT give them your phone number or email.  After telling them I went with another company, I continue to get 2-3 calls a day "confirming" and numerous emails.  I AM NOT interested so stop calling and emailing me.  I would not hire this company just based on this, bordering on harrassment.

resp.text: Hi Holly, we are sorry to hear that this was your experience with us. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

name: gary rinard
text: The best I have had no problems with them my lawn looks great

resp.text: Thanks so much for the positive feedback. We're thrilled to have you as a part of our TruGreen Community!

name: Kathy Richards
text: I have TruGreen doing my lawn care. Had I  not had surveillance cameras and video I wouldn't have know that they only do part of the yard. I have weeds growing and when they came out to treat the yard this month I reran the footage of the employee working in my yard.The guy completely ignored half of my yard.never went on one side of the yard at l and never treated the area in the back against the house. I assumed because they were supposidly professionals there wouldn't be a need to babysit tge employees. I was wrong  on that count. I pay $101.95 per month for the service and was under the assumption that the entire yard would be treated monthly. Instead it is spot treated and I continue to have a weed problem. I also requested where a flowerbed use to be to be sprayed for weeds but the tec refused to spray there becasue it had mulch (not flowers) and was very augmentative, loud and disrespectful. When I called to the office I was speaking to someone in another state, not a local agent. I finally received a call back the next day saying there would be someone come to my home to discuss the service and what was not being done. They were to be here yesterday or today. Its late in the day and no one has shown up or called. I'm  very disappointed in the service and customer relations of this company. I would not recommend them unless you take the time to watch where they treat your yard while they are there and don't  mind having the tec argue with you from a 30 ft distance. I understand social distancing but this is redicious, rude and disrespectful.

resp.text: Hi Kathy, we are sorry to hear that you are having issues with our service. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. If you are still willing, please email us at reviews@trugreenmail.com so our team can take a closer look. Thank you!

text: I just started with Trugreen. They treated my yard one time and I saw more weeds not long after. I called my sales guy and he sent someone within a week to retreat my yard. The service so far is great. I never could get all of the weeds on my own. I can't wait to have a green weed free yard.

name: michael chalk
text: I cancelled my service because they didn't perform a lawn service but sent me a bill in the mail then apologized and sent the technician around to perform the service however, all he did was put a bill on my door informing me that there would be no charge for the service that they didn't perform while still not performing a service. Then this guy from sales calls me to find out why I cancelled, then informs me that he's not going to turn me over to collections. How nice of him. These people are not ethical. With all of the competition out there for lawn services, there are much better options. Go local, that's what I did.

name: Julie Williams
text: Just started this years treatments. The yard is already looking better! The mosquito service was awesome last year so we’re doing it again this year. I love going outside in the evening and not being eaten alive! Thanks Trugreen!

name: Ivey Townsend
text:
You're not have been the same in the last two years I just don't know what going on with your services, have to keep
Call your back to services my lawn can't get a person to talk to you always will call you back.

name: Katelyn G
text: Would potentially consider using this company had their door to door salesman not stood at my door for 4 minutes making my dogs howl. And then at one point saying "I know you're home". Love that my doorbell captures these terrible sales tactics so I can review what happens when I'm out. I understand the need for advertisement but I think everyone can agree that it's ridiculous for them to make rude comments and attempt for someone to answer the door for 4 minutes, ringing the doorbell twice, when there's clearly upset/angry dogs at the door greeting you.

name: Joshua C. Francis
text: Buyer beware.  I was told that my "prepay" contract would cover from the time I moved in through this year.  I then received a bill.  When I called, I was told that my prepay ran out and that I now had to pay for each service.  The service tech was messy and lazy, and whenever I pointed out problems he got annoyed.  My yard was better when I did it on my own.
