name: susan armstrong
text: Worst customer experience of my life!  Use them if you want to be billed after you cancel, have trash left in your yard, pellets all over your patio and gate left open so your dog gets out and after 1.5 years I still have weeds.  I agreed to pay half even though I do not believe I owed it just to make it go away.  Despite my zero balance they sent it to collections.  Even corporate recognized there was a problem but their offer to fix it was to talk to the manager so they can learn to properly close an account. Never ever again!  Looking for a service now and willing to pay twice the price for good customer care!  For the record - I have never written a bad review before.  I can't stress how awful of an experience this was!

resp.text: Hi Susan, we want you to have an awesome experience with our service and we’re sorry that didn’t happen this time. We would love to get this resolved for you! Please reach out to us at customercare@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can review this further.

name: Charlie Edwards
text: Disgusting unprofessional and that's why final bill won't get paid. Why pay when weeds grow free.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the positive feedback. We're thrilled to have you as a part of our TruGreen Community!

name: Sam Christmas
text: Tech was very knowledgeable and friendly.  He took his time and explained how he would be treating my lawn. Provided recommendations for watering and mowing techniques.

resp.text: Sam Christmas, we're happy you found our staff to be so supportive during your experience here at TruGreen Lawn Care.

name: Alena Chandler
text: I would rate lower than a 1 if I could at this point. I had TruGreen in 2018 and at the end of the year decided to end service. There were multiple times they didn’t show up and I had to call and complain.  And at no point in that year was my back yard treated and it was overcome with weeds. I didn’t think I should have to chase down a service I was paying for. At the beginning of October a sales rep came by and I decided after speaking with him to give it another shot. He seemed horrified by the difference between my front and back yards. He gave me his cell phone number as a personal guarantee that he would handle any issues of the person not coming out. Because of the time of year it was he told me that I would be services every 6-8 weeks. Which, if you’re any good at math, would tell you that at MOST I *may* have two treatments before the end of the year. On October 24th I texted him and said that there must be some confusion because I had already been charged twice, and when looking on the website it appeared I was going to have another one within the next two weeks. He told me he would credit me one of the services I had received and push back my next service. He was going to follow up with me the next day. On November 5th I reached out to him again, I had not received a follow up and already had a pending charge for another treatment. No response. November 6th I texted again, this time he said he was going to get it resolved and a credit issued. I should have that credit within three business days. On November 15th I had still not received that credit, and a technician showed up at my house to treat. I sent my sales rep another text. At this point I had already been billed 109.87 in a month and a half, when I should have been charged less than 80 through the end of the year. I explained what I had been billed, the lack of credits I received after being told it was coming, and the frustration I felt for being signed up for tree and shrub service that I didn’t ask for and didn’t need. I explained I expected a refund of 79.92 for the two treatments that I should have never received, and that I would like to cancel my service. He responded with a “Yes ma’am”. On November 20th I sent a follow up text to be sure it was handled. The sales rep has red the text but not responded. It is November 23rd and there is no refund to my account, I have no trust in TruGreen that this will be handled in a professional manner. If this isn’t resolved by the end of the month I will be going to the BBB. I’ve dealt with both ends of the issues that TruGreen has and it’s been entirely too frustrating for a company within an industry that is heavily saturated here.

resp.text: Hi Alena, we want you to have an awesome experience with our service, and we’re sorry it didn’t happen this time. We would love to get this resolved for you! Please reach out to us at customercare@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can review this further.

name: Bash Lielel
text:
I called to set up a time to get my yard appraised to see how much it would cost me. They were suppose to call and get a good time instead they showed up uninvited to my house while I was home alone and it was dark out. I thought someone was trying to break in. I then told them that scared me off from doing business with them.

I now get email phone calls and mail.
I have called your corporate number told them they are no longer allowed to call me or come to my house.

They don’t stop. I called warning them if they call or come to my house again I will file HARASSMENT charges with the police.
The calls continue. I have blocked every number they call me from but they won’t stop.
Yesterday I got a flyer had delivered to my house. Oh and this time your on camera with a no soliciting sign.

I will be contacting the police now and filing charges. Against the individual who left his name and number and the company.

name: Karen
text: Bad experience. Did not do service as agreed upon. I paid up front and after canceling service still have not received the $1000.+ they owe me. Very nice customer service on phone but they don’t deliver the actual service. Hope I don’t have to take them to court to get money back. Have called them multiple times to get this resolved. Warning! Don’t prepay!

resp.text: Hi Karen, we are sorry to hear that you are having issues with our service. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. If you are willing, please reach us at 800-878-4733 so that we can take a closer look, thank you.

name: Vic Welch
text: I have very satisfied with my lawn service.  I appreciate knowing ahead of time when the procedure is going to happen.  Service personnel are friendly, professional and ready to offer advice when asked.

name: Joann Pickrell
text: I have had a great experience with TruGreen. My lawn has greatly improved. The promise of a lawn to look like a golf course is coming true. I appreciate that they leave care instructions for me each time they treat my lawn. I have followed these care instructions and I feel this has given my lawn the care it needs. I have called the Tru Green office for advice and was pleasantly given the answers to my questions. They have been great to offer extra services and were pleasant wither I took the service or not. I will be a customer of TruGreen as long as I continue to get the wonderful service I have been getting !

name: Jacob Biby
text: When looking to hire a residential lawn maintenance company, I was looking for company that could provide total lawn care service.  That the lawn care specialist would not trouble me with 1000 questions after I explained the lawn care services that I wanted.  I am very pleased to say that I am 100% satisfied with the lawn maintenance services that I am receiving.  The lawn care specialist independently makes lawn care decisions and only coordinates with me on issues or questions that arise that we have not previously discussed.

name: Stanislav Zvoznikov
text: So i did the biggest mistake to hire tru Green for my lawn care and prepaid them. The did the service which I did see any different before and after. And I i asked for aeration but every time I was told that they will do next week which they didn’t. Then I canceled my service and now it’s been a month but I still didn't get my money back. DON NOT PREPAY .

resp.text: Hi Stanislav, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us. We would like to look into this for you if you're up for it please send us an email at melissavickers@trugreenmail.com. Thank you.

name: W. Scott Cameron
text: Since signing up for the annual TrueGreen Lawn service all I have to do is add water for the perfect lawn. I am informed when they will complete my treatment(s), they show up on the appointed day (weather permitting), apply the proper dosage to my lawn, leave me a summary of their work, and follow-up to see if I am  satisfied or have questions. All I have to do is add water and pay the bill.My lawn has never looked better.

name: Timothy LeVan
text: I was actually thinking of getting them at one point. They left a door hanger and wrote some very unprofessional notes on there. Mark Mckean left it on the door and was very rude and unprofessional. When I said they have bad reviews, he made up an excuse saying “they are a billion dollar company”. That does not define if they are good at customer service at the local level. These technicians are like vulchers. Most of the stuff they recommend you don’t need. If you are going to get your lawn treated, go through someone else.

resp.text: Hi Timothy, thank you for taking the time to leave a review, customer feedback is what makes us a better company. We are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with our service. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. If there is anything else we can do for you, please reach out. Thank you.

name: Brunhilde Haslett
text: Great customer service.. my specialist is always pleasant and very knowledgeable.  My yard looks great. Must be good advertising for TruGreen, because 3 of my neighbors started with TruGreen this spring.

name: Jason Newell
text: TruGreen has gone through several changes in leadership over the years and each time it seems they're looking to improve. Any issues I've had are addressed immediately and they're always willing to work with you on pricing. I recommend working with them.

name: Christian McCurry
text: A little shady if you ask me. Charges were not what I told they would be and not charged when I told they would be. Tried to tell me services were completed when I was outside waiting. All around bad business practices and can't be trusted.

resp.text: Hi Christian, We want you to have an awesome experience with our service, and we’re sorry it didn’t happen this time. We would love to get this resolved for you! Please reach out to us at reviews@trugreenmail.com with your account information so that we can review this further.

name: Carol Jones
text: Our last service was an add on to our yearly service. We had lime added to our yard.  The service guy rang the doorbell and introduced himself, explained why he was here and doubled checked we wanted the service.  He was very polite.  Of course we won't know  if adding the lime does what it's suppose to until next summer.

name: Todd Smith
text:
TRUGREEN Lawn Care contacted me by telephone in June, 2019 stating that my account was overdue.  They had administered two treatments erroneously believing I had paid for annual service.  They stated that I could resolve the issue by paying for the annual service.  I did not really want the annual service, but I agreed in order to resolve the issue.
I then received a letter from Transworld System, INC, a collection agency, dated 4 June 2019, notifying me that I had an unpaid debt to resolve with TRUGREEN.
I called TRUGREEN. They stated that I should disregard the letter, and I asked that they send me a letter stating that the issue was an error and that my account was never in arrears. They said that they would.
I received another letter from Transworld dated 1 July 2019, again stating that I had an unpaid debt.
I called TRUGREEN on 12 July. They said to disregard the letter. When I asked that they send me a letter clarifying the issue. They said that they could not because of corporate policy.
I have asked that TRUGREEN cancel my account because of this issue. I have sent letters to TRUGREEN and Transworld, but I believe that TRUGREEN’s actions are erroneous and could impact my credit rating.

resp.text: Hi Todd, thanks for taking the time to leave a review. If there is anything else our team can do for you please let us know.

name: Scholz Halvorson
text: Our lawn look wonderful ever since we started using Trugreen's services. They show up on a regular basis and leave helpful comments after every visit.

name: Patrick Ransom
text: Trugreen definitely does a better job in lawn health and weed control than I can do myself.  Highly recommend them for your lawn care needs.

name: Pam Lee
text: My yard is looking so good after just one treatment, very impressed !!!

resp.text: Hi Pam, Thanks for leaving a review, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed our services!

name: Cory Thomas
text: Tree and Shrub Service - office was notified of a small black beetle in soil.  Service person came out, "i hear you having beetle problems" look around in disbelief and scoffed at a tree that had the center cut out because it died.  He then went off to spray the trees and bushes  which is part of the standard service.  The spraying of the trees was very spuradic (one sided and some times not more than 10 to 12 feet from the ground, on 30 ft trees).  Not a very effective treatment.  Maybe it was a bad day for the service person, but this can't affect the service to be performed!

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at TruGreen Lawn Care. We regret that you weren't satisfied with your experience. We hope you will give us another chance. Please call us at 800-878-4733 so we can work towards a solution. Thank you and have a great day.

name: Brandon Ginter
text: Had them once before and they were bad. Always had stripes in yard from not adequately spreeding fertilizer. Finally cancelled and changed to Scott's and they were fantastic (even though TruGreen constantly called trying to get back with threatening tactics and making fun of the other companies). Sadly TruGreen bought out Scott's and after one summer the stripes are back. After cancelling this time I had to tell them I moved and block their numbers from calling.

name: Vladimir Florinski
text: Had dreadful experience with this company. They are all about marketing but know nothing of lawn care. Having fired them for damage to the lawn, I am still waiting for a refund I requested through BBB. They never deliver on the promises, lie through the teeth on the phone, and trespass on private property after having been warned. The best thing you could do is never let these people anywhere near your property.

name: Geraldine Curry
text: The lawn appearance is wonderful.  My neighbors inquire and I tell them TruGreen is servicing my lawn.  One neighbor is now getting his lawn serviced by TruGreen.  The lawn appearance was complimented on by the technician and I was told to keep up the good work.

name: Dan C
text: STAY AWAY from this company. The technician did not service 1/2 of my yard.  He spent less than 10 minutes treating nearly an acre of grass.  When I realized he was done I tried to flag him down, he drove right by me without slowing.  I called customer service to speak with the service manager and was told he would return my call in 24-48 hrs.  After 72 hrs and still haven't heard from them.  I attempted to call again and was given the same mantra, "He will call you back".  Avoid this company and use someone local who will care about customers and not just see a mark to scam.

resp.text: Hi Dan, we are sorry to hear our services didn't meet your expectations. We would love to get this resolved for you – please send us an email at customercare@trugreenmail.com with your account information and we will have our team reach out to you. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Ryan Wolff
text:
I have regretted ever doing business with this company (Trugreen in Huntsville, AL).  The service itself is inferior to competitors in every way.  They were the cheapest option but I still got less than I paid for.  I made the mistake of prepaying and they never treated the final two months during my service contract.  Since canceling I still get cold calls going on 5 years now despite repeated requests for them to stop.

Do not do business with this company.

resp.text: Ryan, we apologize if you are receiving excessive solicitation calls, which I understand is both frustrating and overwhelming. If you would like to email customercare@trugreenmail.com the first and last name plus the phone number, we can add you to our do not contact portal and ensure the upsell options are deactivated and the phone number is restricted.

name: Edge Walcott
text: Technician was knowledgeable, efficient and well mannared. He explained what he was doing and what I can expect. He also advised me what I can do to ensure great results.

name: Tammie Sarjahani
text:
We have Tru Green lawn service.
We are usually not home when our serviceman comes.
We were both home last week.  Our serviceman, Chris, was extremely informative, friendly and did a very detailed treatment on our yard. He didnt miss a spot and made sure to treat areas between fence lines!
Tru Green has been on top of service. If we are not happy, (new weeds) they return for re- treatment immediately.
Thank you for your service Tru Green!!

resp.text: Hi Tammie, thanks so much for the positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear our team has been making your lawn a success.

name: RODDRIC ELLSBERRY
text: What a waste of money.......Unprofessional and services are spotty/inconsistent. Please ensure you are at home and watch technician while serving your yard or TruGreen will claim to have completed work which was not done and also reminded technician that servicing your lawn means front and back yard.

name: David Ramirez
text: TruGreen has been servicing my lawn three years, every year we seen to go through the same song and dance, weeds and more weeds. Gave TruGreen several opportunities to correct the issues. I guess my money will go to another company!

name: Pamela Verne
text: Jim Steitz was our specialist and as in the past he has been excellent. He takes time to talk to us to tell us what he has done and problems he has seen and he presents himself in a very professional manner. We have been with you for over 20 years and he has been a true asset to your company.

name: Knr Rnk
text: My neighbor who has no lawn service and no irrigation system has a better looking lawn than me.  My lawn is currently full of weeds.  I probably need to find another company.

resp.text: Knr Rnk, we are sorry to see that you had a less than satisfactory experience. We can understand why it is upsetting for you to feel as if your results were not improving. TruGreen offers free and unlimited reservices in between your regularly scheduled paid visits upon request, to address additional concerns (such as weeds). Combining this partnership: a full program with proper mowing/watering habits, we believe that the lawn will improve. If you are interested, please reach out to 800-878-4733 for us to check your schedule and see if you are currently eligible for a free reservice.

name: David Pray
text: Excellent job. Professional and courteous technician.

name: Keepn It reall
text: Fake people. Service is shady

resp.text: Hi there, we are sorry to hear our services didn't meet your expectations. We would love to get this resolved for you. Please reach out to us at customercare@trugreenmail.com, and we will have our team review this. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Cynthia English
text: I'm not home when the specialist comes however my yard looks great.  Last year I had a big problem with weeds.  I asked for a special treatment which took care of the problem.  I do like the fact that my scheduling is automatic.  I don't have to call or log into anything to keep my yard and trees healthy and looking great.  Thank you!

name: JL G
text: I HAD for many years exceptionally superb service & impressive customer relations from Scott's Lawn Service out of Florence. Unfortunately, since they were taken over by TruGreen it went to h*** in hand basket. The rude fools won't stop calling me, despite my numerous requests to multiple sales/phone people to stop. The calls have crossed the line into what I would call harassment - and no I do not owe them a penny,  I paid up in full and cancelled. As if the constant disruptive calls aren't bad enough, the callers actually argue with me when I tell them to stop.

name: Jon Kelsey
text: Our lawn is one of the best looking in the neighborhood and I attribute that to TruGreen and their fine team of professionals. Our specialist took time to explain what he had done and what that would do for the lawn. He explained what we were to do after the application. He even cautioned us about letting our pet get on the lawn for a period of time. We are quite content with the value for the amount spent and would recommend TruGreen to anyone looking for a superior lawn service company. Thank you and keep up the good work.

name: Aaron M. May
text: I am borderline one star with this organization.  After almost a year my yard does not look like it is treated.  This year we have a lot of weeds.  They have missed treatments.  I have been given lame excuses such as "we have a lot of young new guys".

resp.text: Hi Aaron, we are sorry to hear that you are having issues with our service. This is not the kind of care you should expect from your TruGreen team. If you are willing, please reach us at 800-878-4733 so that we can take a closer look, thank you.

name: H B
text:
Ignores our neighborhood no soliciting signs and doesn't care about harassing folks.

Will never use them due to the behavior of their "salesmen".

name: intensivepassion
text: They seem to to be only interested in just the schedule service. It's impossible to get them to treat for grubs and army worms or just to get someone to call you regarding any issues with your lawn

name: Toni Auriemma
text: We are very pleased with the service we receive and the specialist always knocks at the door if I am home and also very friendly. So far for as long as we have been dealing with tru green never a problem.

name: carrie naccari
text: Trugreen has cared for our lawn for several years in many different cities. we have always had a great experience and usually the best lawn in the neighborhood

name: Brysen Fitzgerald
text: I have been a TruGreen customer for many years and this year my lawn has looked better than any time in the past. My tech has worked with me to control unwanted grass and come and treated when I needed extra help.

name: Kaia B.
text: I  have a household with a family member with immune system issue who are extremely sensitive to chemicals. My neighbor chooses to saturate his lawn with TruGreen chemicals on a regular basis and three times we have been promised by this companies customer service team and management that we would get a heads up before visits so we would at least have a chance to close windows or come inside. Have we gotten one call, NO. Each time we are treated poorly on the phone for even bringing it up, yet if the wind blows right we are forced to be coated in their noxious chemicals and the company is free and clear of the effects. It's not right, or fair and should be illegal.

name: Conrad Meyer
text: My TruGreen specialist was very professional and did a thorough job.  He was also very nice and sincere.

name: Bill Medley
text: Absolutely the worst service I've ever had!  Management is totally unresponsive and appears not to really care about service issues brought to their attention.  Their service has been late.  They've lied several times about providing a service when they actually didn't.  There is zero customer service or communications to the customer to address their poor service.  So here's a trick for you, I quit and will change my yard care needs to someone who actually cares about the customer.

name: James Hoggard
text:
What a miserable experience!!!  Stay away from this dishonest company.

I just received a bill from TruGreen where they applied service to my property WITHOUT PERMISSION!!! I received a past due bill in the mail. What a farce. I am so angry right now.

I do business with Scott's and would highly recommend everyone else to do the same.

name: R J HFNR
text: Do not use TruGreen Huntsville!  Quality is suspect.  Management is non-responsive.  Found out Technician was only treating half of our lawn.  When I asked the customer service rep at the 800 number to have the local manager give me a call to review the area to be treated, we got no response.  After 4 messages we gave up trying to reach a manager.  Cancelled my service.  We'll never use them again.

name: cole greco
text: Awful, Awful service!!!!  Don't use them!!  If you have a problem, don't expect them to come out and give personalized service.  Just a national marketing machine with nothing to back it up.  Terrible customer service.

name: LOU WINDSOR
text:
Charging for services never rendered

I was a customer for several years, and my service included my back yard.  When I noticed that my back yard was not as weed-free as my front/side yards, I called and was told that that situation would be rectified immediately.  It was not.  I canceled my service and told them to reduce/remove the charge from my account for services they did not render.  I was assured that it would be taken care of.  Several months later I received a call from TrueGreen's call center asking if I would be interested in their service.  I told them my story, I spoke to a 'manager', and was assured that it would not happen again.  I started my service again.  Shame on me.  Not only did they charge me again for my back yard and not treat it, they billed me for two visits in one week, and I even spoke to the tech in my driveway about it.  He said it would noted on my account that it was double booked, and I would be charged.  Got a bill for it.  Had to call and have it removed.  Come to find out that the tech was putting a sign in my back yard stating it was 'treated', but it wasn't.  I guess he didn't want to drag the hose all the way to the furthest recesses of my back yard.

Back to my original account:  They sent it to collections.  Charged me for treating my back yard for several months when they didn't, and when I notified them of their errors, and refused to pay the bill for services not rendered, I was sent to collections.  I will never pay it, but regret ever contacting these people.  There are too many local companies that will do a better job.

name: James Hoggard
text:
What a miserable experience!!!  Stay away from this dishonest company.

I just received a bill from TruGreen where they applied service to my property WITHOUT PERMISSION!!! I received a past due bill in the mail. What a farce. I am so angry right now.

I do business with Scott's and would highly recommend everyone else to do the same.

name: Ethel Jones Woodfork
text: Our service representative was very professional & took the time to explain what type of treatment he was giving our lawn

name: LOU WINDSOR
text:
Charging for services never rendered

I was a customer for several years, and my service included my back yard.  When I noticed that my back yard was not as weed-free as my front/side yards, I called and was told that that situation would be rectified immediately.  It was not.  I canceled my service and told them to reduce/remove the charge from my account for services they did not render.  I was assured that it would be taken care of.  Several months later I received a call from TrueGreen's call center asking if I would be interested in their service.  I told them my story, I spoke to a 'manager', and was assured that it would not happen again.  I started my service again.  Shame on me.  Not only did they charge me again for my back yard and not treat it, they billed me for two visits in one week, and I even spoke to the tech in my driveway about it.  He said it would noted on my account that it was double booked, and I would be charged.  Got a bill for it.  Had to call and have it removed.  Come to find out that the tech was putting a sign in my back yard stating it was 'treated', but it wasn't.  I guess he didn't want to drag the hose all the way to the furthest recesses of my back yard.

Back to my original account:  They sent it to collections.  Charged me for treating my back yard for several months when they didn't, and when I notified them of their errors, and refused to pay the bill for services not rendered, I was sent to collections.  I will never pay it, but regret ever contacting these people.  There are too many local companies that will do a better job.

name: R J HFNR
text: Do not use TruGreen Huntsville!  Quality is suspect.  Management is non-responsive.  Found out Technician was only treating half of our lawn.  When I asked the customer service rep at the 800 number to have the local manager give me a call to review the area to be treated, we got no response.  After 4 messages we gave up trying to reach a manager.  Cancelled my service.  We'll never use them again.

name: Don Potter
text:
They always do an outstanding job.  Proof is in the results!
Before the servicing, the yard was pretty much a wreck, now it is one of the nicest on the entire street!

name: Tommy Dailey
text: Completely dissatisfied.  Total waste of money.  Asked for and got lawn analysis at a residence in Guntersville, but their technicians are just applicators and know very little about lawn care.  The lawn went from green and questionable to completely dead and they were still trying to charge me for additional services to a dead lawn.  Can't their technicians tell when a lawn is dead?  To add insult, they came and aeriated the dead lawn which just chewed up dead grass and dirt and made total mess - and then charged me for the aeriation service.  When I talked to customer service, they said Huntsville manager would call me (surprise - he never did).   I asked for refund but obviously they haven't called to discuss problems.  If I don't get refund for services I will post up before and after pictures of my lawn.

name: Marc Stone
text:
After almost 3 years, I can't tolerate the incompetence and near-fraud from this company.  I have 75% Bermuda/Zoysia and 25% Frescue in another part.  Now....yard littered with weeds.

I started using their service in late 2015.  By summer 2016, they killed 75% of the grass in my backyard and the front was not looking good.  I spent about $2000 re-sodding the bare spots they created as it was creating erosion under my fence line.  Within a week, they came out to Aerate my yard. I informed them about the sod and they were supposed to avoid it...however after work I came home to see most of it destroyed.  After complaining, their manager did send a person out to seed parts of my yard.  This is about the only good thing I can say about their service.

The final straw happened this year.  They applied pre-emergent too late.  Their techs overlapped scheduled items at improper times with no knowledge of the other.  They "said" they sprayed for weeds multiple times.  However despite paying for 4 services, weeds started running amok and the Dallisgrass has quadrupled in size.  It should have been reduced over the past couple years if they were treating it properly.

I reported issues numerous times, and although on face value they acted sincere, in action they failed.   I gave them 2 stars instead of 1 because the corporate support number is very courteous, however the local management is horrible.

name: Binh Dinh
text:
Had them before and wasn't happy.  Changed to Scotts and Scotts was great until TruGreen bought them!

Just like before, too many no shows!  Sometime they made the appointments for treatment and did not show up but put in their system that they came/treated and billed us.  I made so many calls asking them to correct what they're doing; however, the same things keep happening!  We received two calls in the last two weeks, asking us to prepare the yard (mark sprinkler heads) so they can come to do the aeration on 10/31/17, we put down flags to mark them; however, again, there's no show!  Called back this morning, the customer service said they rescheduled it to 11/9 (without telling us)!  I couldn't leave the flags there until 11/9 because my HOA will send me the note!  I don't want to take them off and have to re-mark them again on 11/8!

More importantly, my yard is still full of weeds too!!

We just cancelled TruGreen and will NEVER allow them to treat my grass again.

name: Clint Levinson
text:
RUN AWAY!

A year ago I had a lush green lawn that is now patchy and near dead in several spots.   The  lawn was established zoysia and gets plenty of sun and water.  I am over run by nutgrass and have to make special requests for it to be treated and when they do they treat about 20% of the problem area.

Like other reviewers have stated trying to talk to a live person in Huntsville is near impossible.  After 6 phone calls and threatening to sue, a field manger comes out and explains they will do a soil test actually use a fertilizer that works.  It has been a couple weeks and no news of the results or action taken as a result.

Do not be fooled into thinking they will make your lawn look better they will however "service" it and charge you $50 a month.  For $600 a year there has to be better options.

I am a real customer in Huntsville and had high hopes for the service. But frankly they did more harm than good and the complaint resolution and follow up is non existent.

name: Joyce C.
text: Excellent service. Beautiful yard.

name: Ed Aycock
text: Each service visit makes a noticeable difference in the health and appearance of my lawn. Couldn’t be happier with the results!

resp.text: We're thrilled to hear your are seeing great results Ed!

name: Chris Hines
text: They are always a pain to deal with. Did keep the crabgrass from coming in this year

resp.text: Hi Chris, thanks for taking the time to provide us with some feedback on how we can improve. We are sorry to hear that you have had a negative experience with us. If there is anything we can do for you, please let us know.

name: Seema SK
text: I had the worst experience with Trugreen few years back and when few months back manager approached saying he would like to earn the business and do good we tried giving it a chance..very bad decision some things dont change..their customer service and that guy called Dxxxvd is worst. extremely rude to talk even after complaing to other guy and customer head didn't hear back so what can you expect from such company. save your money and respect as they don't deserve it.

name: David Corredor
text: I've asked them numerous times not to call me because I don't need the services anymore and they keep calling and calling no matter the time, in the morning and sometimes 8pm. To my celphone, to my office. It is insane and infuriating. Just despicable service. I'll be sure not to ever do business with them again and recommend everyone I know not to use them either unless they like to be harassed non stop.

name: Gary Liederbach
text: Terrible customer service.  Every time I tried to call my local Trugreen on national or even the local phone number given to me by national rep, or one in phone directory, you are shuffled through an automated system to  someone in  call center in Massachusetts.  And I live in Alabama :(  No personal service.

name: Nathan Yoder
text:
Have used TruGreen for almost a year now.  They have provided good service thus far on a consistent basis.  They have come out additional times when required as well for spot weed treatment.

One item to note:  I always have the driver call me prior to coming out so that I am here and can supervise the application process and ensure it is applied where it is supposed to be applied (the front and sides only).  This because I had seen so many reviews where people indicated that TruGreen reps had lied about putting down an application.

Overall very happy with TruGreen and their services thus far.  I plan on continuing with them unless their are service issues or the price increases.

name: Sandra mccoomer
text: Yard still has weeds and not as green .

resp.text: Hi Sandra, we would love to look into this for you as we want you to have an awesome experience with our service. Please email us at customercare@trugreenmail.com so that we can get this resolved for you.

name: BREAD DAY
text: Two Thumbs up!

name: Jeremy Jones
text: Paid TruGreen an up front amount of almost $600 for 1year of treatment while I was deploying to Afghanistan. That was in Aug 17. I just received a bill for $65 bucks for my latest treatment in January 18. So the 12 months was used up in less than 6 months; then they start charging for additional treatments. I also paid for an aeration of the lawn to be performed in the spring of 2018. Come to find out, they did it at the end of October 17 when I was already deployed. All the sales specialist said was a lie. Cancelled my service today...Will not go back to using their service.

name: Tatiana Castellanos
text: Worst lawn care ever. One year ago we got our house build. One month after leaving in our new home one of True Green sales Rep. knock at our door. He can guarantee that we will have nice, strong, green grass after 7 treatments and that they were voted as the best lawn care in the Tenesse Valley. He said they were running a "new home buyer special" and he could Lock me in on a " special Price" but I had to sign up now. It came out to be 60 dollars each treatment. We did 10 treatments (540 dollars) I got one free treatment because they " FORGOT"  to come one time. I saw no diffrence in our grass after the 5th treatment. The house next to me had better grass and they were not paying for lawn care. After the 5th treatment I called to cancel it. The sale rep  told me that I had to get it aerated to see progress which cost 125.00 dollars plus seeds. Plus because I was canceling earlier I would have had to pay a cancellation fee. So I gave them another shot and they  came  and did it. Two more treatments later I saw NO difference. my backyard was covered it dirt and weeds. So I called agian to cancel it  but this time I wanted a refund on the aerated service because it clearly did not work.I wanted to cancel my contract  and I wanted to know how they can  "guarantee" that I will have green grass after 6 treatments!?! Ballzy move. I was not able to get a hold of a manger and the coustmer service was very rude. During our services I kept getting calls for pest control, ect.. ect.. Late at night from 7:30 pm to 9:30  pm. I finally was tired of giving my money away to a company that was made up of lies,I canceled it last week and before I cancel it they told me they can lock me on a " special deal" of 25 dollars a service!?!?!?!?!?!?! Just so they can keep me. We paid for 9 treatments and got it aerated plus Seeds we spend 755 dollars and we still have no strong, green, grass Just weeds and dirt. and some grass around our fence. Don't let true green take your money and time away. Worst grass service ever!!!!

name: jamorris brown
text: Nice friendly place

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Jamorris! We hope you continue to enjoy your services.

name: Donald Sanders
text: I have been using this service for three months on newly installed sod (Stillwater Cove area). There has been no improvement in the condition of my lawn from crabgrass growth.  I have tried to talk to a human being in Huntsville (Madison area) and just get put on a tiring and useless out-of-area call system.  The 256 number is redirected to a call center. There is no personal interest, no personal care.  This is a "pay and spray” approach to lawn care.  Do not believe the in-between care service (guarantee) made during the initial sale-pitch. I was told by a corporate reps via phone conversation they‘re a no-refund service company. New Buyer’s Beware!!!I

name: Craig Shaw
text: Almost killed my lawn including trees.  Suspended service until I spoke to manager but manager will not return call but tells his leadership he did.

name: Jay Martin
text:
This company calls over and over again even when you say to quit calling.  Their service is not that great so they have to bug you to sell it.  I use SCOTTS and they are the best!!!
TruGreen has called me twice today and I told them no the first time and don't call back.  They called at lunch time and dinner time.  Please do not do business with them.  Please give them bad ratings.
I never do this, but I am at my wits end.

name: Brian John
text: Stay away. Customer service is horrible. I had an issue with my lawn and the manager was supposed to call me back that didn't happen. I called back and they said it would be escalated to a higher manager and I am still waiting 3 days later.

name: Louise Williams
text: I can tell a big difference in my yard than my neighbors who do not use a lawn service.

name: Bob DeFour
text: Trugreen is on top of my lawn care, nary a weed to be found in my yard.

name: Jennifer McClure
text: People are very nice

name: lo
text: WE HAVE BEEN USING TRUGREEN FOR A YEAR AND HAVE NO GRASS!!!

name: Alex Kalhori
text: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERIBBLE

name: Anthony Burnette
text: Loved it

name: Frances Broadwater
text: Good Experience

name: Scott Ray
text: Horrible.  If you want to keep your yard beautiful stay away from these guys.

name: TreeHouse Vlogs
text: Worst company ever

name: SoutherCharm2
text: This company is the worst ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!They say they come out and treat the lawn LIARS!!!!!!!  DO NOT EVER USE THIS COMPANY YOU WILL BE RIPPED OFF.

name: rita heathcock
text: very satisfied

name: Ray Crocker
text: Graham and his team were very knowledgeable and professional. They removed several trees and old stumps. All debris was promptly taken off site. They also trimmed several trees for us that we didn’t want to lose. They trimmed them strategically to prevent splitting and allowed the trees to be saved. I can’t recommend Graham and his team more highly. He is not just some guy that cuts down trees but a professional arborist that will maximize and enhance what you love about your property.

name: Tom V
text: I'm so happy to have found AUF. Graham and his team were an absolute joy to work with. After getting stood up by a couple other companies, I would have been satisfied with them just showing up. But then they exceeded all my expectations. Right on time, fast and thorough without a hint of carelessness. Also the best price. All in all a great value, and wonderful experience.

name: Mariana Gruschow
text: Graham and his team are great! A friend sent us his contact after multiple fails with other companies to get an estimate. We were lucky to catch him before a project so we got our yard cleared out super fast.

name: Mia Ransom-Parnell
text: My neighbor’s tree fell across my yard. I called AUF and they promptly arrived to provide an estimate and agree on a date for removal. They were on time, professional,  cleaned up my yard, and hauled everything away the next day. I will use them again and would recommend them for any and all of your forestry needs.

name: John Ward
text: We were so Blessed to find Alabama Urban Forestry.  Our trees had some dead limbs, way too high for us to prune. We called after 5PM on a Saturday and they came out the very next day!!! They pruned all the dead limbs and disposed of the debris! We are so happy and appreciative of their FANTASTIC SERVICE!!!

name: Music Bham
text: After seeking 7+ estimates, I was lucky to find Graham Henderson and his extremely knowledgeable, capable and skilled crew. They offer the very best value in tree and debris removal industry for Birmingham and surrounding areas. They did not up-charge us based on our zip code, and they went above and beyond to exceed our satisfaction. Once they begin, they do not sit still, and will work to find things to do to make the most of their time and your investment. While with us, they took it upon themselves to blow leaves, grind additional stumps, grade undulation and anything within the scope of their expertise... and they didn’t even have to be asked. Once complete, I was amazed at how clean and kept they left my property. They will see to it that you get your money’s worth, and will even return to complete the smallest of tasks if their day did not allow. They communicated along the way so we were always in the know and without question, instilling further confidence in my money spent. These guys are the best in the business and an absolute pleasure to do business with!

name: Eric Lovelady
text: AWESOME!!!!! Came out on a weekend with a free estimate, agreed (with a handshake) on what they could do for my budget. Showed up, and exceeded my expectations!!!Thank you Graham and your hardworking team for the upstanding service. I will definitely call you and refer you, for future treework services.

name: Angela Coxhead
text:
Graham and his guys went above and beyond!!! We hired them after a tornado hit our backyard.  They worked hard to get it done quickly, and competently. They were reasonably priced, but did a spectacular job!! They even rebuilt our fire pit! And, redistributed the gravel we had under our once trampoline (tornado destroyed it). They didn’t drive their Bobcat on our lawn like I’ve seen some tree services do in our neighborhood. I just can’t say enough good things about these guys! We had so many companies that I believe were trying to take advantage of us during this disaster! You wouldn’t believe the difference in the estimates!
Graham and his guys are authentic good guys!

name: Jordan Nemiroff
text: Graham and his team did an amazing job clearing our backyard of overgrown trees and brush. We can’t wait to enjoy our new yard!

name: Kathy Harris
text: All I can say is SUPERB service!! I called at the last minute and they came through! Very courteous and professional. I would recommend them highly!

text:

Thanks again to Alabama Urban Forestry for taking care of every single detail of this project!

text: Graham’s team was professional, courteous, and best of all affordable. Would highly recommend their tree trimming services to anyone in the area! Thanks you guys!

text: They did a great job. No mess very professional. Will recommend and use again.

text: Graham and his crew were very thorough.  They got the job done in a timely manner. They went above and beyond to take care of our needs.

text: Graham and his crew at AUF did an outstanding job with my tree removal needs. I had two large trees come down in the storm a few days ago. When I called he said he could come take a look almost immediately. He followed through and had a quote within the hour. Then his crew was able to start the same day to get the tree off my roof. Afterwards the crew cleaned up so well that it was hard to tell they were there. Thank you guys!

text: Graham and AUF are hands-down the best tree service in Birmingham.  I had a large 60 year old white oak looming over my home and within a week the tree was gone. I had 3 other tree services survey around my house and essentially tell me all the trees needed to come down.  Graham spotted only the problem trees and groomed the others so they could remain healthy.  Not to mention the price was more than fair compared to other companies.  Highly recommended!

Graham, owner set a fair price for detailed tree removal and stump grinding job. They also pulled up scrubs from around the house and detached garage. Alabama Urban Forestry exceeded my expectations. Thank you Graham and team for my new garden/orchard spot.
Linda Mason

name: Skyler Gray
text: Amazing job! Had a big oak in the backyard that was over the house and a neighbors house. He was very professional when he showed up and was very personable and knowledgeable. Him and his crew took the tree down in pieces with little issue. Before leaving they raked everything up that was left over and made sure everything was satisfactory. Would definitely call them again and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Mr. Grey, we're really happy that you were pleased with our service. We go out of our way to present ourselves as professionally as possible. If you ever need anything again please feel free to call!

name: Daniel Rawlings
text: Kevin and his crew were very professional, dependable, and reasonably priced. His crew were completely respectful of our property while removing 4 trees, three of which were over the house.  He is the company I am going to call for some future work.

resp.text:
Mr. Rawlings,

Thank you for letting us serve you! We appreciate the kind words. I look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Hooknspktr
text: Owner showed up on time for the estimate and on time for the job.  Had 5 large trees taken down close to my house.  Area was cleaned up spotless and stumps ground down.  It's like the trees never existed.  No damage to structures or land.  Price was reasonable and you simply cannot get better service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! I am happy that you are please with the work. Please let us know if we can ever help out again!

name: Donald Hood
text: Had several trees cut down and stumps removed. The price was miles better than others that i had give me a quote. I was more than satisfied with the work that has been performed. The clean up after was above and beyond. It shows a sense of pride missing from most other service providers i have observed working in the area. I will highly recommend to others and use for any future needs.

resp.text:
Donald,
Thank you very much for the review. We strive for customer satisfaction. It always feels good when a customer is happy with the work! It was really nice meeting you and your wife. I hope to serve you soon again.

name: CJ Whitney
text: Great service! Showed up on time to give me an estimate and was very professional and knowledgeable. Fair priced and met my timeline on the job. Kevin has earned a long time customer in me! Highly recommend Bigelows tree service!

resp.text: Thank you CJ! I am always happy to hear happy customers! It was a pleasure serving you.

name: Keith T. Bonner Jr.
text: I had a large oak tree that was overhanging my home and was concerned that it may fall on my house.  He came out to my home and quoted me a very competitive and honest price.  He removed the tree, stump, and filled it in within one week of the quote.  Customer service was superior and quality of work was outstanding.  I would definitely recommend him for any tree service.

name: Craig Buehl
text: Great guys.  Honest and flexible.  Very professional.  They did a great Job.  They returned phone calls and emails quickly, showed up ready to go on time, worked hard to make sure the job was done on time.  I would HIGHLY recommend them.

resp.text:
Mr. Buehl,

Thank you for the kind words! We appreciate the recommendation and hope to serve you in the future. Thank you again!

name: Justin Watson
text: Kevin is awesome. He came out to give us our estimate on felling a dying pine and his prices were beyond competitive. He showed up exactly when he said he would and was very professional. He dropped the tree in the only small gap available in order to not cause any damage to our property or pool. I'd recommend Bigelow's Tree Service to anyone looking for tree work to be done.

resp.text:
Mr. Watson,

Thank you very much! I am happy that the work was to your satisfaction. Please let me know know if you ever need anything.

name: Anthony Probasco
text: Truly quality service... Kevin is not your usual service provider, this guy is extremely over educated with a graduate degree and tons of life experience. Him and his wife appear to be a wonderful family. Their prices are really good for the quality they provide. Simply put if your looking for safe clean and professional they should be your choice.

resp.text: Thank you very much! If you need anything else feel free to call!

name: Creation Carpentry
text: I had a need for some work with a trailer hauling some stuff back to the house and Kevin took time out and immediately helped me out for a fair price. He was timely and on budget. Thank you for your hard work and honesty it's really nice in a world like this.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! I am glad to help and hope I can help in the future!

name: Clegg Snipes
text: This is a very great company and are particularly detailed at what they do!!!! I would recommend anyone needing any tree work, stump grinding or just an estimate on prunning some limbs/trees to give them a call ASAP. The owner is very kind and polite and will go out of his way to help you. They are insured and I have heard nothing but positive things about Bigelow's Tree Service!!! Call them today!!! 💯%!!!!

name: Kim Mentzer
text: Kevin and his crew are great. We  came home to find our tree and house zapped by lightening, called Bigelow ' Tree Service they came out immediately and assessed the situation. They were worried about the tree falling on the house and causing more damage to the house or our family, they took the tree down immediately while it was still storming out. Now that's customer service!!!  They came back and cleaned all debris away. Any one needing tree work give them a call Great people to work with!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Kim! I'm glad that we could help you out. Please let me know if there's anything else you ever need!

name: Summer Keahey
text:
Kevin came to my home after a storm came through & a big tree landed on my home, auto, & power lines. He made the experience much easier to deal with. He was ready & eager to start the job. He did an amazing job removing the tree & the clean up afterwards. My yard looked so great afterwards. He worked very hard & really helped us deal with the whole situation. His prices are great & he is all around a super friendly guy. I would highly recommend him to anyone. Thank you so much Kevin! We appreciate everything!
*Summer Carter*

resp.text:
Summer,

Thank you for the kind words! I was happy to help and am glad that everyone is safe and back in your home! The circumstances were unfortunate, but I was happy to meet you and your family. If you guys ever need anything again, please feel free to call.

name: Betty Gerard
text: Kevin and his wife did a great job at our house! We had 3 large pines overhanging our house and we were really worried that a strong storm would end in a tree through the roof. Kevin came out and looked at the trees for us. He was well spoken and when we found out that he was still in the military we made up our minds to go with him. Him and his wife took the trees down over three days and then cleaned up the yard like the work never happened! I highly recommend going with Bigelow's Tree Service!

name: Brad Snellgrove
text: Kevin and his crew do a fantastic job! They will do the extra steps to make sure the work is done properly! Highly recommend!

resp.text:
Brad,

Thank you so much! We try very hard to focus on the details. We are glad that you noticed and appreciate the recommendation!

name: Josh Wheeler
text: Very professional. Not hard to tell kevin is military by his work ethic and respect. Had him cut down a large branch that was hanging over my fence. Left the yard as clean as he found it. Wood (pun intended) use this service again. Highly recommended!

name: Tina Dunning
text: Very unprofessional tree service ! Was not in time for the estimate and try's to get more money that what the job is worth. I wouldn't not recommend Kevin at all.

resp.text:
Mrs. Dunning,

I think you have the wrong Tree Company.  I have not met you nor have I ever conducted an estimate for a person with your first or last name. That being said, Bigelow's Tree Service is built on the reputation of being on time and completing a job to the highest standard. My 17 years in the military have taught me that being "in the right place, at the right time, in the right uniform" is of the utmost importance when establishing relationships. For this reason my business would not survive if I conducted myself in the way you portrayed. I will tell you that I will not be the cheapest in town. I take extra precautions, in accordance with the International Society of Arborists, to ensure the safety of myself and my crew. Additionally I focus on the quality of work, not the speed at which I can get it completed. This being said I am sorry that you had a bad experience with a local tree company, however, I assure you that it was not me. If you would like to discuss this further please give me a call.

name: Andrew Huggins
text: Kevin and the team at Bigalows are great to work with! I would suggest to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Darick Wildman
text: Veteran-owned and operated service.  Very professional and reliable.  Highly recommended.  My only go-to for this type of work.

name: RedTails
text:
Outstanding service!
Kevin Bigelow came by within 24hrs of first contact,  did assessment,  and was job complete within 2 days....Tree looks great!  Gives the property a total male over...  Ohhh,  they cleaned up EVERY leaf!!

resp.text: Mr. Poe, Thank you very much! We appreciate you writing a review. If you ever need anything else please feel free to call!

name: Susan Minton
text: My tree is so Beautiful now ! I absolutely love it the crew was nice and very professional they cleaned everything up I will use them again if needed and I Highly recommend them if you need any kind of tree work

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Susan! We appreciate it a ton. If you ever need anything again feel free to let us know!

name: Colby Duckett
text:
My family recently moved to a renovated home in Gadsden that had a very large tree dangerously hanging over the house and several other over-grown trees on the property.  By chance, I found Kevin's Tree service on-line.  He answered the very first time I called, which was before 7:30am.  He came to the property and gave me an accurate estimate before by 10:30am, had his crew and equipment on site by 3:30pm, and finished the job, including clean-up by 7:00pm all in the same day..... and this was not a small job.  He even returned the following day, as promised, to cut a dead tree that required additional equipment, a bucket truck, that he did not have out on-site when I originally called him about the job.  Kevin and his crew were friendly, eager, responsive, prompt,  professional, and DID A VERY EXCELLENT JOB FOR A VERY FAIR PRICE.

In short, I GIVE KEVIN'S TREE SERVICE MY HIGHEST RECOMMENDATION AND WOULD ENCOURAGE OTHERS TO CALL KEVIN FIRST FOR YOUR TREE SERVICE NEEDS..... HE WILL DO THE JOB RIGHT!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We're glad to have been able to help you out, Colby!

name: Amy Harper
text: We had Kevin’s Tree Sevice come out to look at 6 trees we wanted removed. From the estimate to the job being completed, working with Kevin’s was a pleasure.  The staff were all professional , efficient and  courteous, the estimate was  clear and a good rate for the quality workmanship we desired.  The finished product was not disappointing at all.  We were surprised  at how quickly the job was done and plan to use Kevin’s for any new needs that may arise  .

name: Bob Robert
text: First off their sales man "Tyler" was very respectful and knowledgeable. He pointed out many tree problems we did not notice. The crew was very respectful safe and professional as well. I was impressed the wore helmets and face shields. Lastly they where done in less than a day other services told me it was a 2 day project.

name: Michaele Moore
text: I highly recommend Kevin's Tree Service!!  I had 2 large trees in a difficult situation, and several other trees that the canopy needed attention to.  Kevin and his crew took excellent care and concern with my property and my neighbors property while working.  The clean up was exceptional! The crew were very professional and wanted to make sure everything was good and we were satisfied with their work.  If you need any kind of tree work - call Kevin!  You will be another satisfied customer for sure!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! I'm glad we were able to help you out.

name: Carolyn Lockey
text: Kevin’s crew tackled a difficult job with enthusiasm and a much needed sense of humor. The temperature soared, but the crew remained energetic. They exhibited professionalism and helped me make decisions about what to remove and what to preserve. I cannot imagine finding another tree service with this degree of integrity. The clean up was perfect. Thank you Kevin, and thank you to your great crew.

name: Ramona Thompson
text: I was extremely satisfied with Kevin's Tree Service.  They went above and beyond what was expected.  The team was professional and very knowledgeable.  They were a group of very considerate team workers, and everyone played a part.  They're really caring workers and want everything done right.  Thank you again for everything.  Yippeee!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Ramona! Glad we were able to help you out. Let me know if you need anything else!

name: Jackie Blackburn
text:
Kevin came out to give me an estimate on removing a large pecan tree the same day that I called him. Two days later he and his crew showed up on time and went right to work. Kevin has a great crew! They are hardworking and easy to work with.
The tree was about 90’ tall and very close to our house. Not a problem for these guys!
We will definitely use Kevin’s Tree Service again!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words, Jackie! Glad we were able to help you out! Let us know if we can be of assistance again.

name: al yother
text: Kevin’s Tree Service removed 11 trees  from my yard in less than 2 days! They worked until they had my yard looking great. Kevin even came and hung a tree swing for my grandchildren! The crew is professional and Kevin’s work is outstanding. It’s difficult to get what you pay for in this world, but in this case, I felt like I owed him more than I paid. Thank you again.

resp.text: Hey Al, I'm glad we were able to help you with your tree removal. Let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: James Taylor
text: We love our historic home in Springville, Al., we were in desperate need of having a very large old oak tree removed from the front yard. We were told Kevin, with Kevin’s Tree Service  was the man to call. So we called Kevin and he gave us an estimate the same day. It was amazing to see how this team worked together taking down this massive tree! Not one limb fell on the Japanese Maple growing directly below this old oak. We can not rave enough about our satisfaction with Kevin and his entire team of tree experts. From beginning to end this was indeed top notch service. This kind of professionalism is rare these days, no small detail was omitted. Tree removed, limbs and debris removed, stump removed, yard cleaned, porch, driveway, street, and even the roof blowed off. The next time we need any tree work done the only call will be to Kevin and his great team.

resp.text: Hey James, glad to help. Thanks you!

name: Rita Gross
text: Thank you Kevin’s Tree Service, LLC for a great job!  8 trees later and one was 80 feet tall it looks great.  Very professional and all of the men did an exceptional job!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Rita! Glad to help :)

name: Tom Johnson
text: We live in Southside and recently had eight trees removed and several others trimmed.  The crew did a great job of taking down the trees, grinding the stumps, and removing the debris. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Tom! Really appreciate it!

name: Doris Shack
text: The former and workers were very pleasant and cordial.  Very good job of cleaning the area and removing the trees.  I would recommend Kevin for other jobs.

resp.text: Glad we could help you out Doris! Thank you for the kind words.

name: Micah Brookshear
text: I’ve known Kevin for a few years now, and I’ve always been impressed with his level of professionalism and integrity. His work is top-notch, his prices are fair, and his customer service is second to none.  I would highly suggest anyone looking for any kind of tree service in Gadsden to at least call Kevin for an estimate.

name: rhiamon shae
text:
When my fiance called and spoke with Kevin, he was immediately struck by the courtesy and professionalism with which he was treated.

Even with a busy schedule, Kevin came out to give the estimate within a couple hours. The estimate was very reasonable. My fiance decided immediately that this was the company to use. Kevin engendered a level of trust that is sadly not common these days.

Kevin had his foreman stop by to check out the job with his crew on their way home from work and schedule a time to complete the task. When they arrived and took a look at the site, the foreman, Houston, said they could take the tree out for us immediately. It was decided to go ahead.

The crew did not disappoint. They went to work like a well-oiled machine and removed an 80' tall ailing pine tree with amazing efficiancy. They were courteous, professional, and mindful of our property and that of our neighbor.

When I arrived home from work, they were finishing up the job. As saddened as I was by the need to take the tree down, I was deeply impressed by the entire crew.

Top marks to these folks! We highly recommend them to anyone who needs tree service. We will definitely have them out again when the need arises. Thanks fellas! (A shout out to the office staff as well. Friendly, professional, and courteous all the way.)

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. I'm so glad we were able to help you out. Let us know if you need our help again!

name: Jennifer Carruth
text: Doesn't return a phone call to potential new client.  If you are overrun with work and don't have the time or manpower to take on new clients, please communicate that so that people don't waste their time waiting for you to make a return phone call.

resp.text: Hey Jennifer, we don't have any records of ever speaking to you or doing business with you. It's possible you're reviewing the wrong place.

name: Tracy Scroggins
text: I called Kevin's Tree service on a Wednesday, he came out gave a quote and by lunch Friday my yard looked amazing!The crew worked like a well oiled machine! Not only did they take care of my yard, but my neighbor had a brush fire that started to get out control and they went over and contained it before it spread. If you want anything yard related done I would definitely recommend Kevin's Tree Service. They do fantastic work, They're very affordable and best of all they do what they say their going to do!!

resp.text: Thank you for the nice words, Tracy! We really appreciate the opportunity to work with you. We hope to be able to help you in the future if you need us!

resp.text: Hey Scott, glad we were able to help you out!

text: Kevin's crew did an outstanding job with my three stumps, and one of those was huge. name: Joy Spell
text: Kevin and his crew are simply amazing!!!! Literally a 24 hour turn around from first call contact to job completion. And, it was no small job! We had about 7 very large trees in close proximity to our residence removed. They also did land clearing, had a dual axle truck load of gravel bought in, and spread it over our driveway. They also trimmed branches away from our power lines and ground the large tree stumps at no additional charge. They definitely go way above and beyond, insuring customer satisfaction, and setting themselves apart as a one of a kind, top notch business! The crew was amazing and worked constantly and diligently to ensure prompt job completion. All this despite mid 90s degree heat in the sun all day! The crew leader on site, Houston, was super professional, friendly, and  and explained the details of our contact clearly before work began. They moved items in the yard we didn't have time to move (because of their amazing quick turn around time on starting the job) without complaint. They ensured we were happy with the job before they agreed to accept payment, and offered to stay for additional work. (We asked for the power lines to be cleared and they obliged.) The owner, Kevin came out and discussed plans the day before, then came back to check the crew's work to ensure it was both to his satisfaction as well as ours. Great communication, great service and great family people. We very highly recommend and will definitely use them again, and only them, for any future needs. Thank you guys for everything! You truly are the best! You represent what it is to be a great, customer focused business!

name: Beth Amason
text: Takes advance of older people. Charges credit card fees on top of insanely high prices. Then tells us we are liars. Do not use!

resp.text:
Beth,

After looking at our records we have no indication that we've done work for you. You may have written a review under the wrong tree service company.

To address your statements, however, we do price our services very competitively at Kevin's Tree Service and try to provide our customers with the best price possible. We have had many happy clients over the years, and one of the things we hear from our customers most often is what a great value we're able to provide. Also, we do explicitly state in our contracts that there will be an additional fee for paying with credit card as is the case for many small, locally-owned businesses.

text:
I recommend Tenn Valley Tree Service highly!  I just had a huge Cedar cut down,  9 stumps ground and a fence row eyesore cleaned up in my back yard. name: Gordon Banks
text:
>  I believe this company needs to improve its customer communications policies. They showed up late (without calling) to give me an estimate, and then showed up unannounced the day they came to work. But then things took a surprising turn..
>   They were hired to fell one tree and heavily trim the lower branches of another. To save money and to give me a project involving strenuous exercise, they were not required to do any cleanup work. When they asked about my cleanup plans, I mentioned using my ATV trailer to move the debris to the street for pickup by the city. At their suggestion I moved the trailer into the work area. Suddenly the logs and branches magically found their way onto the trailer until it was full, with the remainder piled neatly nearby. Despite not being paid for it, they worked hard to minimize the cleanup work remaining for me, a fat 74 year old retired soldier.
>  It was also interesting and entertaining to watch their tree climber work. He knew exactly where and how to make cuts to have the pieces fall right where he wanted them. And while 20+ feet up into the tree being trimmed, he asked me over and over what else I wanted cut. He never suggested being done until I was satisfied.
>   Finally, when the work was done, they did a last minute walk-around to check for any tools left behind, and to pick up more debris so I wouldn't have to.
>   The team's work (and work ethics) more than made up for the early communications problems. I highly  recommend Veterans Lawn Care for lawn and tree work.

resp.text: Mr. Banks, thank you Sir for taking the time out to give us such a detailed honest review! We take all feedback, positive and negative, so we can adjust fire accordingly. We did forget that we were supposed to text instead of calling but we will be more detailed in our system to prevent this. We are happy that you were satisfied with our work, our teams strive for these 5 Star jobs. We will be passing this review out to the team! Thank you for your business and mostly thank you for your military service!

name: Michele McQueeney
text:
The team did a great job of cleaning out the flower beds, pruning bushes, removing the ivy and overgrowth. I really appreciated them asking questions and making sure I was happy with the work being done.
I will be using them again and recommend them to others.

name: Jim Blake
text:
These guys are awesome. Highly knowledgeable, professional, hard working and a heck of a lot of fun to watch if you have the free time.

I had an oak tree that needed to come down. It was between the house, a garage and a driveway with a fence right under it. They had to take the whole tree down in pieces. It was a 3 day process.

I would recommend them for any difficult task because, THEY ARE UP TO IT!

text: The owner was very nice and did our free estimate personally. The workers showed up and the work was done very quickly and effectively. I love my new yard. We got a full landscaping of our front yard and it was exactly what I envisioned.

resp.text: Ms. Wintermyer, Thank you for an awesome review! I will let the team know this, we appreciate your business!

Love their work ethic.

Thank you Sir for posting this, I've enjoyed our relationship with you and your family over the years!
